./  ADD  SSI=62090412,NAME=IEEMB822
         TITLE 'IEEMB822 - SMF OPEN INITIALIZER                        *00001000
                        '                                               00002000
IEEMB822 CSECT ,                                                01S0001 00003000
@MAINENT DS    0H                                               01S0001 00004000
         USING *,@15                                            01S0001 00005000
         B     @PROLOG                                          01S0001 00006000
         DC    AL1(16)                                          01S0001 00007000
         DC    C'IEEMB822  76.209'                              01S0001 00008000
         DROP  @15                                                      00009000
@PROLOG  STM   @14,@12,12(@13)                                  01S0001 00010000
         BALR  @12,0                                            01S0001 00011000
@PSTART  DS    0H                                               01S0001 00012000
         USING @PSTART,@12                                      01S0001 00013000
         L     @00,@SIZDATD                                     01S0001 00014000
         GETMAIN  R,LV=(0)                                              00015000
         LR    @11,@01                                          01S0001 00016000
         USING @DATD,@11                                        01S0001 00017000
         ST    @13,@SA00001+4                                   01S0001 00018000
         LM    @00,@01,20(@13)                                  01S0001 00019000
         ST    @11,8(,@13)                                      01S0001 00020000
         LR    @13,@11                                          01S0001 00021000
         MVC   @PC00001(12),0(@01)                              01S0001 00022000
*                                                               03S0051 00023000
*                                                               03S0051 00024000
* /*                   END OF TCB                                    */ 00025000
*SMCAPTR=SMCAPT;                       /*OPTIMIZE SMCA ADDRESSABILITY*/ 00026000
         L     @10,@PC00001                                     01S0052 00027000
         L     SMCAPTR,SMCAPT(,@10)                             01S0052 00028000
*/********************************************************************/ 00029000
*/*                                                                  */ 00030000
*/*SEGMENT NAME= INITIAL                                             */ 00031000
*/*                                                                  */ 00032000
*/*DESCRIPTIVE NAME= SPECIFICATIONS FOR SMCA INITIALIZATION SEGMENT  */ 00033000
*/*                                                                  */ 00034000
*/*FUNCTION =                                                        */ 00035000
*/*   * GET CORE FOR BUFFER LENGTH SPECIFIED BY BUF= .               */ 00036000
*/*   * CALCULATE WORKING BUFFER SIZE (SMCABSIZ=SMCABUF/2)           */ 00037000
*/*   * INITIALIZE BOTH BUFFERS.                                     */ 00038000
*/*   * GET CORE FOR BOTH DCBS AND INITIALIZE WITH DCB EXPANSION.    */ 00039000
*/*   * INITIALIZE DEVICE ENTRIES TO INDICATE WHICH IS RESIDENT DCB  */ 00040000
*/*   * LOAD THE SVC'S USER EXIT IEFU83 TO OBTAIN ADDRESS FOR SVC.   */ 00041000
*/*                                                                  */ 00042000
*/*OPERATION=                                                        */ 00043000
*/*  NO SPECIAL ALGORITHMS ARE EMPLOYED IN THIS ROUTINE              */ 00044000
*/*                                                                  */ 00045000
*/*ENTRY POINT= INITIAL                                              */ 00046000
*/*                                                                  */ 00047000
*/* INPUT= SMCABUF - TOTAL SIZE OF BOTH BUFFERS                      */ 00048000
*/*                                                                  */ 00049000
*/* EXIT                                                             */ 00050000
*/*  CONDITION= PROCESSING COMPLETE                                  */ 00051000
*/*  OUTPUT= SMCABUFP - POINTER TO THE FIRST OF TWO BUFFERS          */ 00052000
*/*          SMCABSIZ - SIZE OF A WORKING BUFFER                     */ 00053000
*/*          SMCAU83  - POINTER TO IEFU83 ENTRY POINT                */ 00054000
*/*          SMCAPDCB - POINTER TO MANX DCB                          */ 00055000
*/*          SMCAADCB - POINTER TO MANY DCB CORE                     */ 00056000
*/*          SMCAXORY - X INDICATOR                                  */ 00057000
*/*          SMCAYORX - Y INDICATOR                                  */ 00058000
*/*          DCBS IN SUBPOOL 241                                     */ 00059000
*/*  RETURN CODE = N/A                                               */ 00060000
*/********************************************************************/ 00061000
*RFY (REG0,REG1) RSTD;                                          02S0053 00062000
*REG1=SMCABUF;                         /* LENGTH FOR BUFFER GETMAIN  */ 00063000
         L     REG1,SMCABUF(,SMCAPTR)                           02S0054 00064000
*GEN (GETMAIN R,LV=(REG1),SP=231);     /* GET BOTH BUFFERS   @ZA09178*/ 00065000
         GETMAIN R,LV=(REG1),SP=231                                     00066000
*SMCABUFP=REG1;                        /* SAVE BUFFER POINTER IN SMCA*/ 00067000
         ST    REG1,SMCABUFP(,SMCAPTR)                          02S0056 00068000
*SMCABSIZ=SMCABUF/2;                   /* HALF OF TOTAL BUFFER SIZE     00069000
*                                         FOR EACH WORKING BUFFER.   */ 00070000
         L     @04,SMCABUF(,SMCAPTR)                            02S0057 00071000
         SRDA  @04,32                                           02S0057 00072000
         D     @04,@CF00065                                     02S0057 00073000
         ST    @05,SMCABSIZ(,SMCAPTR)                           02S0057 00074000
*RFY (REG0,REG1) UNRSTD;               /* RELEASE GETMAIN REGISTERS  */ 00075000
*BUFPTR=SMCABUFP;                      /* ADDRESS FIRST BUFFER       */ 00076000
         L     @10,SMCABUFP(,SMCAPTR)                           02S0059 00077000
         LR    BUFPTR,@10                                       02S0059 00078000
*BDWLEN=INITBUF;                       /* INITIALIZE FIRST BUFFER    */ 00079000
         MVC   BDWLEN(4,BUFPTR),INITBUF                         02S0060 00080000
*BUFPTR=BUFPTR+SMCABSIZ;               /* ADDRESS SECOND BUFFER      */ 00081000
         ALR   BUFPTR,@05                                       02S0061 00082000
*BDWLEN=INITBUF;                       /* INITIALIZE SECOND BUFFER   */ 00083000
         MVC   BDWLEN(4,BUFPTR),INITBUF                         02S0062 00084000
*RFY (REG0,REG1) RSTD;                 /* RESERVE GETMAIN REGISTERS  */ 00085000
*REG0=XDCBSIZE;                        /* DCB LENGTH AND SUBPOOL     */ 00086000
         L     REG0,XDCBSIZE                                    02S0064 00087000
*GEN (GETMAIN R,LV=(0));               /* GET DCB CORE FOR MANX      */ 00088000
         GETMAIN R,LV=(0)                                               00089000
*SMCAPDCB=REG1;                        /* ADDRESS OF MANX DCB        */ 00090000
         ST    REG1,SMCAPDCB(,SMCAPTR)                          02S0066 00091000
*MANXDCB(1:XSIZE)=DCBMANX(1:XSIZE);    /* DCB TO GOTTEN CORE         */ 00092000
         L     @10,SMCAPDCB(,SMCAPTR)                           02S0067 00093000
         LH    @03,XSIZE                                        02S0067 00094000
         BCTR  @03,0                                            02S0067 00095000
         EX    @03,@SM01163                                     02S0067 00096000
*SMCAXORY='X';                         /* MANX INDICATOR TO DEV ENTRY*/ 00097000
         MVI   SMCAXORY(SMCAPTR),C'X'                           02S0068 00098000
*REG0= YDCBSIZE;                       /* DCB LENGTH AND SUBPOOL     */ 00099000
         L     REG0,YDCBSIZE                                    02S0069 00100000
*GEN (GETMAIN R,LV=(0));               /* GET MANY DCB CORE          */ 00101000
         GETMAIN R,LV=(0)                                               00102000
*SMCAADCB=REG1;                        /*ADDRESS OF MANY DCB         */ 00103000
         ST    REG1,SMCAADCB(,SMCAPTR)                          02S0071 00104000
*MANYDCB(1:YSIZE)=DCBMANY(1:YSIZE);     /*DCB TO GOTTEN CORE         */ 00105000
         L     @10,SMCAADCB(,SMCAPTR)                           02S0072 00106000
         LH    @03,YSIZE                                        02S0072 00107000
         BCTR  @03,0                                            02S0072 00108000
         EX    @03,@SM01165                                     02S0072 00109000
*SMCAYORX='Y';                         /* MANY INDICATOR TO DEV ENTRY*/ 00110000

*/********************************************************************/ 00123000
*/*                                                                  */ 00124000
*/*SEGMENT NAME= MANCHECK                                            */ 00125000
*/*                                                                  */ 00126000
*/*DESCRIPTIVE NAME= SMF DATA SET CHARACTERISTICS CHECKING           */ 00127000
*/*                                                                  */ 00128000
*/*FUNCTION=                                                         */ 00129000
*/*  BOTH DATA SET'S CHARACTERISTICS ARE CHECKED BEFORE THE SMF WTR  */ 00130000
*/*  IS SET DISPATCHABLE.  A DEVTYPE IS ISSUED TO DETERMINE IF THE   */ 00131000
*/*  DATA SETS EXIST AND IS ON A DIRECT ACCESS DEVICE.  IF IT DOES   */ 00132000
*/*  NOT EXIST THE DATA SET NOT OPEN MESSAGE WILL BE CONSTRUCTED. IF */ 00133000
*/*  IT IS NOT ON A DIRECT ACCESS DEVICE THE NOT D. A. MESSAGE IS    */ 00134000
*/*  CONSTRUCTED.                                                    */ 00135000
*/*                                                                  */ 00136000
*/*OPERATION= NO SPECIAL ALGORITHMS ARE EMPLOYED.                    */ 00137000
*/*                                                                  */ 00138000
*/*ENTRY POINT= MANCHECK                                             */ 00139000
*/*                                                                  */ 00140000
*/* INPUT=                                                           */ 00141000
*/*      JFCBVOLS - FOR THE X OR Y DATA SET THAT WAS NOT D. A.       */ 00142000
*/*                                                                  */ 00143000
*/*EXIT                                                              */ 00144000
*/* CONDITION= DATA SET WAS NOT ON A DIRECT ACCESS DEVICE            */ 00145000
*/* OUTPUT= MESSAGE IEE363I TO MSGBUF                                */ 00146000
*/*         ERROR SWITCH = ON                                        */ 00147000
*/* RETURN CODE= N/A                                                 */ 00148000
*/* CONDITION= DATA SET IS NON-EXISTENT(NOT AVAILABLE FOR OPENING)   */ 00149000
*/* OUTPUT= MESSAGE IEE365I TO MSGBUF                                */ 00150000
*/* RETURN CODE= N/A                                                 */ 00151000
*/* CONDITION= BOTH DATA SETS CHECKED AND NO ERRORS FOUND            */ 00152000
*/* OUTPUT= NONE                                                     */ 00153000
*/* RETURN CODE= N/A                                                 */ 00154000
*/*                                                                  */ 00155000
*/********************************************************************/ 00156000
*/*                                                                  */ 00157000
*DDNAME=SMFMAN;                        /* SET UP MANX|Y DDNAME       */ 00158000

*DO LOOP=1 TO 2 WHILE(ERROR='0'B);     /* BOTH MANX&Y ARE TO BE DONE */ 00160000

         MVC   DDNAME+6(1),0(@03)                               02S0081 00167000
*  GEN (DEVTYPE DDNAME,RETAREA);       /* REQUEST DEVICE CHAR.       */ 00168000
         DEVTYPE DDNAME,RETAREA                                         00169000
*  RFY (REG5,REG15) RSTD;                                       02S0083 00170000
*  IF REG15=0 THEN                     /* WAS DEVTYPE SUCCESSFUL?    */ 00171000
         LTR   REG15,REG15                                      02S0084 00172000
         BNZ   @RF00084                                         02S0084 00173000
*    DO;                                                        02S0085 00174000
*      RFY REG15 UNRSTD;               /* RELEASE RETURN CODE REG    */ 00175000
*      IF TYPDAÂ¬='1'B THEN             /* IS IT A DIRECT ACCESS DEV? */ 00176000
         TM    TYPDA,B'00100000'                                02S0087 00177000
         BO    @RF00087                                         02S0087 00178000
*        DO;                                                    02S0088 00179000
*          ERROR='1'B;                 /*SET ERROR ENCOUNTERED SWITCH*/ 00180000
         OI    ERROR,B'10000000'                                02S0089 00181000
*          IF XYARRAY(LOOP)='X' THEN   /* DETREMINE WHICH DATA SET      00182000
*                                         ENCOUNTERED THE ERROR.     */ 00183000
         SLR   @10,@10                                          02S0090 00184000
         IC    @10,LOOP                                         02S0090 00185000

*            REG5=SMCAPDCB;            /* MANX DCB POINTER           */ 00189000

*          ELSE                                                 02S0092 00191000
*            REG5=SMCAADCB;            /* MANY DCB POINTER           */ 00192000
         B     @RC00090                                         02S0092 00193000
@RF00090 L     REG5,SMCAADCB(,SMCAPTR)                          02S0092 00194000
*          RFY IHADCB BASED(REG5);                              02S0093 00195000
@RC00090 DS    0H                                               02S0094 00196000
*          DCBEXLSA=ADDR(RJFCBLST);    /* POINT TO RDJFCB EXIT LIST  */ 00197000
         LA    @10,RJFCBLST                                     02S0094 00198000
         STCM  @10,7,DCBEXLSA+28(REG5)                          02S0094 00199000
*          EXITLIST=ADDR(JFCBAREA);    /* ADDRESS OF JFCB AREA       */ 00200000
         LA    @10,JFCBAREA                                     02S0095 00201000

*          INDIC='87'X;                /* 80 INDICATES LAST LIST ENTRY  00203000
*                                         WHILE 07 INDICATES ENTRY FOR  00204000
*                                         RDJFCB.                    */ 00205000
         MVI   INDIC,X'87'                                      02S0096 00206000
*          JFCBREAD=JFCBREAS;          /* INITIALIZE RDJFCB PARM LIST*/ 00207000
         MVC   JFCBREAD(4),JFCBREAS                             02S0097 00208000
*          GEN (RDJFCB ((REG5)),MF=(E,JFCBREAD)); /* JFCB FOR VOLSER */ 00209000
         RDJFCB ((REG5)),MF=(E,JFCBREAD)                                00210000
*          RFY REG5 UNRSTD;            /* RELEASE DCB POINTER        */ 00211000
*          MSGBUF(1:L363I+4)=          /* OBTAIN GENERAL MSG TEXT    */ 00212000
*             NOTDAMSG;                /* FOR TEXT INSERTION         */ 00213000
         L     @10,@CV00101                                     02S0100 00214000

         L     @10,@CV00101                                     02S0100 00217000
         EX    @03,@SM01169                                     02S0100 00218000
*          MSGBUF(17:22)=              /* VOLSER FROM JFCB           */ 00219000
*             JFCBVOLS(1:6);           /*  TO MESSAGE IEE363I        */ 00220000
         ICM   @10,7,EXITLIST                                   02S0101 00221000
         MVC   MSGBUF+16(6),JFCBVOLS(@10)                       02S0101 00222000
*        END;                                                   02S0102 00223000
*      ELSE;                                                    02S0103 00224000
@RF00087 DS    0H                                               02S0104 00225000
*    END;                                                       02S0104 00226000
*  ELSE                                /* DEVTYPE FAILED             */ 00227000
*    DO;                                                        02S0105 00228000

@RF00084 DS    0H                                               02S0106 00230000
*      ERROR='1'B;                     /*SET ERROR ENCOUNTERED SWITCH*/ 00231000
         OI    ERROR,B'10000000'                                02S0106 00232000

*         NOTOPEN;                     /* FOR TEXT INSERTION         */ 00234000

*END;                                                           02S0110 00247000

*/*                                                                  */ 00260000
*/********************************************************************/ 00261000
*/*                                                                  */ 00262000
*/*SEGMENT NAME= WTRINIT                                             */ 00263000
*/*                                                                  */ 00264000
*/*DESCRIPTIVE NAME= SMF WTR TASK - DISPATCHER                       */ 00265000
*/*                                                                  */ 00266000
*/*FUNCTION=                                                         */ 00267000
*/*  * SET THE WTR DISPATCHABLE VIA ISSUANCE OF THE STATUS SVC.      */ 00268000
*/*  * WAIT FOR WTR INITIALIZATION COMPLETION.                       */ 00269000
*/*                                                                  */ 00270000
*/* OPERATION= NO SPECIAL ALGORITHMS ARE EMPLOYED.                   */ 00271000
*/*                                                                  */ 00272000
*/*ENTRY POINT= WTRINIT                                              */ 00273000
*/*                                                                  */ 00274000
*/* INPUT= POINTER TO WTR TCB                                        */ 00275000
*/*        POINTER TO WTR ATTACH ECB                                 */ 00276000
*/*                                                                  */ 00277000
*/*EXIT                                                              */ 00278000
*/* CONDITION= PROCESSING COMPLETE                                   */ 00279000
*/* OUTPUT= WTR TASK DISPATCHED                                      */ 00280000
*/* RETURN CODE= N/A                                                 */ 00281000
*/*                                                                  */ 00282000
*/********************************************************************/ 00283000
*/*                                                                  */ 00284000
*ATTCHECB=WTRECBPT;                    /* WTR ATTACH ECB TO WAIT LIST*/ 00285000
         L     @10,@PC00001+8                                   02S0113 00286000
         MVC   ATTCHECB(4),WTRECBPT(@10)                        02S0113 00287000
*WAITECB=ADDR(SMCABECB);               /* WTR POST ECB ADDRESS TOLIST*/ 00288000
         LA    @10,SMCABECB(,SMCAPTR)                           02S0114 00289000
         STCM  @10,7,WAITECB                                    02S0114 00290000
*LASTIND='80'X;                        /* HIGH ORDER BIT INDICATES      00291000
*                                         LAST LIST ENTRY.           */ 00292000
         MVI   LASTIND,X'80'                                    02S0115 00293000
*RFY REG5 RSTD;                        /* GET REGISTER CONTROL       */ 00294000
*REG5=WTRTCBPT;                        /* GET WRITER TCB POINTER     */ 00295000
         L     @10,@PC00001+4                                   02S0117 00296000
         L     REG5,WTRTCBPT(,@10)                              02S0117 00297000
*GEN (STATUS RESET,ND,(REG5),(12),E);  /* DISPATCH WTR TASK          */ 00298000
         STATUS RESET,ND,(REG5),(12),E                                  00299000
*RFY REG5 UNRSTD;                      /* RELEASE REGISTER CONTROL   */ 00300000
*GEN (WAIT 1,ECBLIST=WECBLIST);        /* WAIT FOR COMPLETION        */ 00301000
         WAIT 1,ECBLIST=WECBLIST                                        00302000
*/*                                                                  */ 00303000
*/********************************************************************/ 00304000
*/*                                                                  */ 00305000
*/*SEGMENT NAME= ERRORDET                                            */ 00306000
*/*                                                                  */ 00307000
*/*DESCRIPTIVE NAME= SMF WTR ERROR DETECTION ROUTINE                 */ 00308000
*/*                                                                  */ 00309000
*/*FUNCTION=                                                         */ 00310000
*/*   * THIS SEGMENT WILL DETERMINE IF THE  SMF WTR ENCOUNTERED ANY  */ 00311000
*/*     PROBLEMS WHILE INITIALIZING ITSELF, AND IT WILL CONSTRUCT    */ 00312000
*/*     APPROPRIATE MESSAGES FOR THE ERROR CONDITIONS.  IF THE WTR'S */ 00313000
*/*     ATTACH ECB IS POSTED, THE WTR TERMINATED IN IT'S INITIALIZA- */ 00314000
*/*     TION,THERFORE NO RECORDING WILL BE ATTEMPTED.                */ 00315000
*/*   * IF SMCADSNF IS ON, ONE OF THE SMF DATA SETS WAS MISSING.     */ 00316000
*/*   * IF SMCAOPFL IS ON THEN A PROBLEM OCCURRED IN OPENING         */ 00317000
*/*     ONE OF THE DATA SETS.                                        */ 00318000
*/*                                                                  */ 00319000
*/*OPERATION= NO SPECIAL ALGORITHMS ARE EMPLOYED.                    */ 00320000
*/*                                                                  */ 00321000
*/*ENTRY POINT=ERRORDET                                              */ 00322000
*/*                                                                  */ 00323000
*/* INPUT=                                                           */ 00324000
*/*        SMCAUSER                                                  */ 00325000
*/*        SMCADSNF                                                  */ 00326000
*/*        SMCAOPFL                                                  */ 00327000
*/*        WTR ATTACH ECB                                            */ 00328000
*/*                                                                  */ 00329000
*/*EXIT                                                              */ 00330000
*/* CONDITION= WTR ATTACH ECB POSTED AND SMCASDNF,SMCAOPFL BITS=OFF  */ 00331000
*/* OUTPUT= IEE480I MESSAGE TO MSGBUF                                */ 00332000
*/*         ERROR SWITCH = ON                                        */ 00333000
*/* RETURN CODE= N/A                                                 */ 00334000
*/* CONDITION= SMCADSNF = ON (DATA SET NOT FOUND)                    */ 00335000
*/* OUTPUT= IEE359I MESSAGE TO MSGBUF                                */ 00336000
*/*         ERROR SWITCH = ON                                        */ 00337000
*/* RETURN CODE= N/A                                                 */ 00338000
*/* CONDITION= SMCAOPFL = ON (OPEN FAILURE)                          */ 00339000
*/* OUTPUT= IEE365I MESSAGE TO MSGBUF                                */ 00340000
*/*         ERROR SWITCH = ON                                        */ 00341000
*/* RETURN CODE= N/A                                                 */ 00342000
*/*                                                                  */ 00343000
*/********************************************************************/ 00344000
*/*                                                                  */ 00345000
*IF POSTED='1'B THEN                   /* HAS THE WTR ATTACH ECB     */ 00346000
         L     @10,@PC00001+8                                   02S0121 00347000
         L     @10,WTRECBPT(,@10)                               02S0121 00348000
         TM    POSTED(@10),B'01000000'                          02S0121 00349000
         BNO   @RF00121                                         02S0121 00350000
*  DO;                                 /* BEEN POSTED?               */ 00351000
*    IF SMCADSNF='1'B THEN             /* WAS EITHER D.S. MISSING?   */ 00352000
         TM    SMCADSNF(SMCAPTR),B'00000001'                    02S0123 00353000
         BNO   @RF00123                                         02S0123 00354000
*      DO;                                                      02S0124 00355000
*        ERROR='1'B;                   /*ERROR ENCOUNTERED SWITCH ON */ 00356000
         OI    ERROR,B'10000000'                                02S0125 00357000
*        MSGBUF(1:L358I+4)=            /* OBTAIN GENERAL MSG TEXT    */ 00358000
*         DSNOTFND;                    /* FOR TEXT INSERTION         */ 00359000
         L     @10,@CV00102                                     02S0126 00360000
         LA    @03,3                                            02S0126 00361000
         AH    @03,L358I(,@10)                                  02S0126 00362000
         L     @10,@CV00102                                     02S0126 00363000
         EX    @03,@SM01173                                     02S0126 00364000
*        MSGBUF(25)=SMCAXORY;          /* DSN THAT HAD ERROR TO BUF. */ 00365000
         MVC   MSGBUF+24(1),SMCAXORY(SMCAPTR)                   02S0127 00366000
*        MSGBUF(40:45)=SMCAPDEV;       /* VOLSER OF ERROR DSN        */ 00367000
         MVC   MSGBUF+39(6),SMCAPDEV(SMCAPTR)                   02S0128 00368000
*      END;                                                     02S0129 00369000
*    ELSE                                                       02S0130 00370000
*      IF SMCAOPFL='1'B THEN           /* WERE BOTH DATA SETS OPENED?*/ 00371000
         B     @RC00123                                         02S0130 00372000
@RF00123 TM    SMCAOPFL(SMCAPTR),B'00100000'                    02S0130 00373000
         BNO   @RF00130                                         02S0130 00374000
*        DO;                                                    02S0131 00375000
*          ERROR='1'B;                 /* SET ERROR SWITCH ON        */ 00376000
         OI    ERROR,B'10000000'                                02S0132 00377000
*          MSGBUF(1:L365I+4)=          /* OBTAIN GENERAL MSG TEXT    */ 00378000
*           NOTOPEN;                   /* FOR TEXT INSERTION         */ 00379000
         L     @10,@CV00103                                     02S0133 00380000
         LA    @03,3                                            02S0133 00381000
         AH    @03,L365I(,@10)                                  02S0133 00382000
         L     @10,@CV00103                                     02S0133 00383000
         EX    @03,@SM01171                                     02S0133 00384000
*          MSGBUF(25)=SMCAXORY;        /* DISTINGUISH BETWEEN XORY   */ 00385000
         MVC   MSGBUF+24(1),SMCAXORY(SMCAPTR)                   02S0134 00386000
*        END;                                                   02S0135 00387000
*      ELSE                                                     02S0136 00388000
*        DO;                                                    02S0136 00389000
         B     @RC00130                                         02S0136 00390000
@RF00130 DS    0H                                               02S0137 00391000
*          ERROR='1'B;                 /*ERROR ENCOUNTERED SWITCH ON */ 00392000
         OI    ERROR,B'10000000'                                02S0137 00393000
*          MSGBUF(1:L480I+4)=          /* OBTAIN MESSAGE FOR ERROR   */ 00394000
*             SMFAILED;                /* ROUTINES WTO               */ 00395000
         L     @10,@CV00100                                     02S0138 00396000
         LA    @03,3                                            02S0138 00397000
         AH    @03,L480I(,@10)                                  02S0138 00398000
         L     @10,@CV00100                                     02S0138 00399000
         EX    @03,@SM01175                                     02S0138 00400000
*        END;                                                   02S0139 00401000
*  END;                                                         02S0140 00402000
@RC00130 DS    0H                                               02S0140 00403000
@RC00123 DS    0H                                               02S0141 00404000
*  END;                                                         01S0141 00405000
@RF00121 DS    0H                                               01S0142 00406000
*IF ERROR='1'B THEN                    /* DO ERROR PROCESSING IF ANY */ 00407000
@RF00111 TM    ERROR,B'10000000'                                01S0142 00408000
         BNO   @RF00142                                         01S0142 00409000
*  DO;                                 /* PROBLEMS AT ALL WERE FOUND.*/ 00410000
*/*                                                                  */ 00411000
*/********************************************************************/ 00412000
*/*                                                                  */ 00413000
*/*SEGMENT NAME= ERRORRTN                                            */ 00414000
*/*                                                                  */ 00415000
*/*DESCRIPTIVE NAME= ERROR MSG ROUTINE                               */ 00416000
*/*                                                                  */ 00417000
*/*FUNCTION=                                                         */ 00418000
*/*   * ISSUE THE MESSAGE CONTAINED IN MSGBUF.                       */ 00419000
*/*   * FREE THE WORKING BUFFERS FOR LENGTH(SMCABSIZ*2)              */ 00420000
*/*   * FREE THE MANX DCB CORE                                       */ 00421000
*/*   * FREE THE MANY DCB CORE                                       */ 00422000
*/*   * DELETE THE SVC'S USER EXIT IEFU83                            */ 00423000
*/*                                                                  */ 00424000
*/* OPERATION= NO SPECIAL ALGORITHMS ARE EMPLOYED.                   */ 00425000
*/*                                                                  */ 00426000
*/*ENTRY POINT= ERRORRTN                                             */ 00427000
*/*                                                                  */ 00428000
*/* INPUT=MSGBUF - CONTAINS MESSAGE TO BE ISSUED VIA WTOR            */ 00429000
*/*       SMCABUFP                                                   */ 00430000
*/*       SMCABSIZ                                                   */ 00431000
*/*       SMCAPCDB                                                   */ 00432000
*/*       SMCAAADCB                                                  */ 00433000
*/*                                                                  */ 00434000
*/*EXIT                                                              */ 00435000
*/* CONDITION= ERROR PROCESSING COMPLETE FOR WTR INIT. FAILURE       */ 00436000
*/* OUTPUT= SMCAUSER - OFF                                           */ 00437000
*/*         SMCAMAN  - OFF                                           */ 00438000
*/*         SMCAPDCB - 0                                             */ 00439000
*/*         SMCAADCB - 0                                             */ 00440000
*/*         MSG TO OPERATOR                                          */ 00441000
*/* RETURN CODE= N/A                                                 */ 00442000
*/*                                                                  */ 00443000
*/********************************************************************/ 00444000
*/*                                                                  */ 00445000
*SMCAUSER='0'B;                        /* ALL RECORDING IS TURNED OFF*/ 00446000
*SMCAMAN='0'B;                         /* FOR ANY OPEN ERROR.        */ 00447000
         NI    SMCAUSER(SMCAPTR),B'00111111'                    02S0145 00448000
*GEN (WTO MF=(E,MSGBUF));              /* ISSUE MESSAGE              */ 00449000
         WTO MF=(E,MSGBUF)                                              00450000
*IF SMCABUFPÂ¬=0 THEN                   /* WAS BUFFER ALLOCATED?      */ 00451000
         SLR   @10,@10                                          02S0147 00452000
         L     @03,SMCABUFP(,SMCAPTR)                           02S0147 00453000
         CR    @03,@10                                          02S0147 00454000
         BE    @RF00147                                         02S0147 00455000
*  DO;                                                          02S0148 00456000
*    RFY (REG0,REG1,REG5) RSTD;        /* FREEMAIN SVC REGISTERS     */ 00457000
*    REG1=SMCABUFP;                    /* START ADDRESS OF BUFFER    */ 00458000
         LR    REG1,@03                                         02S0150 00459000
*    REG5=SMCABSIZ*2;                  /* BUFFERS TOTAL SIZE         */ 00460000
         L     REG5,SMCABSIZ(,SMCAPTR)                          02S0151 00461000
         ALR   REG5,REG5                                        02S0151 00462000
*    SMCABUFP=0;                       /* INDICATE BUFFER FREED      */ 00463000
         ST    @10,SMCABUFP(,SMCAPTR)                           02S0152 00464000
*    GEN (FREEMAIN R,LV=(REG5),A=(REG1),SP=231); /* FREE BUFFER CORE    00465000
*                                                            @ZA09178*/ 00466000
         FREEMAIN R,LV=(REG5),A=(REG1),SP=231                           00467000
*    RFY REG5 UNRSTD;                                           02S0154 00468000
*  END;                                                         02S0155 00469000
*IF SMCAPDCBÂ¬=0 THEN                   /* WASMANX DCB ALLOCATED?     */ 00470000
@RF00147 SLR   @10,@10                                          02S0156 00471000
         L     @03,SMCAPDCB(,SMCAPTR)                           02S0156 00472000
         CR    @03,@10                                          02S0156 00473000
         BE    @RF00156                                         02S0156 00474000
*  DO;                                                          02S0157 00475000
*    REG0=XDCBSIZE;                    /* SIZE OF MANX DCB CORE      */ 00476000
         L     REG0,XDCBSIZE                                    02S0158 00477000
*    REG1=SMCAPDCB;                    /* POINTER TO MANX DCB CORE   */ 00478000
         LR    REG1,@03                                         02S0159 00479000
*    SMCAPDCB=0;                       /* INDICATE DCB FREED         */ 00480000
         ST    @10,SMCAPDCB(,SMCAPTR)                           02S0160 00481000
*    GEN (FREEMAIN R,LV=(0),A=(1));    /* FREE MANX DCB CORE         */ 00482000
         FREEMAIN R,LV=(0),A=(1)                                        00483000
*  END;                                                         02S0162 00484000
*IF SMCAADCBÂ¬=0 THEN                   /* WAS MANY DCB ALLOCATED?    */ 00485000
@RF00156 L     @10,SMCAADCB(,SMCAPTR)                           02S0163 00486000
         LTR   @10,@10                                          02S0163 00487000
         BZ    @RF00163                                         02S0163 00488000
*  DO;                                                          02S0164 00489000
*    REG0=YDCBSIZE;                    /* SIZE OF MANY DCB CORE      */ 00490000
         L     REG0,YDCBSIZE                                    02S0165 00491000
*    REG1= SMCAADCB;                   /* ADDRESS OF MANY DCB CORE   */ 00492000
         LR    REG1,@10                                         02S0166 00493000
*    SMCAADCB=SMCAADCB&&SMCAADCB;      /* INDICATE DCB FREED         */ 00494000
         LR    @03,@10                                          02S0167 00495000
         XR    @03,@10                                          02S0167 00496000
         ST    @03,SMCAADCB(,SMCAPTR)                           02S0167 00497000
*    GEN (FREEMAIN R,LV=(0),A=(1));    /* FREE MANY DCB CORE         */ 00498000
         FREEMAIN R,LV=(0),A=(1)                                        00499000
*  END;                                                         02S0169 00500000
*GEN (DELETE EP=IEFU83);               /* DELETE SVC'S USER EXIT     */ 00501000
@RF00163 DS    0H                                               02S0170 00502000
         DELETE EP=IEFU83                                               00503000
*RFY (REG0,REG1) UNRSTD;                                        02S0171 00504000
*  END;                                                         01S0172 00505000
*RETURN;                                                        01S0173 00506000
@EL00001 L     @13,4(,@13)                                      01S0173 00507000
@EF00001 L     @00,@SIZDATD                                     01S0173 00508000
         LR    @01,@11                                          01S0173 00509000
         FREEMAIN R,LV=(0),A=(1)                                        00510000
@ER00001 LM    @14,@12,12(@13)                                  01S0173 00511000
         BR    @14                                              01S0173 00512000
*END IEEMB822                                                   01S0174 00513000

./  ADD  SSI=80230198,NAME=IEEMB823
         TITLE 'IEEMB823 - SMF INITIALIZATION RECORD PROCESSOR         *00001000
                        '                                               00002000
IEEMB823 CSECT ,                                                01S0001 00003000
@MAINENT DS    0H                                               01S0001 00004000
         USING *,@15                                            01S0001 00005000
         B     @PROLOG                                          01S0001 00006000
         DC    AL1(16)                                          01S0001 00007000
         DC    C'IEEMB823  78.023'                              01S0001 00008000
         DROP  @15                                                      00009000
@PROLOG  STM   @14,@12,12(@13)                                  01S0001 00010000
         BALR  @12,0                                            01S0001 00011000
@PSTART  DS    0H                                               01S0001 00012000
         USING @PSTART,@12                                      01S0001 00013000
         L     @00,@SIZDATD                                     01S0001 00014000
         GETMAIN  R,LV=(0)                                              00015000
         LR    @11,@01                                          01S0001 00016000
         USING @DATD,@11                                        01S0001 00017000
         ST    @13,@SA00001+4                                   01S0001 00018000
         LM    @00,@01,20(@13)                                  01S0001 00019000
         ST    @11,8(,@13)                                      01S0001 00020000
         LR    @13,@11                                          01S0001 00021000
         MVC   @PC00001(8),0(@01)                               01S0001 00022000
RECSBPL  EQU    0                                                       00023000
*R1=LENGTH(RECORD);                    /* GET LENGTH OF LONGEST 01S0057 00024000
*                                         POSIBLE RECORD             */ 00025000
         LH    R1,@CH01791                                      01S0057 00026000
*GEN(GETMAIN R,SP=RECSBPL,LV=(R1));    /* GET CORE FOR RECORD        */ 00027000
         GETMAIN R,SP=RECSBPL,LV=(R1)                                   00028000
*RECPTR=R1;                            /* SAVE RECORD ADDRESS        */ 00029000
         LR    RECPTR,R1                                        01S0059 00030000
*RFY (R1) UNRSTD;                      /* RELEASE REGISTER CONTROL   */ 00031000
*RDWRES=0;                             /* ZERO RESERVED FIELD        */ 00032000

         STH   @10,RDWRES(,RECPTR)                              01S0061 00034000
*COMHDR=COMHDR&&COMHDR;                /* ZERO COMMON RECORD SECTION */ 00035000

*/*                                                                  */ 00038000
*/*SEGMENT NAME= BLDREC0                                             */ 00039000
*/*                                                                  */ 00040000
*/*DESCRIPTIVE NAME=  RECORD 0 PROCESSOR                             */ 00041000
*/*                                                                  */ 00042000
*/*FUNCTION=                                                         */ 00043000
*/* THIS SEGMENT BUILDS AND ISSUES RECORD TYPE 0. THIS RECORD        */ 00044000
*/*  CONTAINS INFORMATION PERTINENT TO THE SYSTEM ENVIRONMENT        */ 00045000
*/*  AT IPL TIME. I.E., JOB WAIT TIME, SIZE OF SMF BUFFERS,          */ 00046000
*/*  HIGHEST REAL AND HIGHEST VIRTUAL CORE SIZE IN ONE K MULTIPLES,  */ 00047000
*/*  AND SMF OPTIONS USED FOR ACCOUNTING.                            */ 00048000
*/*                                                                  */ 00049000
*/*  OPERATION= NO SPECIAL ALGORITHMS                                */ 00050000
*/*                                                                  */ 00051000
*/*ENTRY POINT= IN-LINE SEGMENT                                      */ 00052000
*/*  INPUT=                                                          */ 00053000
*/*    JWTMIN  - VALUE OF JOB WAIT TIME IN MINUTES                   */ 00054000
*/*              PASSED FROM IEEMB820.                               */ 00055000
*/*    SMCABSIZ - SIZE OF ONE SMF BUFFER                             */ 00056000
*/*    CVTMZ00  - HIGHEST VIRTUAL ADDRESS IN MACHINE                 */ 00057000
*/*    CVTEORM  - HIGHEST REAL ADDRESS IN MACHINE                    */ 00058000
*/*    SMCAOPT  - SMF ACCOUNTING OPTIONS                             */ 00059000
*/*    RECORD   - BUFFER TO BUILD RECORD IN                          */ 00060000
*/*                                                                  */ 00061000
*/*EXIT=                                                             */ 00062000
*/*  CONDITION= NORMAL, THE TYPE 0 RECORD BUILT AND ISSUED           */ 00063000
*/*  OUTPUT= THE TYPE 0 RECORD ISSUED                                */ 00064000
*/*  RETURN CODE= NONE                                               */ 00065000
*/*                                                                  */ 00066000
*/********************************************************************/ 00067000
*SMF0LEN=LENGTH(SMFRCD00);             /* LENGTH OF RECORD           */ 00068000
         MVC   SMF0LEN(2,RECPTR),@CH01792                       02S0063 00069000
*SMF0RTY=0;                            /* RECORD TYPE 0              */ 00070000
         MVI   SMF0RTY(RECPTR),X'00'                            02S0064 00071000
*SMF0JWT=JWTMIN;                       /* JOB WAIT TIME IN MINUTES   */ 00072000
         L     @10,@PC00001                                     02S0065 00073000
         MVC   SMF0JWT(4,RECPTR),JWTMIN(@10)                    02S0065 00074000
*SMF0BUF=2*SMCABSIZ;                   /* SIZE OF SMF BUFFERS        */ 00075000
         L     @10,@PC00001+4                                   02S0066 00076000
         L     @10,CVTPTR(,@10)                                 02S0066 00077000
         L     @15,CVTSMCA(,@10)                                02S0066 00078000
         L     @14,SMCABSIZ(,@15)                               02S0066 00079000
         ALR   @14,@14                                          02S0066 00080000
         ST    @14,SMF0BUF(,RECPTR)                             02S0066 00081000
*SMF0VST=(CVTMZ00+1)/1024;             /* HIGHEST VITUAL @ IN 1K UNIT*/ 00082000

         AL    @00,CVTMZ00(,@10)                                02S0067 00084000
         SRDA  @00,32                                           02S0067 00085000
         D     @00,@CF01774                                     02S0067 00086000
         ST    @01,SMF0VST(,RECPTR)                             02S0067 00087000
*SMF0OPT=SMCAOPT;                      /* SMCA OPTIONS FOR THIS IPL  */ 00088000
         MVC   SMF0OPT(1,RECPTR),SMCAOPT(@15)                   02S0068 00089000
*SMF0RST=CVTRLSTG;                     /* ON-LINE STORAGE IN 1K UNITS   00090000
*                                                            @ZA28053*/ 00091000
         MVC   SMF0RST(4,RECPTR),CVTRLSTG(@10)                  02S0069 00092000
*RFY R1 RSTD;                          /* GET REGISTER CONTROL       */ 00093000
*R1=ADDR(SMFRCD00);                    /* GET ADDR OF SMF RECORD     */ 00094000
         LR    R1,RECPTR                                        02S0071 00095000
*GEN(SMFWTM (R1));                     /* ISSUE RECORD 0             */ 00096000
         SMFWTM (R1)                                                    00097000
*RFY R1 UNRSTD;                        /* RELEASE REGISTER CONTROL   */ 00098000
*/********************************************************************/ 00099000
*/*                                                                  */ 00100000
*/*SEGMENT NAME= BLDREC8                                             */ 00101000
*/*                                                                  */ 00102000
*/*DESCRIPTIVE NAME=  RECORD TYPE 8 PROCESSOR                        */ 00103000
*/*                                                                  */ 00104000
*/*FUNCTION=                                                         */ 00105000
*/*  THIS SEGMENT BUILDS AND ISSUES REORD TYPE 8.                    */ 00106000
*/*  THIS RECORD REFLECTS THE STATUS OF DEVICES THAT ARE             */ 00107000
*/*  ONLINE AT IPL TIME.                                             */ 00108000
*/*  EACH DEVICE ENTRY CONTAINS INFORMATION ON CLASS AND     @Y30LPPE*/ 00109000
*/*  UNIT TYPE, CHANNEL AND UNIT ADDRESS, AND AN INDICATOR   @Y30LPPE*/ 00110000
*/*  FOR VIRTUAL VOLUMES.                                    @Y30LPPE*/ 00111000
*/*  IN ADDITION TO RECORD 8, IF VOLUME ACCOUNTING WAS REQUESTED,    */ 00112000
*/*  RECORD TYPE 19 IS PRODUCED FOR ONLINE, READY DIRECT ACCESS      */ 00113000
*/*  DEVICES. THIS IS PERFORMED BY INVOKING SVC 78 FOR               */ 00114000
*/*  EACH ONLINE, READY DIRECT ACCESS DEVICE.                        */ 00115000
*/*                                                                  */ 00116000
*/*  OPERATION=                                                      */ 00117000
*/*    THE UCB LOOKUP TABLE IS USED TO OBTAIN POINTERS TO ALL UCBS   */ 00118000
*/*    IN THE SYSTEM. ZERO POINTERS ARE IGNORED (DUMMY UCB).         */ 00119000
*/*    IF THE UCB CURRENTLY BEING USED INDICATES MULITPLE PATHS      */ 00120000
*/*    EXIST TO THE DEVICE, THE UCB TABLE THUS FAR PROCESSED IS      */ 00121000
*/*    RESCANNED. IF A UCB POINTER WHICH IS THE SAME AS THE CURRENT  */ 00122000
*/*    UCB POINTER IS FOUND IN THE TABLE, THE UCB HAS ALREADY        */ 00123000
*/*    BEEN PROCESSED, AND THEREFORE THE CURRENT ENTRY IS IGNORED.   */ 00124000
*/*    IF THE UCBTYPE INDICATES A VIRTUAL DEVICE, THEN THE   @Y30LPPE*/ 00125000
*/*    DEVICE ENTRY FLAGS WILL BE SET TO INDICATE A VIRTUAL  @Y30LPPE*/ 00126000
*/*    DEVICE.                                               @Y30LPPE*/ 00127000
*/*    A UCB POINTER OF 'FFFF'X DENOTES THE END OF THE TABLE.        */ 00128000
*/*                                                                  */ 00129000
*/*ENTRY POINT= IN-LINE SEGMENT                                      */ 00130000
*/*  INPUT=                                                          */ 00131000
*/*    UCBTBL   - UCB LOOKUP TABLE                                   */ 00132000
*/*    UCBONLI  - DEVICE ON LINE INDICATOR                           */ 00133000
*/*    UCB3DACC - DEVICE DIRECT ACCESS INDICATOR                     */ 00134000
*/*    UCBNOTRD - DEVICE READY UNDICATOR                             */ 00135000
*/*    UCBTYP   - DEVICE CLASS AND TYPE (BYTES 3 AND 4)              */ 00136000
*/*    UCBRVDEV - VIRTUAL DEVICE INDICATOR                   @Y30LPPE*/ 00137000
*/*    UCBCHAN  - CHANNEL AND UNIT ADDRESS                           */ 00138000
*/*    SMCAVOL  - VOLUME ACCOUNTING INDICATOR                        */ 00139000
*/*    RECORD   - BUFFER TO BUILD RECORD IN                          */ 00140000
*/*                                                                  */ 00141000
*/*EXIT=                                                             */ 00142000
*/*  CONDITION= NORMAL, RECORD TYPE 8 AND/OR TYPE 19 ISSUED          */ 00143000
*/*  OUTPUT= THE TYPE 8 AND/OR TYPE 19 RECORDS ISSUED                */ 00144000
*/*  RETURN CODE= NONE                                               */ 00145000
*/*                                                                  */ 00146000
*/********************************************************************/ 00147000
*SMF8RTY=8;                            /* RECORD TYPE 8              */ 00148000
         MVI   SMF8RTY(RECPTR),X'08'                            02S0074 00149000
*DVCINDX=0;                            /* INIT DEVICE ENTRY INDEX    */ 00150000
         SLR   DVCINDX,DVCINDX                                  02S0075 00151000
*UCBINDX=1;                            /* INIT INDEX FIRST UCB       */ 00152000

*VARPTR=ADDR(SMF8LENN)+2;              /* ADDR OF FIRST DEVICE ENT   */ 00154000
         LA    VARPTR,SMF8LENN(,RECPTR)                         02S0077 00155000
         AH    VARPTR,@CH00136                                  02S0077 00156000
*DO WHILE (UCBTBL(UCBINDX)Â¬=TBLEND);   /* PROCESS UCBLOOKUP TBL      */ 00157000
         B     @DE00078                                         02S0078 00158000
@DL00078 DS    0H                                               02S0079 00159000
*  UCBPTR=UCBTBL(UCBINDX);             /* GET UCB POINTER FROM TBL   */ 00160000
         LR    @10,UCBINDX                                      02S0079 00161000
         ALR   @10,@10                                          02S0079 00162000
         L     @15,@PC00001+4                                   02S0079 00163000
         L     @01,CVTPTR(,@15)                                 02S0079 00164000
         L     @01,CVTILK2(,@01)                                02S0079 00165000
         BCTR  @01,0                                            02S0079 00166000
         BCTR  @01,0                                            02S0079 00167000
         LH    UCBPTR,UCBTBL(@10,@01)                           02S0079 00168000
*  UCBPTR=UCBPTR&'0000FFFF'X;          /* MAKE SURE UCB PTR POSITIVE */ 00169000
         N     UCBPTR,@CF01776                                  02S0080 00170000
*  IF UCBPTRÂ¬=0 &                      /* IF NOT DUMMY UCB (ZERO PTR)*/ 00171000
*     UCBONLI='1'B THEN                /* AND UCB IS ON LINE         */ 00172000
         LTR   UCBPTR,UCBPTR                                    02S0081 00173000
         BZ    @RF00081                                         02S0081 00174000
         TM    UCBONLI(UCBPTR),B'10000000'                      02S0081 00175000
         BNO   @RF00081                                         02S0081 00176000
*    DO;                               /* THEN, BUILD RECORD ENTRY   */ 00177000
*      DUPBIT='0'B;                    /* ASSUME UCB NOT DUP ENTRY   */ 00178000
         NI    DUPBIT,B'01111111'                               02S0083 00179000
*      IF UCBALTPH='1'B &              /* IF MORE THAN ONE PATH 02S0084 00180000
*                                         AVAILABLE TO  THIS UCB AND */ 00181000
*         UCBINDXÂ¬=1 THEN              /* THIS IS NOT FIRST UCB      */ 00182000
         TM    UCBALTPH(UCBPTR),B'00000001'                     02S0084 00183000
         BNO   @RF00084                                         02S0084 00184000
         LA    @10,1                                            02S0084 00185000
         CR    UCBINDX,@10                                      02S0084 00186000
         BE    @RF00084                                         02S0084 00187000
*        DO;                           /* SEE IF ALREADY PROCEESED   */ 00188000
*          DO UCBINDX1=1 TO UCBINDX-1 WHILE(DUPBIT='0'B);    /* CHECK   00189000
*                                         IF UCB ALREADY PROCESSED   */ 00190000
         LR    UCBINDX1,@10                                     02S0086 00191000
         B     @DE00086                                         02S0086 00192000
@DL00086 TM    DUPBIT,B'10000000'                               02S0086 00193000
         BNZ   @DC00086                                         02S0086 00194000
*            IF UCBTBL(UCBINDX)=UCBTBL(UCBINDX1) THEN /* IF YES,     */ 00195000
         LR    @10,UCBINDX                                      02S0087 00196000
         ALR   @10,@10                                          02S0087 00197000
         L     @09,@PC00001+4                                   02S0087 00198000
         L     @09,CVTPTR(,@09)                                 02S0087 00199000
         L     @09,CVTILK2(,@09)                                02S0087 00200000
         LR    @02,UCBINDX1                                     02S0087 00201000
         ALR   @02,@02                                          02S0087 00202000
         BCTR  @10,0                                            02S0087 00203000
         BCTR  @10,0                                            02S0087 00204000
         LH    @10,UCBTBL(@10,@09)                              02S0087 00205000
         BCTR  @09,0                                            02S0087 00206000
         BCTR  @09,0                                            02S0087 00207000
         CH    @10,UCBTBL(@02,@09)                              02S0087 00208000
         BNE   @RF00087                                         02S0087 00209000
*              DUPBIT='1'B;            /* THEN INDICATE DUP UCB ENTRY*/ 00210000
         OI    DUPBIT,B'10000000'                               02S0088 00211000
*          END;                                                 02S0089 00212000
@RF00087 AH    UCBINDX1,@CH00062                                02S0089 00213000
@DE00086 LR    @10,UCBINDX                                      02S0089 00214000
         BCTR  @10,0                                            02S0089 00215000
         CR    UCBINDX1,@10                                     02S0089 00216000
         BNH   @DL00086                                         02S0089 00217000
@DC00086 DS    0H                                               02S0090 00218000
*        END;                                                   02S0090 00219000

*/*                                                           @Y02651*/ 00304000
*/*SEGMENT NAME= BLDREC22                                     @Y02651*/ 00305000
*/*                                                           @Y02651*/ 00306000
*/*DESCRIPTIVE NAME=  RECORD TYPE 22 PROCESSOR                @Y02651*/ 00307000
*/*                                                           @Y02651*/ 00308000
*/*FUNCTION=                                                  @Y02651*/ 00309000
*/*  THIS SEGMENT BUILDS AND ISSUES REORD TYPE 22.            @Y02651*/ 00310000
*/*  THIS RECORD REFLECTS THE STATUS OF STORAGE, CPU'S        @Y02651*/ 00311000
*/*  AND CHANNELS PER CPU AT IPL TIME.                        @Y02651*/ 00312000
*/*                                                           @Y02651*/ 00313000
*/*  OPERATION=                                               @Y02651*/ 00314000
*/*    THE PHYSICAL CONFIGURATION COMMUNICATION VECTOR        @Y02651*/ 00315000
*/*    TABLE (PCCVT) IS USED TO OBTAIN INFORMATION ABOUT      @Y02651*/ 00316000
*/*    ONLINE CPUS. THE PCCVT POINTS TO A PCCA FOR EACH       @Y02651*/ 00317000
*/*    POSSIBLE CPU. IF THE CPU WAS NOT ONLINE AT IPL TIME,   @Y02651*/ 00318000
*/*    THE PCCVT POINTER TO THAT CPU WILL BE ZERO.            @Y02651*/ 00319000
*/*    THE CPU ADDRESS (0,1,2, ETC.) IS USED AS AN INDEX INTO @Y02651*/ 00320000
*/*    THIS PCCVT.                                            @Y02651*/ 00321000
*/*    FOR EACH NON ZERO TABLE ENTRY A CPU ENTRY              @Y02651*/ 00322000
*/*    WILL BE CONSTRUCTED.                                   @Y02651*/ 00323000
*/*    THE PHYSICAL CONFIGURATION COMMUNICATION AREA (PCCA)   @Y02651*/ 00324000
*/*    IS THEN EXAMINED FOR CHANNEL INFORMATION.              @Y02651*/ 00325000
*/*    THE PCCA CONTAINS A CHANNEL AVAILABILITY TABLE (CAT)   @Y02651*/ 00326000
*/*    WHICH CONTAINS INFORMATION ABOUT THE CHANNELS ON THAT  @Y02651*/ 00327000
*/*    CPU:                                                   @Y02651*/ 00328000
*/*    . ONLINE INDICATOR                                     @Y02651*/ 00329000
*/*    . CHANNEL TYPE                                         @Y02651*/ 00330000
*/*    . CHANNEL MODULE NUMBER                                @Y02651*/ 00331000
*/*    . CHANNEL ADDRESS (RELATIVE OFFSET INTO CAT)           @Y02651*/ 00332000
*/*    FOR EACH CHANNEL MARKED AS ONLINE A CHANNEL ENTRY IN   @Y02651*/ 00333000
*/*    RECORD 22 IS CONSTRUCTED.                              @Y02651*/ 00334000
*/*                                                           @Y02651*/ 00335000
*/*ENTRY POINT= IN-LINE SEGMENT                               @Y02651*/ 00336000
*/*  INPUT=                                                   @Y02651*/ 00337000
*/*    RECORD   - BUFFER TO BUILD RECORD IN                   @Y02651*/ 00338000
*/*    PCCAVT   - PAGE PCCA VECTOR TABLE                      @Y02651*/ 00339000
*/*    PCCA     - PHYSICAL CCA AREA FOR EACH CPU              @Y02651*/ 00340000
*/*    CAT      - CHANNEL AVAILABILITY TABLE (IN PCCA)        @Y02651*/ 00341000
*/*                                                           @Y02651*/ 00342000
*/*EXIT=                                                      @Y02651*/ 00343000
*/*  CONDITION= NORMAL, RECORD TYPE 22 IS BUILT AND ISSUED    @Y02651*/ 00344000
*/*  OUTPUT= THE TYPE 22 RECORD ISSUED                        @Y02651*/ 00345000
*/*  RETURN CODE= NONE                                        @Y02651*/ 00346000
*/*                                                           @Y02651*/ 00347000
*/********************************************************************/ 00348000
*SMF22LEN=LENGTH(SMFRCD22);            /* BASIC LEN RECORD 22 @Y02651*/ 00349000

*/*                                                           @Y02651*/ 00467000
*/*SEGMENT NAME= BLDRSTOR                                     @Y02651*/ 00468000
*/*                                                           @Y02651*/ 00469000
*/*DESCRIPTIVE NAME= BUILD STORAGE ELEMENTS FOR RECORD 22     @Y02651*/ 00470000
*/*                                                           @Y02651*/ 00471000
*/*FUNCTION=                                                  @Y02651*/ 00472000
*/*  THIS SEGMENT BUILDS THE STORAGE ELEMENT PORTION          @Y02651*/ 00473000
*/*  OF RECORD TYPE 22. THE STORAGE ELEMENT CONTAINS          @Y02651*/ 00474000
*/*  INFORMATION PERTAINNING TO THE BEGINNING AND ENDING      @Y02651*/ 00475000
*/*  PAGES OF AN ONLINE SECTION OF REAL CORE.                 @Y02651*/ 00476000
*/*                                                           @Y02651*/ 00477000
*/*  OPERATION=                                               @Y02651*/ 00478000
*/*    STORAGE ELEMENTS FOR EACH CONTIGUOUS BLOCK OF ONLINE   @Y02651*/ 00479000
*/*    STORAGE ARE CONSTRUCTED FROM INFORMATION RETURNED      @Y02651*/ 00480000
*/*    BY REAL STORAGE MANAGEMENT (RSM) RECONFIGURATION       @Y02651*/ 00481000
*/*    ROUTINE. A PARAMETER LIST CONTAINING ONE BYTE FOR EACH @Y02651*/ 00482000
*/*    PAGE OF REAL STORAGE IS OBTAINED FOR RSM, USING THE CVT@Y02651*/ 00483000
*/*    HIGHEST REAL CORE ADDRESS FIELD TO DETERMINE THE NUMBER@Y02651*/ 00484000
*/*    REAL PAGES. RSM IS CALLED TO FILL IN THE PARAMETER LIST@Y02651*/ 00485000
*/*    WITH INFORMATION ABOUT ALL REAL PAGES. UPON RETURN, THE@Y02651*/ 00486000
*/*    PARAMETER LIST IS SCANNED TO FIND THE FIRST ONLINE PAGE@Y02651*/ 00487000
*/*    AND THE NEXT OFFLINE PAGE. THIS DETERMINES THE RANGE OF@Y02651*/ 00488000
*/*    A CONTIGUOUS BLOCK OF ONLINE STORAGE. THE RELATIVE     @Y02651*/ 00489000
*/*    INDEX OF THE BYTE INDICATING ONLINE/OFFLINE IS USED    @Y02651*/ 00490000
*/*    TO CALCULATE FIRST PAGE NUMBER AND NUMBER OF PAGES FOR @Y02651*/ 00491000
*/*    THIS STORAGE ENTRY.                                    @Y02651*/ 00492000
*/*    THE ABOVE SCAN IS REPEATED UNTIL ALL BYTES OR PAGES    @Y02651*/ 00493000
*/*    HAVE BEEN PROCESSED.                                   @Y02651*/ 00494000
*/*                                                           @Y02651*/ 00495000
*/*ENTRY POINT= IN-LINE SEGMENT                               @Y02651*/ 00496000
*/*  INPUT=                                                   @Y02651*/ 00497000
*/*    ELEMTPR  - PONITER TO THE NEXT ELEMENT ENTRY IN REC 22 @Y02651*/ 00498000
*/*    CVTEORM  - HIGHEST POSSIBLE REAL STORAGE ADDRESS       @Y02651*/ 00499000
*/*    RSMSLST  - LIST OF BYTES SET UP BY RSM, DESCRIBING THE @Y02651*/ 00500000
*/*               ONLINE/OFFLINE STATUS OF ALL REAL FRAMES    @Y02651*/ 00501000
*/*                                                           @Y02651*/ 00502000
*/*EXIT=                                                      @Y02651*/ 00503000
*/*  CONDITION= NORMAL, STORAGE ELEMENTS HAVE BEEN CONSTRUCTED@Y02651*/ 00504000
*/*  OUTPUT= THE STORAGE ELEMENTS HAVE BEEN ADDED TO RECORD 22@Y02651*/ 00505000
*/*  RETURN CODE= NONE                                        @Y02651*/ 00506000
*/*                                                           @Y02651*/ 00507000
*/*  CONDITION= ERROR, NON-ZERO RETURN CODE FROM RSM (IEAVRFC)@Y02651*/ 00508000
*/*  OUTPUT= NONE                                             @Y02651*/ 00509000
*/*  RETURN CODE= NONE                                        @Y02651*/ 00510000
*/*                                                           @Y02651*/ 00511000
*/********************************************************************/ 00512000
*RFY R1 RSTD;                          /* GET REGISTER CONTROL@Y02651*/ 00513000
*R1=LENGTH(RSMLIST)+PVTLPFN/16+1;      /* LEN OF RSM PARM LIST@Y02651*/ 00514000
         L     @10,@PC00001+4                                   03S0162 00515000
         L     @10,CVTPTR(,@10)                                 03S0162 00516000
         L     @10,CVTPVTP(,@10)                                03S0162 00517000

*GEN(GETMAIN  R,SP=253,LV=(R1));       /* GET RSM PARM CORE   @Y02651*/ 00522000

*RSMPTR=R1;                            /* SAVE ADDR RSM LIST  @Y02651*/ 00524000

*RSMLIST=RSMLIST&&RSMLIST;             /* INIT RSM LIST TO 0'S@Y02651*/ 00527000
         XC    RSMLIST(16,RSMPTR),RSMLIST(RSMPTR)               03S0166 00528000

./  ADD  SSI=62090414,NAME=IEEMB825

@MAINENT DS    0H                                               01S0001 00004000

         DROP  @15                                                      00009000

         USING @PSTART,@12                                      01S0001 00012000
*R9=R14;                               /* SAVE RETURN ADDRESS        */ 00013000
         LR    R9,R14                                           01S0021 00014000
*RFY R14 UNRSTD;                       /* RELEASE REGISTER CONTROL   */ 00015000
*IF R0=12 THEN                         /* IF NO STAE AREA PASSED     */ 00016000

*  DO;                                 /* THEN GET INFO FROM REGS    */ 00019000
*    R8=R2;                            /* PARMAREA ADDR IS IN REG 2  */ 00020000

*    ABENDCDE=R1;                      /* ABEND CODE IN REG 1        */ 00022000

*    WKAREA='0'B;                      /* NO AREA PASSED INDICATOR   */ 00024000

*  END;                                                         01S0028 00026000
*ELSE                                                           01S0029 00027000
*  DO;                                 /* AREA PASSED                */ 00028000

*    R8=R1->SDWAPARM;                  /* PARM AREA ADDR             */ 00031000

*/*  CONDITION= NORMAL, DUMP TAKEN                                   */ 00071000

*/********************************************************************/ 00230000
*/*                                                                  */ 00231000
*/*SEGMENT NAME= SVCCLNUP                                            */ 00232000
*/*                                                                  */ 00233000
*/*DESCRIPTIVE NAME= CLEANUP SVC IF WAITING FOR WRITER               */ 00234000
*/*                                                                  */ 00235000
*/*FUNCTION=                                                         */ 00236000
*/*  THIS SEGMENT WILL CLEANUP THE FOR THE SVC, IF ONE IS            */ 00237000
*/*  CURRENTLY WAITING FOR THE SMF WRITER. THIS CLEANUP INVOLVES     */ 00238000
*/*  POSTING THE SVC OUT OF ITS WAIT.                                */ 00239000
*/*                                                                  */ 00240000
*/*  OPERATION=                                                      */ 00241000
*/*    TO DETERMINE IF THERE IS A NEED TO PERFORM POST (SVC          */ 00242000
*/*    WAITING), AN ENQ ON THE SMF BUFFER RESOURCE WILL BE ISSUED.   */ 00243000
*/*    IF THE RESOURCE IS OBTAINED, THERE IS OBVIOUSLY NO SVC        */ 00244000
*/*    PERFORMING RECORD PROCESSING, AND THEREFORE CANNOT BE         */ 00245000
*/*    WAITING FOR THE WRITER.                                       */ 00246000
*/*    THIS ASSUMS THAT WHENEVER THE SVC IS WAITING, IT IS           */ 00247000
*/*    HOLDING THE SMF BUFFER RESOURCE.                              */ 00248000
*/*                                                                  */ 00249000
*/*ENTRY= IN-LINE SEGMENT                                            */ 00250000
*/*  PURPOSE= SEE FUNCTION                                           */ 00251000
*/*  INPUT=                                                          */ 00252000
*/*    SMCAASCB - ASCB ADDRESS OF THE SMF SVC.                       */ 00253000
*/*    SMCABECB - ECB THAT THE SVC IS WAITING ON.                    */ 00254000
*/*    IEEMB827 - XMPOST ERROR EXIT ROUTINE                          */ 00255000
*/*                                                                  */ 00256000
*/*EXITS=                                                            */ 00257000
*/*  CONDITION= NORMAL, THE SVC IS POSTED TO START.                  */ 00258000
*/*  OUTPUT=                                                         */ 00259000
*/*    SMCABECB - POSTED                                             */ 00260000
*/*  RETURN CODES= NONE                                              */ 00261000
*/*                                                                  */ 00262000
*/*  CONDITION= NORMAL, THE SVC WAS NOT WAITING AND THEREFORE        */ 00263000
*/*        NOT POSTED.                                               */ 00264000
*/*  OUTPUT= NONE                                                    */ 00265000
*/*  RETURN CODES= NONE                                              */ 00266000
*/*                                                                  */ 00267000
*/********************************************************************/ 00268000

         DC    AL3(@ENDDATD-@DATD)                                      00216000
         DS    0D                                                       00217000
IEEMB827 CSECT                                                          00218000
         DS   0H                                                        00219000
PATCH827 DC (50)X'00'                                                   00220000
@DATD    DSECT                                                          00221000
         ORG   *+1-(*-@DATD)/(*-@DATD) INSURE DSECT DATA                00222000
@ENDDATD EQU   *                                                        00223000

./  ADD  SSI=61180591,NAME=IEEMB829
         TITLE 'IEEMB829 - SMF RECORD WRITER                           *00001000
                        '                                               00002000

@MAINENT DS    0H                                                  0001 00004000
         USING *,@15                                               0001 00005000

         DC    C'IEEMB829  76.118'                                 0001 00008000
         DROP  @15                                                      00009000
@PROLOG  STM   @14,@12,12(@13)                                     0001 00010000
         BALR  @12,0                                               0001 00011000
@PSTART  DS    0H                                                  0001 00012000
         USING @PSTART,@12                                         0001 00013000
         L     @00,@SIZDATD                                        0001 00014000
         GETMAIN  R,LV=(0)                                              00015000
         LR    @11,@01                                             0001 00016000
         USING @DATD,@11                                           0001 00017000
         ST    @13,@SA00001+4                                      0001 00018000
         LM    @00,@01,20(@13)                                     0001 00019000
         ST    @11,8(,@13)                                         0001 00020000
         LR    @13,@11                                             0001 00021000
JSCBDISP EQU 188                                                        00022000

JSCBAOS2 EQU 192                                                        00024000
*SMCAPTR=CVTSMCA;                      /* SET SMCA BASE POINTER      */ 00025000

         L     SMCAPTR,CVTSMCA(,@10)                               0081 00027000
*RESPECIFY SMCABASE BASED(SMCAPTR);                                0082 00028000
*MSGSWS=MSGSWS && MSGSWS;              /* INITIALIZE MSG SWITCHES    */ 00029000
         XC    MSGSWS(1),MSGSWS                                    0083 00030000
