*            IF SMCAFIRT='1'B THEN     /* IF INITIAL OPEN OF SMF DATA   01700000
*                                         SETS THEN SAVE TTR OF LAST */ 01701000
         TM    SMCAFIRT(SMCAPTR),B'00010000'                       0526 01702000
         BNO   @RF00526                                            0526 01703000
*              TTRS(TTRINDEX)=DS1LSTAR; /* BLK WRITTEN ON D.S.(GOTTEN   01704000
*                                         FROM DSCB VIA OBTAIN)      */ 01705000
         SLR   @14,@14                                             0527 01706000
         IC    @14,TTRINDEX                                        0527 01707000
         MH    @14,@CH00115                                        0527 01708000
         LA    @10,TTRS-3(@14)                                     0527 01709000
         LA    @14,OBTPOOL                                         0527 01710000
         MVC   0(3,@10),DS1LSTAR-44(@14)                           0527 01711000
*            IF SMCAFIRT='1'B | DS1LSTAR=0 THEN  /* IF INITIAL OPEN OR  01712000
*                                         DATA SET SWITCHING & D.S.  */ 01713000
@RF00526 TM    SMCAFIRT(SMCAPTR),B'00010000'                       0528 01714000
         BO    @RT00528                                            0528 01715000
         LA    @14,OBTPOOL                                         0528 01716000
         ICM   @10,7,DS1LSTAR-44(@14)                              0528 01717000
         BNZ   @RF00528                                            0528 01718000
@RT00528 DS    0H                                                  0529 01719000
*              DO;                     /* EMPTY THEN...              */ 01720000
*                IF DS1LSTAR=0 THEN    /* IF D.S. EMPTY THEN TURN ON */ 01721000
         LA    @14,OBTPOOL                                         0530 01722000
         ICM   @10,7,DS1LSTAR-44(@14)                              0530 01723000
         BNZ   @RF00530                                            0530 01724000
*                  SMCAPMTY='1'B;      /* THE EMPTY BIT IN SMCA.     */ 01725000
         OI    SMCAPMTY(SMCAPTR),B'00010000'                       0531 01726000
*                RESPECIFY (REG0,REG1,REG2) RESTRICTED;            0532 01727000
@RF00530 DS    0H                                                  0533 01728000
*                REG2=SMCAPDCB;        /* GET DCB ADDRESS FOR OPEN   */ 01729000
         L     REG2,SMCAPDCB(,SMCAPTR)                             0533 01730000
*                GENERATE;                                         0534 01731000
         OPEN ((REG2),(OUTPUT)),MF=(E,OPENLIST),TYPE=J                  01732000
*                RESPECIFY (REG0,REG1,REG2) UNRESTRICTED;          0535 01733000
*                IF DCBOFOPN='1'B THEN /* IF THE OPEN DID NOT FAIL 0536 01734000
*                                         THEN TURN OFF THE 'DEVICE  */ 01735000
         L     @14,SMCAPDCB(,SMCAPTR)                              0536 01736000
         TM    DCBOFOPN+40(@14),B'00010000'                        0536 01737000
         BNO   @RF00536                                            0536 01738000
*                  SMCAPNAV='0'B;      /* NOT AVAILABLE' BIT IN SMCA */ 01739000
         NI    SMCAPNAV(SMCAPTR),B'01111111'                       0537 01740000
*                ELSE                  /* IF OPEN FAILED THEN TURN   */ 01741000
*                  SMCAOPFL='1'B;      /* ON OPEN FLAG BIT IN SMCA   */ 01742000
         B     @RC00536                                            0538 01743000
@RF00536 OI    SMCAOPFL(SMCAPTR),B'00100000'                       0538 01744000
*              END;                                                0539 01745000
@RC00536 DS    0H                                                  0540 01746000
*          END;                                                    0540 01747000
@RF00528 DS    0H                                                  0541 01748000
*        RESPECIFY REG15 UNRESTRICTED;                             0541 01749000
@RC00523 DS    0H                                                  0542 01750000
*      END;                            /*                    @YM02763*/ 01751000
*  END;                                                            0543 01752000
*END SMFOPEN;                                                      0544 01753000
@EL00006 DS    0H                                                  0544 01754000
@EF00006 DS    0H                                                  0544 01755000
@ER00006 LM    @14,@12,@SA00006                                    0544 01756000
         BR    @14                                                 0544 01757000
*DSSWITCH: PROCEDURE;                                              0545 01758000
DSSWITCH STM   @14,@12,@SA00007                                    0545 01759000
*/********************************************************************/ 01760000
*/*                                                                  */ 01761000
*/*SEGMENT NAME= DSSWITCH                                            */ 01762000
*/*                                                                  */ 01763000
*/*DESCRIPTIVE NAME= DATA SET SWITCHING SEGMENT                      */ 01764000
*/*                                                                  */ 01765000
*/*FUNCTION= THE FUNCTION OF DSSWITCH IS TO SWITCH RECORDING FROM    */ 01766000
*/*          ONE SMF DATA SET TO THE OTHER SMF DATA SET.  THIS IS    */ 01767000
*/*          ACCOMPLISHED BY THE FOLLOWING:                          */ 01768000
*/*          1.  THE SMFOPEN ROUTINE IS CALLED TO CLOSE THE DATA SET */ 01769000
*/*              CURRENTLY BEING RECORDED ON AND OPEN THE OTHER DATA */ 01770000
*/*              SET FOR RECORDING.                                  */ 01771000
*/*          2.  IF SMFOPEN ROUTINE WAS SUCCESSFUL (SMCAPNAV=OFF),   */ 01772000
*/*              THEN A RECORDING MESSAGE IS ISSUED FOR THE OPENED   */ 01773000
*/*              DATA SET.  ALSO, THE NUMBER OF BUFFER SIZE SEGMENTS */ 01774000
*/*              WHICH WILL FIT ON A TRACK OF THE NEW DATA SET IS    */ 01775000
*/*              CALCULATED BY CALLING THE BLKCALC ROUTINE.          */ 01776000
*/*          3.  IF THE SMFOPEN ROUTINE WAS UNSUCCESSFUL, THEN THE   */ 01777000
*/*              DISASTER BIT IN SMCA (SMCADSTR) IS SET ON, THE      */ 01778000
*/*              DISASTER COUNT (SMCADSCT) IS SET TO ZERO, THE TIME  */ 01779000
*/*              AND DATE OF THE DISASTER (VIA TIME SVC) IS PLACED IN*/ 01780000
*/*              SMCA (SMCADSTM) AND A DATA LOST MESSAGE IS ISSUED.  */ 01781000
*/*                                                                  */ 01782000
*/*  OPERATION= NO SPECIAL ALGORITHMS ARE USED                       */ 01783000
*/*                                                                  */ 01784000
*/*ENTRY POINT= DSSWITCH                                             */ 01785000
*/*  INPUT= NONE                                                     */ 01786000
*/*                                                                  */ 01787000
*/*EXITS=                                                            */ 01788000
*/*  CONDITION= NORMAL- RECORDING SWITCHED TO THE OTHER SMF DATA SET */ 01789000
*/*  OUTPUT=                                                         */ 01790000
*/*    MESSAGE IEE360I- SMF NOW RECORDING.....                       */ 01791000
*/*  RETURN CODES= NONE                                              */ 01792000
*/*                                                                  */ 01793000
*/*  CONDITION= SWITCH UNSUCCESSFUL-DATA SET NOT AVAILABLE           */ 01794000
*/*    OUTPUT= IF NOT ALREADY IN DISASTER MODE                       */ 01795000
*/*      SMCADSTR- DISASTER BIT SET ON INDICATING DATA LOST MODE     */ 01796000
*/*      SMCADSCT- RECORD LOST COUNT INITIALIZED TO ZERO             */ 01797000
*/*      SMCADSTM- TIME AND DATE OF DISASTER                         */ 01798000
*/*      MESSAGE IEE361I- SMF DATA LOST.....                         */ 01799000
*/*                                                                  */ 01800000
*/********************************************************************/ 01801000
*CALL SMFOPEN;                         /* CLOSE CUR D.S.& OPEN OTHER */ 01802000
         BAL   @14,SMFOPEN                                         0546 01803000
*IF SMCAPNAV='0'B THEN                 /* IF THE OPEN WAS SUCCESSFUL */ 01804000
         TM    SMCAPNAV(SMCAPTR),B'10000000'                       0547 01805000
         BNZ   @RF00547                                            0547 01806000
*  DO;                                                             0548 01807000
*    POSTCODE='1'B;                    /* INDICATE SWITCH TOOK PLACE */ 01808000
         OI    POSTCODE,B'00001000'                                0549 01809000
*    IF SMCADSTR='0'B THEN             /* IF NOT ENTERED DURING DSTR */ 01810000
         TM    SMCADSTR(SMCAPTR),B'01000000'                       0550 01811000
         BNZ   @RF00550                                            0550 01812000
*      DO;                             /* THEN ISSUE THE RECORDING   */ 01813000
*        RECGMSG='1'B;                 /* MESSAGE FOR NEW DATA SET,  */ 01814000
         OI    RECGMSG,B'00010000'                                 0552 01815000
*        CALL WRITEMSG;                /* IEE360I SMF RECORDING..... */ 01816000
         BAL   @14,WRITEMSG                                        0553 01817000
*      END;                                                        0554 01818000
*    CALL BLKCALC;                     /* CALL THE ROUTINE TO COMPUTE*/ 01819000
@RF00550 BAL   @14,BLKCALC                                         0555 01820000
*  END;                                /* THE NO. OF BUF SIZE SEGMENTS  01821000
*                                         WHICH WILL FIT ON A TRACK  */ 01822000
*ELSE                                  /* IF THE OPEN FAILED DO THE  */ 01823000
*  DO;                                 /* FOLLOWING                  */ 01824000
         B     @RC00547                                            0557 01825000
@RF00547 DS    0H                                                  0558 01826000
*    IF SMCADSTR='0'B THEN             /* IF A DISASTER HAS NOT PRE-    01827000
*                                         VIOUSLY OCCURRED, THEN     */ 01828000
         TM    SMCADSTR(SMCAPTR),B'01000000'                       0558 01829000
         BNZ   @RF00558                                            0558 01830000
*      DO;                             /* TURN ON THE DISASTER INDI- */ 01831000
*        SMCADSTR='1'B;                /* CATOR BIT IN SMCA, SET THE */ 01832000
         OI    SMCADSTR(SMCAPTR),B'01000000'                       0560 01833000
*        SMCADSCT=0;                   /* DISASTER COUNT TO ZERO     */ 01834000
         SLR   @10,@10                                             0561 01835000
         ST    @10,SMCADSCT(,SMCAPTR)                              0561 01836000
*        RESPECIFY (REG0,REG1) RESTRICTED;                         0562 01837000
*        GEN (TIME BIN);               /* ISSUE TIME SVC             */ 01838000
         TIME BIN                                                       01839000
*        DSTRTIME(2)=REG0;             /* DISASTER TIME IN SMCADSTM  */ 01840000
         LA    @10,108                                             0564 01841000
         ALR   @10,SMCAPTR                                         0564 01842000
         ST    REG0,DSTRTIME+4(,@10)                               0564 01843000
*        DSTRTIME(1)=REG1;             /* DISASTER DATE IN SMCADSTM  */ 01844000
         ST    REG1,DSTRTIME(,@10)                                 0565 01845000
*        RESPECIFY (REG0,REG1) UNRESTRICTED;                       0566 01846000
*        LOSTMSG='1'B;                 /* SET LOST MSG INDICATOR     */ 01847000
         OI    LOSTMSG,B'00100000'                                 0567 01848000
*        CALL WRITEMSG;                /* ISSUE THE RECORD LOST MSG  */ 01849000
         BAL   @14,WRITEMSG                                        0568 01850000
*      END;                                                        0569 01851000
*  END;                                                            0570 01852000
*END DSSWITCH;                                                     0571 01853000
@EL00007 DS    0H                                                  0571 01854000
@EF00007 DS    0H                                                  0571 01855000
@ER00007 LM    @14,@12,@SA00007                                    0571 01856000
         BR    @14                                                 0571 01857000
*SWRITERR:PROC OPTIONS(NOSAVE,NOSAVEAREA);                         0572 01858000
SWRITERR DS    0H                                                  0573 01859000
*/********************************************************************/ 01860000
*/*                                                                  */ 01861000
*/*SEGMENT NAME= SWRITERR                                            */ 01862000
*/*                                                                  */ 01863000
*/*DESCRIPTIVE NAME= I/O ERROR(SYNAD) HANDLER                        */ 01864000
*/*                                                                  */ 01865000
*/*FUNCTION=                                                         */ 01866000
*/*  RECEIVES CONTROL IN THE EVENT OF AN I/O ERROR DURING A WRITE    */ 01867000
*/*  TO AN SMF DATA SET. AN I/O ERROR INDICATOR IS SET TO BE CHECKED */ 01868000
*/*  BY BWRITER.                                                     */ 01869000
*/*                                                                  */ 01870000
*/*  OPERATION= NO SPECIAL ALGORITHMS ARE USED                       */ 01871000
*/*                                                                  */ 01872000
*/*ENTRY POINT= SWRITERR                                             */ 01873000
*/*  INPUT= NONE                                                     */ 01874000
*/*                                                                  */ 01875000
*/*EXITS=                                                            */ 01876000
*/*  CONDITION= I/O ERROR INDICATOR SET                              */ 01877000
*/*  OUTPUT=                                                         */ 01878000
*/*    WRITSTAT- SET ON TO INDICATE I/O ERROR OCCURRED               */ 01879000
*/*  RETURN CODES= NONE                                              */ 01880000
*/*                                                                  */ 01881000
*/********************************************************************/ 01882000
*WRITSTAT='1'B;                        /* INDICATE I/O ERROR         */ 01883000
         OI    WRITSTAT,B'00000001'                                0573 01884000
*END SWRITERR;                                                     0574 01885000
@EL00008 DS    0H                                                  0574 01886000
@EF00008 DS    0H                                                  0574 01887000

*INVKEXIT: PROC;                                          /* @Z40FPPF*/ 01889000

*/********************************************************************/ 01891000
*/*                                                                  */ 01892000
*/* SEGMENT NAME - INVKEXIT                                  @Z40FPPF*/ 01893000
*/*                                                          @Z40FPPF*/ 01894000
*/* DESCRIPTIVE NAME - USER EXIT INTERFACE                   @Z40FPPF*/ 01895000
*/*                                                          @Z40FPPF*/ 01896000
*/* FUNCTION - TO SETUP A PARAMETER LIST FOR AND INVOKE      @Z40FPPF*/ 01897000
*/*            SMF WRITER EXIT IEFU29                        @Z40FPPF*/ 01898000

*/*                                                          @Z40FPPF*/ 01901000

*/* EXIT - NORMAL - (INLINE SUBROUTINE - EXITS AT BOTTOM)    @Z40FPPF*/ 01910000
*/*                                                          @Z40FPPF*/ 01911000
*/*   CONDITION - EXIT INVOKED AND RETURNED SUCCESSFULLY     @Z40FPPF*/ 01912000
*/*                                                          @Z40FPPF*/ 01913000

*/*                                                          @Z40FPPF*/ 01915000

*U29DSNP = ADDR(SMFDSN);                /*PTR TO DSN         @Z40FPPF*/ 01919000
         LA    @10,SMFDSN                                          0576 01920000
         ST    @10,U29DSNP                                         0576 01921000
*DSNBASE = SMFBASEN;                    /*ASSIGN DSN BASE    @Z40FPPF*/ 01922000

         MVC   DSNTYPE(1),SMCAYORX(SMCAPTR)                        0578 01926000
*RFY (REG1) RSTD;                       /*                   @Z40FPPF*/ 01927000
*REG1 = ADDR(U29PARMS);                 /*PTR TO EXIT PARM LIST    0580 01928000
*                                                            @Z40FPPF*/ 01929000
         LA    REG1,U29PARMS                                       0580 01930000
*CALL IEFU29;                           /*CALL TO IEFU29 EXIT@Z40FPPF*/ 01931000
         L     @15,@CV00080                                        0581 01932000
         BALR  @14,@15                                             0581 01933000
*RFY (REG1) UNRSTD;                     /*                   @Z40FPPF*/ 01934000
*END INVKEXIT;                          /*                   @Z40FPPF*/ 01935000
@EL00009 DS    0H                                                  0583 01936000

TTRS     DS    2CL3                                                     02110000
IEEMB829 CSECT                                                          02111000
         DS    0F                                                       02112000
@SIZDATD DC    AL1(0)                                                   02113000
         DC    AL3(@ENDDATD-@DATD)                                      02114000

*                  DO;                 /* BYTES CHECK TO SEE IF HALT    00352000
*                                         PROCESSING HAS BEEN REQ'D  */ 00353000
*/********************************************************************/ 00354000
*/*                                                                  */ 00355000
*/*SEGMENT NAME= HALTREC                                             */ 00356000
*/*                                                                  */ 00357000
*/*DESCRIPTIVE NAME= HALT RECORD PROCESSOR                           */ 00358000
*/*                                                                  */ 00359000
*/*FUNCTION=                                                         */ 00360000
*/*  ENTER HERE FOR RECORDS WHOSE LENGTH IS LESS THAN 18 BYTES.      */ 00361000
*/*  CHECK FOR 'HALT' IN POSITIONS 5-8 IN THE RECORD AND IF NOT      */ 00362000
*/*  NOT FOUND PASS ERROR RETURN CODE TO MAIN SEGMENT. IF THIS IS    */ 00363000
*/*  A HALT RECORD THE CURRENT BUFFER IS FLUSHED TO THE DATA SET IF  */ 00364000
*/*  IT CONTAINS ANY RECORDS. SMF WRITER (IEEMB829) IS THEN POSTED   */ 00365000
*/*  TO PERFORM A DATA SET SWITCH. IF SWITCHING HAS ALREADY OCCURRED */ 00366000
*/*  DUE TO RECOVERY FROM DISASTER OR AS A RESULT OF FLUSHING THE    */ 00367000
*/*  BUFFER, THEN BYPASS SWITCHING FOR HALT.                         */ 00368000
*/*                                                                  */ 00369000
*/*  OPERATION= NO SPECIAL ALGORITHMS ARE USED                       */ 00370000
*/*                                                                  */ 00371000
*/*ENTRY POINT= IN-LINE SEGMENT                                      */ 00372000
*/*  INPUT=                                                          */ 00373000
*/*    SMF/USER RECORD LESS THAN 18 BYTES LONG                       */ 00374000
*/*    CURRENT SMF BUFFER                                            */ 00375000
*/*    DATASETS- SWITCH INDICATING WHETHER DATA SET SWITCH OCCURRED  */ 00376000
*/*                                                                  */ 00377000
*/*EXITS=                                                            */ 00378000
*/*  CONDITION= NORMAL- IEEMB829 POSTED TO SWITCH DATA SETS          */ 00379000
*/*  OUTPUT= NONE                                                    */ 00380000
*/*  RETURN CODES= NONE                                              */ 00381000
*/*                                                                  */ 00382000
*/*  CONDITION= RECORD LESS THAN 18 BYTES AND NOT A HALT RECORD      */ 00383000
*/*  OUTPUT= NONE                                                    */ 00384000
*/*  RETURN CODES= RETURN CODE SET TO 8                              */ 00385000
*/*                                                                  */ 00386000
*/********************************************************************/ 00387000
*IF USEREC(5:8)='HALT' THEN            /* IF RECORD CONTAINS 'HALT'  */ 00388000
         CLC   USEREC+4(4,RECPTR),@CC02011                      02S0159 00389000
         BNE   @RF00159                                         02S0159 00390000
*  DO;                                 /* THEN A SWITCH WAS REQUESTED*/ 00391000
*    IF DATASETSÂ¬='1'B THEN            /* DID SWITCH ALREADY OCCUR?  */ 00392000
         TM    DATASETS,B'10000000'                             02S0161 00393000
         BO    @RF00161                                         02S0161 00394000
*      DO;                             /* NO, PROCESS HALT/EOD       */ 00395000
*        IF SMFBLOCK>4 THEN            /* FLUSH CURRENT BUFFER IF    */ 00396000
         LH    @10,SMFBLOCK(,BUFPTR)                            02S0163 00397000
         CH    @10,@CH00046                                     02S0163 00398000
         BNH   @RF00163                                         02S0163 00399000
*          DO;                         /* ANY RECORDS IN IT          */ 00400000
*            CALL EMPTYBUF;            /* FLUSH CURRENT BUFFER       */ 00401000
         BAL   @14,EMPTYBUF                                     02S0165 00402000
*          END;                                                 02S0166 00403000
*        IF RETCODE=0 & DATASETSÂ¬='1'B THEN         /* IF BUFFER WAS    00404000
*                                         FLUSHED TO SMF DATA SET    */ 00405000

         BO    @RF00167                                         02S0167 00409000
*          DO;                         /* OK AND NO SWITCHING TOOK   */ 00410000
*            SMCADSSW='1'B;            /* PLACE AS A RESULT, THEN    */ 00411000
         OI    SMCADSSW(SMCAPTR),B'00000001'                    02S0169 00412000
*            CALL POSTWAIT;            /* POST THE WRITER TO PERFORM */ 00413000
         BAL   @14,POSTWAIT                                     02S0170 00414000
*            SMCADSSW='0'B;            /* DATA SET SWITCHING         */ 00415000
         NI    SMCADSSW(SMCAPTR),B'11111110'                    02S0171 00416000
*          END;                                                 02S0172 00417000
*      END;                                                     02S0173 00418000
*  END;                                                         02S0174 00419000
*ELSE                                  /* SET RETURN CODE INDICATING */ 00420000
*  RETCODE=8;                          /* RECORD LESS THAN 18 BYTES  */ 00421000
         B     @RC00159                                         02S0175 00422000
@RF00159 MVC   RETCODE(4),@CF00093                              02S0175 00423000
*                  END;                                         01S0176 00424000
*                ELSE                                           01S0177 00425000
*                  DO;                 /* DO RECORD PROCESSING       */ 00426000
         B     @RC00157                                         01S0177 00427000
@RF00157 DS    0H                                               01S0178 00428000
*/********************************************************************/ 00429000
*/*                                                                  */ 00430000
*/*SEGMENT NAME= RECPROC                                             */ 00431000
*/*                                                                  */ 00432000
*/*DESCRIPTIVE NAME= SMF RECORD PROCESSOR                            */ 00433000
*/*                                                                  */ 00434000
*/*FUNCTION=                                                         */ 00435000
*/*  FIRST DETERMINES WHETHER THE BUFFER SHOULD BE FLUSHED BEFORE    */ 00436000
*/*  PROCESSING THE CURRENT RECORD, I.E. IF THE RECORD EXCEEDS THE   */ 00437000
*/*  AMOUNT OF SPACE LEFT IN THE BUFFER, EMPTYBUF IS CALLED TO FLUSH */ 00438000
*/*  THE CURRENT BUFFER. IF THE RECORD IS LARGER THAN THE SIZE OF    */ 00439000
*/*  AN EMPTY BUFFER RECORD SPLITTING IS INVOKED TO SEGMENT THE      */ 00440000
*/*  RECORD AND WRITE THE SEGMENTS TO THE SMF DATA SET. IF RECORD IS */ 00441000
*/*  NOT TOO LARGE THEN RECMOVE IS CALLED TO MOVE THE RECORD INTO    */ 00442000
*/*  CURRENT BUFFER.                                                 */ 00443000
*/*                                                                  */ 00444000
*/*  OPERATION= NO SPECIAL ALGORITHMS ARE USED                       */ 00445000
*/*                                                                  */ 00446000
*/*ENTRY POINT= IN-LINE SEGMENT                                      */ 00447000
*/*  INPUT=                                                          */ 00448000
*/*    SMF/USER RECORD                                               */ 00449000
*/*    SMF BUFFER                                                    */ 00450000
*/*    SMCABSIZ- SMF BUFFER SIZE                                     */ 00451000
*/*                                                                  */ 00452000
*/*EXITS=                                                            */ 00453000
*/*  CONDITION= NORMAL- SMF/USER RECORD MOVED TO SMF BUFFER          */ 00454000
*/*  OUTPUT=                                                         */ 00455000
*/*    SMF BUFFER- CONTAINS SMF RECORD OR THE LAST SEGMENT OF A      */ 00456000
*/*                SEGMENTED RECORD                                  */ 00457000
*/*  RETURN CODES= NONE                                              */ 00458000
*/*                                                                  */ 00459000
*/********************************************************************/ 00460000
*IF SMFBLOCK>4 & (RECORDLN>SMCABSIZ-4 |       /* IF RECORD EXCEEDS   */ 00461000
*  RECORDLN+SMFBLOCK>SMCABSIZ) THEN    /* BUFFER SIZE OR SPACE REMAIN-  00462000
*                                         ING IN BUFFER, WRITE BUFFER   00463000
*                                         IF ANYTHING IN IT          */ 00464000
         LA    @10,4                                            02S0178 00465000
         LH    @02,SMFBLOCK(,BUFPTR)                            02S0178 00466000
         CR    @02,@10                                          02S0178 00467000
         BNH   @RF00178                                         02S0178 00468000
         L     @15,RECORDLN                                     02S0178 00469000
         L     @14,SMCABSIZ(,SMCAPTR)                           02S0178 00470000
         LCR   @10,@10                                          02S0178 00471000
         ALR   @10,@14                                          02S0178 00472000
         CR    @15,@10                                          02S0178 00473000

         CR    @15,@14                                          02S0178 00476000

*  DO;                                                          02S0179 00479000
*    CALL EMPTYBUF;                    /* SMF BUFFER TO SMF DATA SET */ 00480000

*/********************************************************************/ 00482000
*/*                                                                  */ 00483000
*/*SEGMENT NAME= GETBUFR                                             */ 00484000
*/*                                                                  */ 00485000
*/*DESCRIPTIVE NAME= GET AN AVAILABLE BUFFER                         */ 00486000
*/*                                                                  */ 00487000
*/*FUNCTION=                                                         */ 00488000
*/*  SET UP THE POINTER TO THE HALF OF THE SMF BUFFER INTO WHICH     */ 00489000
*/*  RECORDS ARE CURRENTLY TO BE MOVED.                              */ 00490000
*/*                                                                  */ 00491000
*/*  OPERATION= NO SPECIAL ALGORITHMS ARE USED                       */ 00492000
*/*                                                                  */ 00493000
*/*ENTRY POINT= IN-LINE SEGMENT                                      */ 00494000

*/*    SMCABSW- SWITCH INDICATING WHICH HALF OF THE SMF BUFFER       */ 00496000
*/*             IS TO BE USED '1' SECOND HALF  '0' FIRST HALF        */ 00497000

*/*                                                                  */ 00505000

*IF SMCABSW='1'B THEN                  /* IF SMCABSW INDICATES THAT  */ 00507000

*  BUFPTR=SMCABUFP+SMCABSIZ;           /* THE SECOND HALF OF THE SMF */ 00510000

*  END;                                                         02S0184 00518000

*      DO;                             /* IF YES, SEGMENT THE RECORD */ 00536000
*/********************************************************************/ 00537000
*/*                                                                  */ 00538000
*/*SEGMENT NAME= SPLITREC                                            */ 00539000
*/*                                                                  */ 00540000
*/*DESCRIPTIVE NAME= SMF RECORD SPLITTER                             */ 00541000
*/*                                                                  */ 00542000
*/*FUNCTION=                                                         */ 00543000
*/*  SPLIT THE SMF/USER RECORD UP INTO BUFFER SIZE SEGMENTS AND      */ 00544000
*/*  POST THE SMF WRITER TO WRITE OUT EACH SEGMENT.                  */ 00545000
*/*  CALCULATE THE NUMBER OF SEGMENTS NEEDED TO CONTAIN THE RECORD   */ 00546000
*/*  AND THEN POST THE SMF WRITER TO PERFORM SPACE CHECKING, I.E. TO */ 00547000
*/*  SEE IF THE DATA SET HAS ENOUGH SPACE TO CONTAIN ALL SEGMENTS.   */ 00548000
*/*  THEN SEGMENT THE RECORD FLUSHING EACH SEGMENT IN TURN UP TO N-1 */ 00549000
*/*  SEGMENTS. MOVE THE LAST PORTION OF THE RECORD TO THE BUFFER.    */ 00550000
*/*  IN THE EVENT THAT THE RECORD EXCEEDS THE SIZE OF AN EMPTY SMF   */ 00551000
*/*  DATA SET, THE RECORD IS SEGMENTED AND TRUNCATED WITH A RETURN   */ 00552000
*/*  CODE BEING PASSED TO THE MAIN SEGMENT.                          */ 00553000
*/*  IF AN I/O ERROR SHOULD OCCUR IN THE WRITER AND CAUSE A DATA SET */ 00554000
*/*  SWITCH, NO MORE SEGMENTS WILL BE WRITTEN SINCE ALL SEGMENTS OF  */ 00555000
*/*  A SPLIT RECORD MUST BE WRITTEN TO THE SAME SMF DATA SET.        */ 00556000
*/*                                                                  */ 00557000
*/*  OPERATION=                                                      */ 00558000
*/*    THE NUMBER OF SEGMENTS NEEDED TO CONTAIN THE SMF RECORD =     */ 00559000
*/*    RECORD SIZE-4/BUFFER SIZE-8 ADDING 1 IF THERE IS A REMAINDER  */ 00560000
*/*                                                                  */ 00561000
*/*ENTRY POINT= IN-LINE SEGMENT                                      */ 00562000
*/*  INPUT=                                                          */ 00563000
*/*    SMF/USER RECORD WHOSE SIZE EXCEEDS THAT OF THE SMF BUFFER     */ 00564000
*/*    SMF BUFFER                                                    */ 00565000
*/*                                                                  */ 00566000
*/*EXITS=                                                            */ 00567000
*/*  CONDITION= NORMAL- SMF/USER RECORD SPLIT AND WRITTEN IN SEGMENTS*/ 00568000
*/*  OUTPUT=                                                         */ 00569000
*/*    SMF RECORD SEGMENTS CONSISTING OF A SEGMENT DESCRIPTOR WORD   */ 00570000
*/*    AND RECORD DATA- |SEGMENT    |SEGMENT    |ZERO   |DATA....|   */ 00571000
*/*                     |LEN________|INDICATOR__|_______|________|   */ 00572000
*/*                      0           2           3       4           */ 00573000
*/*    SEGMENT INDICATOR= 01- FIRST SEGMENT                          */ 00574000
*/*                       03- MIDDLE SEGMENT                         */ 00575000
*/*                       02- LAST SEGMENT                           */ 00576000
*/*  RETURN CODES= NONE                                              */ 00577000
*/*                                                                  */ 00578000
*/*  CONDITION= SMF/USER RECORD WAS TRUNCATED                        */ 00579000
*/*  OUTPUT= SAME AS ABOVE                                           */ 00580000
*/*  RETURN CODES= RETURN CODE SET TO 4                              */ 00581000
*/*                                                                  */ 00582000
*/********************************************************************/ 00583000
*SMCASGWR=(RECORDLN-4)/(SMCABSIZ-8);       /* CALC THE NUMBER OF     */ 00584000

*SMCADSSP='0'B;                        /* CLEAR SPACE CHECK INDICATOR*/ 00604000

*/*                                                                  */ 00777000
*/*SEGMENT NAME= USEREXT                                             */ 00778000
*/*                                                                  */ 00779000
*/*DESCRIPTIVE NAME= INTERFACE TO SMF USER EXIT                      */ 00780000
*/*                                                                  */ 00781000
*/*FUNCTION=                                                         */ 00782000
*/*  SET UP THE INTERFACE TO USER EXIT IEFU83 PASSING AS INPUT       */ 00783000
*/*  THE ADDRESS OF THE SMF/USER RECORD.                             */ 00784000
*/*  UPON RETURN FROM THE USER EXIT DETERMINE FROM THE RETURN CODE   */ 00785000

*/*  THIS RECORD (RET CODE 4- CANCEL). PASS AN APPROPRIATE RETURN    */ 00787000

*/*  OUTPUT=                                                         */ 00798000
*/*    RETCODE- RETURN CODE FOR MAIN SEGMENT                         */ 00799000
*/*  RETURN CODES=                                                   */ 00800000

*/*    RETURN CODE 0- ISSUE RECORD NORMALLY                          */ 00802000
*/*                                                                  */ 00803000

*/*                                                                  */ 00838000
*/*SEGMENT NAME= EMPTYBUF                                            */ 00839000
*/*                                                                  */ 00840000
*/*DESCRIPTIVE NAME= SMF BUFFER FLUSH                                */ 00841000
*/*                                                                  */ 00842000
*/*FUNCTION=                                                         */ 00843000
*/*  SERVICE ROUTINE USED TO POST THE SMF WRITER(IEEMB829) TO        */ 00844000
*/*  PERFORM ONE OF SEVERAL FUNCTIONS. UPON COMPLETION OF THE WAIT   */ 00845000
*/*  A CHECK IS MADE TO SEE THAT RECORDING HAS NOT BEEN SHUT DOWN AS */ 00846000
*/*  A RESULT OF ABENDING IN THE SMF WRITER. IF A POST CODE OF 4     */ 00847000
*/*  IS DETECTED THIS INDICATES THAT A DATA SET SWITCH WAS PERFORMED */ 00848000
*/*  BY THE WRITER AND AN INDICATOR IS SET BY THIS ROUTINE.          */ 00849000
*/*  A CHECK IS MADE TO SEE IF A DISASTER CONDITION WAS ENTERED IN   */ 00850000
*/*  IEEMB829 PROCESSING AND IF SO, THE RETURN CODE IS SET UP TO     */ 00851000
*/*  INDICATE NO SMF RECORDING.                                      */ 00852000
*/*                                                                  */ 00853000
*/*  OPERATION= NO SPECIAL ALGORITHMS ARE USED                       */ 00854000
*/*                                                                  */ 00855000
*/*ENTRY POINT= EMPTYBUF                                             */ 00856000
*/*  INPUT=                                                          */ 00857000
*/*    SMCAWECB- SMF WRITER ECB                                      */ 00858000
*/*    SMCABECB- SMF RECORD MANAGER ECB                              */ 00859000
*/*    BAASCB- SMF WRITER ASCB ADDRESS                               */ 00860000
*/*    ASCBPTR- SMF RECORD MANAGER ASCB ADDRESS                      */ 00861000
*/*    TCBPTR- SMF RECORD MANAGER TCB ADDRESS                        */ 00862000
*/*                                                                  */ 00863000
*/*EXITS=                                                            */ 00864000
*/*  CONDITION= NORMAL- SMF WRITER POSTED TO PERFORM REQUESTED       */ 00865000
*/*             FUNCTION                                             */ 00866000
*/*  OUTPUT=                                                         */ 00867000
*/*    DATASETS- INDICATOR SET IF WRITER SWITCHED DATA SETS          */ 00868000
*/*  RETURN CODES= RETURN CODE SET TO 0                              */ 00869000
*/*                                                                  */ 00870000
*/*  CONDITION= SMF NO LONGER RECORDING                              */ 00871000
*/*  OUTPUT= NONE                                                    */ 00872000
*/*  RETURN CODES= RETURN CODE SET TO 16                             */ 00873000
*/*                                                                  */ 00874000
*/********************************************************************/ 00875000

*/*                                                                  */ 00966000
*/*SEGMENT NAME= RECMOVE                                             */ 00967000
*/*                                                                  */ 00968000
*/*DESCRIPTIVE NAME= MOVE RECORD TO SMF BUFFER                       */ 00969000

*/*FUNCTION=                                                         */ 00971000

*/*                                                                  */ 00975000

*/*    MOVING IS DONE 256 BYTES AT A TIME EACH PASS THROUGH A LOOP   */ 00977000

*/********************************************************************/ 01053000
*/*                                                                  */ 01054000
*/* ENTRY TO THIS RTN IS VIA ABEND/ESTAE INTERFACE WHEN THE  @ZA10115*/ 01055000
*/* SVC HAS ABENDED UNDER THE USER TASK. CLEAN-UP IS PER-    @ZA10115*/ 01056000
*/* FORMED AND UNLESS THE ABEND IS X22 TYPE, A DUMP IS       @ZA31684*/ 01057000
*/* TAKEN.  ABEND PROCESSING IS CONTINUED.                   @ZA31684*/ 01058000
*/*                                                                  */ 01059000
*/********************************************************************/ 01060000
*RFY (REG8,REG11,REG12,REG14) RSTD; /*                       @ZA10115*/ 01061000
*REG11 = 12;                        /* SET UP FOR STAE       @ZA10115*/ 01062000
         LA    REG11,12                                         02S0310 01063000
*GEN REFS(SDWAPARM,SDWAPTR,SDWAABCC); /* PARMLIST TEST       @ZA31684*/ 01064000

./  ADD  SSI=72790300,NAME=IEFAB820
         TITLE 'IEFAB820 - TCTIOT CONSTRUCTION INTERFACE               *00001000
                        '                                               00002000
IEFAB820 CSECT ,                                                01S0001 00003000
IEFSMFAT DS    0H                                               01S0001 00004000
         ENTRY IEFSMFAT                                                 00005000
@MAINENT DS    0H                                               01S0001 00006000
         USING *,@15                                            01S0001 00007000
         B     @PROLOG                                          01S0001 00008000
         DC    AL2(@EP00001-@MAINENT)                                   00009000
         DC    AL1(16)                                          01S0001 00010000
         DC    C'IEFAB820  76.328'                              01S0001 00011000
         DROP  @15                                                      00012000
@PROLOG  STM   @14,@12,12(@13)                                  01S0001 00013000
         BALR  @12,0                                            01S0001 00014000
@PSTART  DS    0H                                               01S0001 00015000
         USING @PSTART,@12                                      01S0001 00016000
         L     @00,@SIZDATD                                     01S0001 00017000
         GETMAIN  R,LV=(0)                                              00018000
         LR    @11,@01                                          01S0001 00019000
         USING @DATD,@11                                        01S0001 00020000
         ST    @13,@SA00001+4                                   01S0001 00021000
         LM    @15,@01,16(@13)                                  01S0001 00022000
         ST    @11,8(,@13)                                      01S0001 00023000
         LR    @13,@11                                          01S0001 00024000
         AH    @15,4(,@15)                                      01S0001 00025000
         BR    @15                                              01S0001 00026000
@EP00001 DS    0H                                               01S0002 00027000
JSCBDISP EQU 188                                                        00028000
JSCBAOS1 EQU  72                                                        00029000

./  ADD  SSI=62870206,NAME=IEFSMFIE
         TITLE 'IEFSMFIE - SMF INIT EXIT'                               00300018
IEFSMFIE CSECT                                                          00600018
* A 372500,373000,390500                                        YA00964 00650001
* A 176700,623220-623366,883620-883660,883750,762500           @G32FPRS 00700043
*MODULE NAME= IEFSMFIE                                          @Y02669 04850002
*                                                               @Y02669 04900002
*DESCRIPTIVE NAME= SMF INITIALIZATION EXIT SUPPORT MODULE       @Y02669 04950002
*                                                               @Y02669 05000002
*COPYRIGHT= N/A                                                 @Y02669 05050002
*                                                               @Y02669 05100002
*STATUS= REL. 02.0                                              @Y02669 05150002
*                                                               @Y02669 05200002
*FUNCTION=                                                      @Y02669 05250002
*    THIS MODULE HANDLES JOB INITIALIZATION PROCESSING AND STEP @Y02669 05300002
*    INITIALIZATION PROCESSING.  IT BASICALLY PERFORMS THE      @Y02669 05350002
*    FOLLOWING FUNCTIONS.                                       @Y02669 05360002
*                                                               @Y02669 05370002
*    DECISION AS TO WHETHER JOB OR STEP INITIALIZATION IS TO    @Y02669 05380002
*    TAKE PLACE.                                                @Y02669 05390002
*         WHEN THIS MODULE FIRST RECEIVES CONTROL FROM IEFSD101,@Y02669 05392002
*         IT IS DECIDED IF ANY SMF OPTIONS ARE TO BE PERFORMED  @Y02669 05394002
*         AND, IF SO, THE CURRENT TIME AND DATE ARE STORED IN   @Y02669 05396002
*         THE JCT (VIA TIME SVC 11).  IF NOT, A RETURN IS MADE  @Y02669 05398002
*         TO THE CALLER OF IEFSMFIE.  IF THE LCT INDICATES THAT @Y02669 05398402
*         THIS IS THE FIRST STEP OF THE JOB OR IF A TCT POINTER @Y02669 05398802
*         IS NOT PRESENT IN THE TCB, JOB INITIALIZATION         @Y02669 05399202
*         PROCESSING IS PERFORMED.  OTHERWISE, STEP INITIALI-   @Y02669 05399602
*         ZATION PROCESSING IS STARTED.                         @Y02669 05399702
*                                                               @Y02669 05399802
* JOB INITIALIZATION PROCESSING                                 @Y02669 05399902
*                                                               @Y02669 05449902
*    CONSTRUCTING A TIMING CONTROL TABLE (TCT).                 @Y02669 05459902
*         THE JMR IS READ INTO CORE. CORE IS OBTAINED FOR A TCT @Y02669 05469902
*         AND THE COMMON EXIT PARAMETER AREA (1ST 40 BYTES OF   @Y02669 05479902
*         THE JMR).  THE TCT CORE IS CLEARED AND SEVERAL FIELDS @Y02669 05489902
*         OF THE TCT ARE INITIALIZED. THE COMMON EXIT PARAMETER @Y02669 05491902
*         AREA IS INITIALIZED FROM THE JMR.                     @Y02669 05493902
*                                                                       05495902
*    SUPPORT OF A USER'S JOB INITIATION EXIT ROUTINE.           @Y02669 05497902
*         THE ACT IS READ INTO CORE.  IF A USER JOB INITIATION  @Y02669 05498302
*         EXIT RTN IS TO BE EXECUTED, A USER PARAMETER LIST IS  @Y02669 05498702
*         BUILT, THE FIELDS BEING INITIALIZED FROM THE ACT AND  @Y02669 05499102
*         THE COMMON EXIT PARAMETER AREA OF THE JMR. THE USER'S @Y02669 05499502
*         JOB INITIATION EXIT ROUTINE IS EXECUTED.  UPON RETURN @Y02669 05499602
*         TO IEFSMFIE, THE USER RETURN CODE IS CHECKED FOR USER @Y02669 05499702
*         JOB CANCELATION.  IF THE JOB IS TO BE CANCELLED, THE  @Y02669 05499802
*         JCT IS MARKED TO INDICATE THIS.                       @Y02669 05549802
*                                                               @Y02669 05559802
*    ISSUING SMF JOB COMMENCEMENT RECORD TYPE 20.               @Y02669 05569802
*         WHETHER OR NOT THE USER HAS CANCELLED THE JOB, THE    @Y02669 05579802
*         SMF RECORD TYPE 20 IS BUILT AND WRITTEN TO THE SMF    @Y02669 05589802
*         DATA SET VIA SVC 83. IF THE USER HAS CANCELLED THE    @Y02669 05591802
*         JOB, STEP INITIALIZATION PROCESSING IS PERFORMED.     @Y02669 05593802
*                                                               @Y02669 05595802
* STEP INITIALIZATION PROCESSING                                @Y02669 05597802
*                                                               @Y02669 05598202
*    IF THE JCT INDICATES THAT STEP PROCESSING IS TO BE PER-    @Y02669 05598602
*    FORMED AND USER EXITS ARE TO BE TAKEN, A USER  PARAMETER   @Y02669 05599002
*    LIST IS BUILT AND THE USER SUPPLIED STEP INITIATION EXIT   @Y02669 05599402
*    RTN (USI) IS EXECUTED.  UPON RETURN TO IEFSMFIE, THE USER  @Y02669 05599502
*    RETURN CODE IS CHECKED FOR USER JOB CANCELATION.  IF THE   @Y02669 05599602
*    JOB IS TO BE CANCELLED THE JCT IS MARKED TO INDICATE THIS. @Y02669 05599702
*                                                               @Y02669 05633102
*  OPERATION=                                                  @YM04108 05643102
*      INORDER FOR THE USER EXITS (IEFUJI, IEFUSI) TO          @YM04108 05644102
*      OPEN/CLOSE INSTALLATION DEFINED DATA SETS,              @YM04108 05645102
*      THE INITIATOR'S JSCB MUST BE THE ACTIVE JSCB.           @YM04108 05646102
*      THEREFORE, PRIOR TO CALLING THE EXIT, THE               @YM04108 05647102
*      INITIATOR'S JSCB IS MADE THE ACTIVE JSCB.               @YM04108 05648102
*      UPON RETURN FROM THE EXIT, THE P/P JSCB IS AGAIN        @YM04108 05649102
*      MADE THE ACTIVE JSCB.                                   @YM04108 05650102
*                                                               @Y02669 05653102
*NOTES                                                          @Y02669 05663102
*  DEPENDENCIES= INITIATOR (IEFSD101) FOR LCT ADDRESS IN REG 1  @Y02669 05665102
*    CHARACTER-CODE DEPENDENCIES= NONE                          @Y02669 05665502
*  RESTRICTIONS= NONE                                           @Y02669 05665902
*  REGISTER-CONVENTIONS= R15 IS USED FOR RETURN CODES FROM EXIT @Y02669 05666302
*                        ROUTINES.                              @Y02669 05666402
*  PATCH-LABEL= N/A                                             @Y02669 05666502
*                                                               @Y02669 05677602
*MODULE TYPE=                                                   @Y02669 05687602
*  PROCESSOR= (ASSEM)                                           @Y02669 05688002
*  MODULE SIZE= N/A                                             @Y02669 05688402
*  ATTRIBUTES= REFRESHABLE, REENTRANT, KEY 0, SUPERVISOR STATE, @Y02669 05688802
*              PAGABLE LPA                                      @Y02669 05692502
*                                                               @Y02669 05694502
*ENTRY POINT= IEFSMFIE                                          @Y02669 05694902
*  PURPOSE= SEE FUNCTION                                        @Y02669 05695302
*  LINKAGE= BALR                                                @Y02669 05695702
*  INPUT= REGISTER ONE CONTAINS THE ADDRESS OF THE LCT          @Y02669 05696102
*  REGISTERS SAVED= GPR 0-15                                    @Y02669 05696202
*  REGISTER USAGE= N/A                                          @Y02669 05746202
*  REGISTERS RESTORED= GPR 0-15                                 @Y02669 05756202
*                                                               @Y02669 05766202
*EXIT - NORMAL= RETURN TO CALLER                                @Y02669 05776202
*  CONDITIONS= PROCESSING COMPLETE                              @Y02669 05786202
*  OUTPUT= 1) A TIMING CONTROL TABLE (TCT) IS CONSTRUCTED AND   @Y02669 05788202
*             POINTED TO BY THE TCB IF THIS IS THE FIRST STEP   @Y02669 05790202
*             0F THE JOB.                                       @Y02669 05792202
*          2) SMF RECORD TYPE 20 IS WRITTEN TO THE SMF DATA SET @Y02669 05794202
*             IF THIS IS THE FIRST STEP OF THE JOB.             @Y02669 05794602
*          3) THE COMMON EXIT PARAMETER AREA (1ST 40 BYTES OF   @Y02669 05795402
*             JMR) IS POINTED TO BY THE TCT.                    @Y02669 05795802
*  RETURN CODES= NONE                                           @Y02669 05795902
*                                                               @Y02669 05796002
*EXIT - ERROR= NONE                                             @Y02669 05796102
*                                                               @Y02669 05812802
*EXTERNAL REFERENCES=                                           @Y02669 05822802
*  ROUTINES= IEFUJI (USER JOB INITIATION EXIT ROUTINE)          @Y02669 05824802
*            IEFUSI (USER STEP INITIATION EXIT ROUTINE)         @Y02669 05826802
*            IEFAB4F7 (SWA MANAGER READ ROUTINE)                @Y02669 05828802
*  DATA AREAS= NONE                                             @Y02669 05829202
*  CONTROL BLOCKS=     LCT - LINKAGE CONTROL TABLE              @Y02669 05829302
*                      JCT - JOB CONTROL TABLE                  @Y02669 05829402
*                      SCT - STEP CONTROL TABLE                 @Y02669 05835002
*                      TCB - TASK CONTROL BLOCK                 @Y02669 05837002
*                      ACT - ACCOUNTING CONTROL TABLE           @Y02669 05839002
*                      JMR - JOB MANAGEMENT RECORD              @Y02669 05839402
*                      TCT - TIMING CONTROL TABLE               @Y02669 05839802
*                                                               @Y02669 05840202
*TABLES= NONE                                                   @Y02669 05840302
*                                                               @Y02669 05840402
*MACROS=   TIME                                                 @Y02669 05840502
*          SMFWTM                                               @Y02669 05880302
*          GETMAIN                                              @Y02669 05890302
*          FREEMAIN                                             @Y02669 05900302
*  SERIALIZATION= NONE                                          @Y02669 05910302
*                                                               @Y02669 05920302
*CHANGE ACTIVITY= RACF SUPPORT                                 @G32FPRL 05926343
*                                                               @Y02669 05943602
*MESSAGES= NONE                                                 @Y02669 05945602
*                                                               @Y02669 05946002
*ABEND CODES= NONE                                              @Y02669 05946402
*                                                               @Y02669 05946802
*************************************************************** @Y02669 05951202
*                                                               @Y02669 05955802
R0       EQU   0                       REGISTER EQUATES                 05960202
R1       EQU   1                                                        06000018
R2       EQU   2                                                        06300018
R3       EQU   3                                                        06600018
R4       EQU   4                                                        06900018
R5       EQU   5                                                        07200018
R6       EQU   6                                                        07500018
R7       EQU   7                                                        07800018
R8       EQU   8                                                        08100018
R9       EQU   9                                                        08400018
R10      EQU   10                                                       08700018
R11      EQU   11                                                       09000018
R12      EQU   12                                                       09300018
R13      EQU   13                                                       09600018
R14      EQU   14                                                       09900018
R15      EQU   15                                                       10200018
ACTSIZE  EQU   176                                                      10500018
CANCEL   EQU   4                       USER RETURN CODE                 10800018
ZERO     EQU   0                       FOR COMPARISON                   11100018
STEPONE  EQU   1                       INDICATES THIS IS FIRST          11400018
*                                           STEP                        11700018
*                                  BOTH JOB AND STEP USER EXITS         12000018
*                                  MAY BE REQUIRED                      12300018
JCTJMRSP EQU   X'40'                   STEP FUNCTION REQUESTED          12600018
CANCUJI  EQU   X'20'                   *                                12900018
CANCUSI  EQU   X'10'                   *                                13200018
SMFJEXIT EQU   X'20'                   JOB EXITS ARE TO BE TAKEN        13500018
SMFSEXIT EQU   X'60'                   STEP EXITS ARE REQUESTED         13800018
READ1    EQU   1                       FOR ONE RECORD                   14100018
POOL230  EQU   230                     ID SUB-POOL 230          @Y02669 14150002
POOL253  EQU   253                     *                                14400018
DEC0     EQU   0                       NUMERIC EQUATE                   15000018
DEC1     EQU   1                       NUMERIC EQUATE                   15300018
DEC3     EQU   3                       NUMERIC EQUATE                   15600018
DEC4     EQU   4                       NUMERIC EQUATE                   15900018
DEC5     EQU   5                       NUMERIC EQUATE                   16200018
DEC6     EQU   6                       NUMERIC EQUATE                   16250001
DEC12    EQU   12                      NUMERIC EQUATE                   16500018
DEC16    EQU   16                      NUMERIC EQUATE                   16800018

TCTPROC  EQU   *                                                  19018 31800019
         LA    R1,DEC0(R1)             ZERO HI BYTE OF TCBTCT PTR M0432 32200018

*                                           JMR                         35700018

*                                           USER                        44700018

SMFSVAQ  EQU   *                       *                                57900018

         LA    R1,ACTPRGNM-ACTDSKAD(R8) PROGRAM NAME                    59400018

         L     R5,LCTTCBAD             GET ADDR INITIATOR'S TCB@YM04108 61230002
         USING TCB,R5                                          @YM04108 61260002

TESTDS   EQU   *                                                  19028 62106019
         L     R2,CVTPTR           ADDRESS OF CVT                 19028 62112019
         USING CVT,R2              CVT ADDRESSABILITY            Y01120 62118001

         USING SMCABASE,R2         SMCA ADDRESSABILITY            19028 62124019
         GETMAIN R,LV=REC20SZE,SP=POOL230 GET CORE FOR 20 REC   @Y02669 62160002
         LR    R14,R1              SAVE ADDRESS                   19028 62166019
         USING TYPE20,R14          TYPE 20 ADDRESSABILITY         19028 62172019
         XC    TYPE20(REC20SZE),TYPE20   ZERO OUT GOTTEN CORE     19028 62178019
         MVI   RECTYPE,T20         INSERT RECORD TYPE             19028 62184019
         MVC   RECJNM(D8),JMRJOB   JOB NAME STARTING              19028 62196019
         MVC   RECTME(D8),JMRENTRY GET TIME AND DATE              M3152 62202019
         MVC   RECPGRNM(D20),ACTPRGNM    INSERT PROGRAMMER NAME   19028 62208019
         MVC   RECUSID(D8),JMRUSEID      USER ID                  19028 62214019

         LA    R15,RECJANO+ONE     POINT TO EMPTY SPACE           19028 62232019

         IC    R11,ACTJNFLD        NUMBER OF JOB ACCTG FIELDS     19028 62244019
         STC   R11,RECJANO         STORE IN TYPE 20 RECORD        19028 62250019
         LTR   R11,R11             ANY ACCOUNTING FIELDS          19028 62256019
         BZ    NOACCTG             BRANCH IF NO ACCTG FIELDS      19028 62262019
         SR    R1,R1               ZERO OUT FOR IC                19028 62268019
NEXTFLD  EQU   *                                                  19028 62274019
         IC    R1,ZERO(R3)         LENGTH OF THIS ACCTG FIELD     19028 62280019
         EX    R1,ACTGMOVE         MOVE ACCTG FIELD AND LENGTH    19028 62286019
         LA    R1,ONE(R1)          ADD 1 FOR LENGTH BYTE          19028 62292019
         AR    R15,R1              INCREMENT TO NEXT EMPTY SPACE  19028 62298019
         AR    R3,R1               INCREMENT TO NEXT ACCTG FIELD  19028 62304019
         BCT   R11,NEXTFLD         END OF ACCTG FIELDS            19028 62310019
NOACCTG  EQU   *                   YES                            19028 62316019
*                                                              @G32FPRS 62322043
* CODE ADDED FOR SUPPORT OF RACF 5-3-76                        @G32FPRS 62322243
*                                                              @G32FPRS 62322443
         XC    ZERO(26,R15),ZERO(R15) CLEAR RACF SMF AREA      @G32FPRL 62322543
         LA    R3,4                LENGTH OF RDW               @G32FPRL 62322643
         LR    R11,R15             COPY PTR TO CURRENT POSITION@G32FPRS 62322743
         SR    R11,R14             FIND CURRENT RECORD LENGTH  @G32FPRL 62323143
         SR    R11,R3              OFFSET TO RACF RELOCATE AREA@G32FPRL 62323243
         STH   R11,SMF20RLO        SAVE OFFSET TO RELOCATE AREA@G32FPRL 62323543
         MVC   ZERO(2,R15),RELSIZE  SAVE RELOCATE SECTION SIZE @G32FPRL 62323643
         LA    R15,2(ZERO,R15)     BUMP PAST LENGTH FIELD      @G32FPRL 62323743
         AH    R11,RELSIZE         ADD LENGTH OF RELOCATE AREA @G32FPRL 62323843
         AR    R11,R3              ADD LENGTH OF RDW           @G32FPRL 62323943
         STH   R11,RECLEN          PUT RECORD LENGTH IN RECORD @G32FPRL 62324043
         L     R1,CVTPTR           ADDRESS CVT                 @G32FPRS 62324343
         USING CVT,R1                                          @G32FPRS 62324443
         L     R1,CVTTCBP          GET ADDRESS OF NEW/OLD PTRS @G32FPRS 62324543
         L     R1,ASCBPTR(ZERO,R1) GET ADDRESS OF CURRENT ASCB @G32FPRS 62324643
         DROP  R1                                              @G32FPRS 62324943
         USING ASCB,R1                                         @G32FPRS 62325243
         L     R1,ASCBASXB         FIND ASXB                   @G32FPRS 62325543
         DROP  R1                                              @G32FPRS 62325843
         USING ASXB,R1                                         @G32FPRS 62326143
         L     R1,ASXBSENV         FIND RACF CONTROL TABLE     @G32FPRS 62326443
         LTR   R1,R1               IF NOT 0,RACF IN SYSTEM     @G32FPRS 62326743
         BZ    NORACF              IF NO RACF, DONT FILL FIELDS@G32FPRS 62327043

         MVC   ZERO(8,R15),ACEEUSRI     GET USER ID            @G32FPRS 62331443

         BZ    NORACF              FINISHED AT THIS POINT      @G32FPRS 62333443

         LA    R15,8(ZERO,R15)     MOVE POINTER TO NEXT 8 CHARS@G32FPRS 62334443

*                                    IS FIRST STEP)                     67700018

*/*SEGMENT NAME= CNTRLBLK                                            */ 00070000
*/*DESCRIPTIVE NAME= CONTROL BLOCK SETUP ROUTINE                     */ 00071000
*/*FUNCTION=                                                         */ 00072000
*/*        .THIS SEGMENT OBTAINS POINTERS TO ALL REQUIRED CONTROL    */ 00073000
*/*         BLOCKS TO BE USED IN CONSTRUCTING THE SMF TERMINATION    */ 00074000
*/*         RECORDS.  A SINGLE CALL OF THE SWA MANAGER RETURNS       */ 00075000
*/*         THE ADDRESSES OF THE JMR,JOB ACT, AND STEP ACT (IF THE   */ 00076000
*/*         CURRENT PROCESSING IS FOR A TERMINATING STEP). THE       */ 00077000
*/*         REQUIRED SWA MANAGER EPAS ARE CHAINED PRIOR TO CALLING   */ 00078000
*/*         THE SWA MANAGER. THE CORE ADDRESSES OF THE CONTROL       */ 00079000
*/*         BLOCKS IN SWA ARE RETURNED IN THE EPAS.                  */ 00080000
*/*        .CORE IS GOTTEN FOR THE JMR THAT IS UPDATED FROM THE CEPA.*/ 00081000
*/*        .IF NO TCT IS AVAILABLE, A PSEUDO TCT IS CONSTRUCTED TO   */ 00082000
*/*         FACILITATE THE RECORD BUILDING PROCESS.                  */ 00083000
*/*OPERATION= NO SPECIAL ALGORITHMS ARE EMPLOYED.                    */ 00084000
*/*INPUT=                                                            */ 00085000
*/*      JCTJMR   -SWA VIRTUAL ADDRESS OF JMR                        */ 00086000
*/*      JCTACTAD -SWA VIRTUAL ADDRESS OF JOB ACT                    */ 00087000
*/*      SCTACTAD -SWA VIRTUAL ADDRESS OF STEP ACT                   */ 00088000
*/*      TCTJMR   -CORE ADDRESS OF COMMON EXIT PARAMETER AREA        */ 00089000
*/*      LCTSNUMB -STEP NUMBER                                       */ 00090000
*/*      TCBTCT   -ADDRESS OF TCT OR ZERO(INDICATES TCT NOT AVAILABLE*/ 00091000
*/*      LCTTCBAD -ADDRESS OF CURRENTLY TERMINATING TCB              */ 00092000
*/*EXIT                                                              */ 00093000
*/*  CONDITION= PROCESSING COMPLETE.                                 */ 00094000
*/*  OUTPUT= ADDRESS OF UPDATED JMR(JMRPTR).                         */ 00095000
*/*          ADDRESS OF JOB ACT(SWBLKPTR(JOBACT)).                   */ 00096000
*/*          ADDRESS OF STEP ACT(SWBLKPTR(STEPACT)), IF STEP TERM.   */ 00097000
*/*          PSEUDO TCT IF NO TCT EXISTS.                            */ 00098000
*/*          UPDATED JMR.                                            */ 00099000
*/*  RETURN CODE= N/A.                                               */ 00100000
*/********************************************************************/ 00101000

*/********************************************************************/ 00232000
*/*SEGMENT NAME= TB722PRP                                            */ 00233000
*/*DESCRIPTIVE NAME= IEFTB722 PREPARATION SEGMENT                    */ 00234000
*/*FUNCTION=                                                         */ 00235000
*/*        .THIS SEGMENT DETERMINES THE JOB ACCOUNTING FIELDS SIZE   */ 00236000
*/*         AT JOB AND STEP TERMINATION BY TOTALING THE JOB ACT      */ 00237000
*/*         SUBFIELD LENGTHS, THE CPU TIME FIELD LENGTH, THE BYTE    */ 00238000
*/*         THAT CONTAINS THE NUMBER OF ACCOUNT SUBFIELDS, AND THE   */ 00239000
*/*         LENGTH OF THE PROGRAMMER NAME FIELD.                     */ 00240000
*/*        .IT DETERMINES THE STEP ACCOUNTING FIELD SIZE, AND        */ 00241000
*/*         DEVICE INFORMATION SIZE(TCTIOT ENTRIES) AT STEP          */ 00242000
*/*         TERMINATION.                                             */ 00243000
*/*           .STEP ACCOUNT FIELD SIZE DETERMINED BY TOTALING THE    */ 00244000
*/*            STEP ACT SUBFIELD LENGTHS, THE CPU TIME FIELD LENGTHS */ 00245000
*/*            THE BYTE THAT CONTAINS THE NUMBER OF ACCOUNT SUBFIELDS*/ 00246000
*/*           .DEVICE INFORMATION SIZE DETERMINED BY MULTIPLING EIGHT*/ 00247000
*/*            TIMES THE NUMBER OF ENTRIES IN THE TCTIOT I/O DEVICE  */ 00248000
*/*            ENTRY LOOKUP SECTION, IF A TCTIOT IS AVAILABLE.       */ 00249000
*/*        .THE ABOVE LENGTHS ARE THEN EMPLOYED TO DETERMINE THE     */ 00250000
*/*         SIZE OF TERMINATION RECORD THAT WILL BE CONSTRUCTED.     */ 00251000
*/*        .THE CORE, AS DETERMINED ABOVE, IS OBTAINED.              */ 00252000
*/*OPERATION=                                                        */ 00253000
*/*         .STEP TERMINATION RECORD SIZE= LENGTH OF STANDARD STEP   */ 00254000
*/*          RECORD + LENGTH STEP ACCOUNT FIELD INFORMATION + LENGTH */ 00255000
*/*          OF DEVICE ENTRY INFORMATION.                            */ 00256000
*/*         .JOB TERMINATION RECORD SIZE= LENGTH OF STANDARD JOB     */ 00257000
*/*          RECORD + LENGTH OF JOB ACCOUNT FIELD INFORMATION.       */ 00258000
*/*INPUT=                                                            */ 00259000
*/*      JOB ACT  -JOB ACCOUNT CONTROL TABLE.                        */ 00260000
*/*      STEP ACT -STEP ACCOUNT CONTROL TABLE.                       */ 00261000
*/*      TCTIOT   -TCT TASK INPUT/OUTPUT TABLE.                      */ 00262000
*/*      LCT      -LINKAGE CONTROL TABLE.                            */ 00263000
*/*EXIT                                                              */ 00264000
*/*  CONDITION= PROCESSING COMPLETE FOR STEP TERM. RECORD PREPARATION*/ 00265000
*/*  OUTPUT=RECORDLN - LENGTH OF RECORD TO BE BUILT.                 */ 00266000
*/*         ACTPTR - POINTER TO ACCOUNT FIELDS.                      */ 00267000
*/*         ACTLEN - ACCOUNT FIELDS LENGTH.                          */ 00268000
*/*         SACTSIZE - SIZE OF STEP ACCOUNT INFORMATION.             */ 00269000
*/*         JACTSIZE - SIZE OF JOB ACCOUNT INFORMATION.              */ 00270000
*/*         TCTIOTLN - SIZE OF DEVICE ENTRY INFORMATION.             */ 00271000
*/*         RECORD   - POINTER TO GOTTEN AREA FOR RECORD BUILDING.   */ 00272000
*/*  RETURN CODE= N/A                                                */ 00273000
*/*  CONDITION= PROCESSING COMPLETE FOR JOB TERM. RECORD PREPARATION */ 00274000
*/*  OUTPUT=RECORDLN - LENGTH OF RECORD TO BE BUILT.                 */ 00275000
*/*         JACTSIZE - SIZE OF JOB ACCOUNT INFORMATION.              */ 00276000
*/*         RECORD   - POINTER TO GOTTEN AREA FOR RECORD BUILDING.   */ 00277000
*/*  RETURN CODE= N/A.                                               */ 00278000
*/********************************************************************/ 00279000
*JACTSIZE='00000000'X;                 /* INITIALIZE JOB ACT SIZE    */ 00280000
         SLR   @12,@12                                          02S0154 00281000
         LR    JACTSIZE,@12                                     02S0154 00282000
*SACTSIZE='00000000'X;                 /* INITIALIZE STEP ACT SIZE   */ 00283000
         LR    SACTSIZE,@12                                     02S0155 00284000
*TCTIOTLN='00000000'X;                 /* INITIALIZE DEVICE INFORMATION 00285000
*                                         SIZE                       */ 00286000
         STH   @12,TCTIOTLN                                     02S0156 00287000
*RFY IEFAACTB BASED(ACTPTR);                                    02S0157 00288000

*/*SEGMENT NAME= USERPARM                                            */ 00440000

*/*        .THIS SEGMENT ESTABLISHES THE INTERFACE TO THE JOB AND    */ 00443000

*/***********************************************************@YM04108*/ 00554000
*/*SEGMENT NAME= INVKEXIT                                    @YM04108*/ 00555000
*/*DESCRIPTIVE NAME= INVOKE USER EXIT ROUTINE - IEFACTRT.    @YM04108*/ 00556000
*/*FUNCTION=                                                 @YM04108*/ 00557000
*/*        .THIS SEGMENT ESTABLISHES THE REMAINDER OF THE    @YM04108*/ 00558000
*/*         INTERFACE TO THE JOB AND STEP TERMINATION        @YM04108*/ 00559000
*/*         SMF USER EXIT (IEFACTRT):                        @YM04108*/ 00560000
*/*           .INPUT TO IEFACTRT:                            @YM04108*/ 00561000
*/*                  REGISTER 0 = X'0C' AT STEP TERM.        @YM04108*/ 00562000
*/*                             = X'10' AT JOB TERM.         @YM04108*/ 00563000
*/*                  REGISTER 1 = ADDRESS OF POINTER LIST    @YM04108*/ 00564000
*/*           .OUTPUT FROM IEFACTRT:                         @YM04108*/ 00565000
*/*                  IF REGISTER 1  =4- CANCEL THE RECORD    @YM04108*/ 00566000
*/*                  IF REGISTER 15 =4- CANCEL THE JOB-      @YM04108*/ 00567000
*/*                                     STEPS REMAINING      @YM04108*/ 00568000
*/*        .IF THE JOB IS TO BE CANCELLED, THE CANCEL RETURN @YM04108*/ 00569000
*/*         CODE OF FOUR IS SET FOR IEFBB410 (IEFTB721'S     @YM04108*/ 00570000
*/*         CALLER).                                         @YM04108*/ 00571000
*/*OPERATION=                                                @YM04108*/ 00572000
*/*      AN ESTAE EXIT IS ESTABLISHED IN ORDER               @YM04108*/ 00573000
*/*      TO MAINTAIN THE INTEGRITY OF THE JSCB CHAIN.        @YM04108*/ 00574000
*/*      IF THE STAE IS NOT SUCCESSFULLY ESTABLISHED,        @YM04108*/ 00575000
*/*      THE CHAIN IS NOT MAINIPULATED AND THE               @YM04108*/ 00576000
*/*      EXIT WILL NOT BEABLE TO OPEN DATA SETS.             @YM04108*/ 00577000
*/*      IF THE STAE IS SUCCESSFULLY ESTABLISHED             @YM04108*/ 00578000
*/*      THE JSCB CHAIN WILL BE MAINIPULATED                 @YM04108*/ 00579000
*/*      IN ORDER FOR THE USER EXIT (IEFACTRT) TO OPEN       @YM04108*/ 00580000
*/*      /CLOSE AN INSTALLATION DEFINED DATA SET.            @YM04108*/ 00581000
*/*      THEREFORE, PRIOR TO CALLING THE EXIT THE            @YM04108*/ 00582000
*/*      INITIATOR'S JSCB IS MADE THE ACTIVE JSCB. UPON      @YM04108*/ 00583000
*/*      RETURN FROM THE EXIT, THE P/P JSCB IS AGAIN MADE    @YM04108*/ 00584000
*/*      THE ACTIVE JSCB.                                    @YM04108*/ 00585000
*/*                                                          @YM04108*/ 00586000
*/*INPUT=                                                    @YM04108*/ 00587000
*/*      LCT      -LINKAGE CONTROL TABLE.                    @YM04108*/ 00588000
*/*      TCB      -TASK CONTROL BLOCK                        @YM04108*/ 00589000
*/*      JSCB     -JOB/STEP CONTROL BLOCK                    @YM04108*/ 00590000
*/*      TCT      -TIMING CONTROL TABLE                      @YM04108*/ 00591000
*/*EXIT                                                      @YM04108*/ 00592000
*/*  CONDITION=USER EXIT INTERFACE COMPLETE.                 @YM04108*/ 00593000
*/*  OUTPUT=  RECRDCAN - STATUS OF TERMINATION RECORD        @YM04108*/ 00594000
*/*                      (CANCEL OR NOT)                     @YM04108*/ 00595000
*/*           RETRNCD  - STATUS OF REMAINING JOB STEPS       @YM04108*/ 00596000
*/*                      (CANCEL OR NOT)                     @YM04108*/ 00597000
*/*           ACTRTCAN - BIT IS ON IF IEFACTRT CANCELLED JOB.@YM04108*/ 00598000
*/*  RETURN CODE= 4 IF JOB IS TO BE CANCELLED.               @YM04108*/ 00599000
*/***********************************************************@YM04108*/ 00600000
*STAELST(1:STAELEN)=DYMSTAE(1:STAELEN);     /* INIT STAE LIST   02S0221 00601000
*                                         FORM MACRO         @YM04108*/ 00602000
@RF00207 LH    @12,STAELEN                                      02S0221 00603000
         BCTR  @12,0                                            02S0221 00604000
         EX    @12,@SM02476                                     02S0221 00605000
*RFY (REG0,REG1,REG2,REG3,REG12) RSTD; /*                    @YM04108*/ 00606000
*REG2=ADDR(STAEEXIT);                  /* ADDR STAE EXIT     @YM04108*/ 00607000
         LA    REG2,STAEEXIT                                    02S0223 00608000
*REG3=ADDR(STAEPARM);                  /* ADDR EXIT PARMS    @YM04108*/ 00609000
         LA    @09,DSTAEPRM                                     02S0224 00610000
         LR    REG3,@09                                         02S0224 00611000
*SLCTPTR=LCTPTR;                       /* LCT POINTER FOR STAE  02S0225 00612000
*                                         EXIT ROUTINE       @YM04108*/ 00613000
         L     @15,LCTPTR                                       02S0225 00614000
         ST    @15,SLCTPTR(,@09)                                02S0225 00615000
*GEN;                                  /* SET UP STAE        @YM04108*/ 00616000
   ESTAE (REG2),,PARAM=(REG3),PURGE=NONE,ASYNCH=YES,MF=(E,STAELST)      00617000
*RFY (REG2,REG3) UNRSTD;               /*                    @YM04108*/ 00618000
*RFY REG15 RSTD;                       /*                    @YM04108*/ 00619000
*IF REG15=0 THEN                       /* IF STAE SETUP OK,  @YM04108*/ 00620000
         LTR   REG15,REG15                                      02S0229 00621000
         BNZ   @RF00229                                         02S0229 00622000
*  DO;                                 /* THEN INVOKE EXIT   @YM04108*/ 00623000
*    RFY TCB BASED(TCBCUR);            /* TO INITIATOR'S TCB @YM04108*/ 00624000
*    JSCBACT=TCBJSCB;                  /* MAKE INITIATOR'S JSCB 02S0232 00625000
*                                         THE ACTIVE JSCB    @YM04108*/ 00626000
         L     @14,CVTPTR                                       02S0232 00627000
         L     @14,CVTTCBP(,@14)                                02S0232 00628000
         L     @14,TCBCUR(,@14)                                 02S0232 00629000
         L     @14,TCBJSCB(,@14)                                02S0232 00630000
         ST    @14,JSCBACT(,@14)                                02S0232 00631000
*    STAEGOOD='1'B;                    /* INDICATE STAE OK   @YM04108*/ 00632000
