*STAEEXIT: PROC OPTIONS(NOSAVEAREA,NOSAVE); /*               @YM04108*/ 00852000
STAEEXIT DS    0H                                               02S0315 00853000
*/***********************************************************@YM04108*/ 00854000
*/*                                                          @YM04108*/ 00855000
*/*SEGMENT NAME=STAEEXIT                                     @YM04108*/ 00856000
*/*                                                          @YM04108*/ 00857000
*/*DESCRIPTIVE NAME= STAE EXIT ROUTINE                       @YM04108*/ 00858000
*/*                                                          @YM04108*/ 00859000
*/*FUNCTION=                                                 @YM04108*/ 00860000
*/*        THIS SEGMENT PERFORMS RECOVERY FOR ABENDS         @YM04108*/ 00861000
*/*        WHICH OCCUR WHILE IN THE SMF USER                 @YM04108*/ 00862000
*/*        EXIT - IEFACTRT. THIS IS NECESSARY SO THAT        @YM04108*/ 00863000
*/*        THE JSCB CHAIN, WHICH WAS MANIPULATED             @YM04108*/ 00864000
*/*        PRIOR TO TAKING THE EXIT, CAN BE RESTORED.        @YM04108*/ 00865000
*/*                                                          @YM04108*/ 00866000
*/*        A RECORD IS WRITTEN TO RECORD THE OCCURANCE       @YM04108*/ 00867000
*/*        OF THE ABEND (ONLY WHEN A SDWA IS PASSED).        @YM04108*/ 00868000
*/*                                                          @YM04108*/ 00869000
*/*OPERATION=                                                @YM04108*/ 00870000
*/*        NO SPECIAL ALGORITHMS ARE USED.                   @YM04108*/ 00871000
*/*                                                          @YM04108*/ 00872000
*/*NOTES                                                     @YM04108*/ 00873000
*/*  DEPENDENCIES=                                           @YM04108*/ 00874000
*/*        . LCT JSCB POINTS TO P/P JSCB                     @YM04108*/ 00875000
*/*    CHARACTER CODE DEPENDENCIES= EBCDIC                   @YM04108*/ 00876000
*/*        A REASSEMBLY WILL CHANGE THIS DEPENDENCY          @YM04108*/ 00877000
*/*  RESTRICTIONS= N/A                                       @YM04108*/ 00878000
*/*  REGISTER CONVENTIONS= REG 9 USED AS BASE REGISTER       @YM04108*/ 00879000
*/*  PATACH LABEL= PATCHES (SAME AS MAINLINE)                @YM04108*/ 00880000
*/*                                                          @YM04108*/ 00881000
*/*MODULE TYPE=                                              @YM04108*/ 00882000
*/*  PROCESSOR= PL/S                                         @YM04108*/ 00883000
*/*  MODULE SIZE= N/A                                        @YM04108*/ 00884000
*/*  ATTRIBUTES= SAME AS MAINLINE                            @YM04108*/ 00885000
*/*                                                          @YM04108*/ 00886000
*/*ENTRY POINT= STAEEXIT                                     @YM04108*/ 00887000
*/*  PURPOSE= SEE FUNCTION                                   @YM04108*/ 00888000
*/*  LINKAGE= CALL FROM RTM                                  @YM04108*/ 00889000
*/*  INPUT=                                                  @YM04108*/ 00890000
*/*        REG0 - = 12, NO WORK AREA PASSED (SDWA)           @YM04108*/ 00891000
*/*               = OTHER, WORK AREA PASSED (SDWA)           @YM04108*/ 00892000
*/*        REG1 - IF REG 0 = 12, MEANINGLESS                 @YM04108*/ 00893000
*/*               IF REG 0 = OTHER, ADDRESS OF SDWA          @YM04108*/ 00894000
*/*        REG2 - IF REG 0 = 12, ADDRESS OF EXIT PARAMETERS  @YM04108*/ 00895000
*/*               IF REG 0 = OTHER, MEANINGLESS              @YM04108*/ 00896000
*/*  REGISTERS SAVED= REG 14                                 @YM04108*/ 00897000
*/*  REGISTER USAGE= REG 9 IS BASE REGISTER                  @YM04108*/ 00898000
*/*  REGISTERS RESTORED= REG 14                              @YM04108*/ 00899000
*/*                                                          @YM04108*/ 00900000
*/*EXIT - NORMAL= RETURN TO CALLER                           @YM04108*/ 00901000
*/*  CONDITONS= JSCB CHAIN REPAIRED                          @YM04108*/ 00902000
*/*             AND RECORD WRITTEN RECORDING ABEND           @YM04108*/ 00903000
*/*  OUTPUT= UPDATE JSCB CHAIN AND RECORD                    @YM04108*/ 00904000
*/*  RETURN CODES= 0, CONTINUE WITH ABEND                    @YM04108*/ 00905000
*/*                                                          @YM04108*/ 00906000
*/*EXIT - ERROR= NONE                                        @YM04108*/ 00907000
*/*                                                          @YM04108*/ 00908000
*/*EXTERNAL REFERENCES=                                      @YM04108*/ 00909000
*/*  ROUTINES= NONE                                          @YM04108*/ 00910000
*/*  DATA AREAS= NONE                                        @YM04108*/ 00911000
*/*  CONTROL BLOCKS=                                         @YM04108*/ 00912000
*/*        LCT - LINKAGE CONTROL TABLE                       @YM04108*/ 00913000
*/*        JSCB - JOB/STEP CONTROL TABLE                     @YM04108*/ 00914000
*/*        SDWA - STAE DIAGNOSTIC WORK AREA                  @YM04108*/ 00915000
*/*                                                          @YM04108*/ 00916000
*/*TABLES= NONE                                              @YM04108*/ 00917000
*/*                                                          @YM04108*/ 00918000
*/*MACROS=                                                   @YM04108*/ 00919000
*/*        SETRP                                             @YM04108*/ 00920000
*/*        EPILOG                                            @YM04108*/ 00921000
*/*                                                          @YM04108*/ 00922000
*/*CHANGE ACTIVITY= N/A                                      @YM04108*/ 00923000
*/*                                                          @YM04108*/ 00924000
*/*MESSAGES= NONE                                            @YM04108*/ 00925000
*/*                                                          @YM04108*/ 00926000
*/*ABEND CODES= NONE                                         @YM04108*/ 00927000
*/*                                                          @YM04108*/ 00928000
*/***********************************************************@YM04108*/ 00929000
*RFY (REG0,REG1,REG2,REG8,REG9,REG14,REG15) RSTD; /*         @YM04108*/ 00930000
*RFY STAEPARM BASED(REG2);             /*                    @YM04108*/ 00931000
*REG8=REG14;                           /* SAVE RETURN ADDRESS@YM04108*/ 00932000

*RFY TCB BASED(TCBCUR);                /* INITIATOR'S TCB    @YM04108*/ 00959000
*JSCBACT=LCTJSCB;                      /* RESTOR P/P JSCB       02S0331 00960000

         L     @12,CVTPTR                                       02S0331 00962000
         L     @12,CVTTCBP(,@12)                                02S0331 00963000

         L     @03,LCTJSCB(,@03)                                02S0331 00967000

*IF SWKAREA='1'B THEN                  /* WORK AREA PASSED   @YM04108*/ 00969000
         TM    SWKAREA(REG2),B'10000000'                        02S0332 00970000
         BNO   @RF00332                                         02S0332 00971000
*  DO;                                 /* THEN RECORD ABEND  @YM04108*/ 00972000
*    SRECPRM1=LOADNAME;                /* NAME OF ABENDING      02S0334 00973000

         MVC   SRECPRM1(8,REG2),@CC00037                        02S0334 00975000
*    SRECPRM2=CSECTNAM;                /* NAME OF ABENDED       02S0335 00976000
*                                         CSECT              @YM04108*/ 00977000
         MVC   SRECPRM2(8,REG2),@CC00039                        02S0335 00978000
*    SRECPRM3=STAENAME;                /* NAME STAE ROUTINE  @YM04108*/ 00979000
         MVC   SRECPRM3(8,REG2),@CC00041                        02S0336 00980000
*      DO;  /*SETRP DUMP(NO)WKAREA(SDWAPTR)RECORD(YES)RC(0)RECPARM(SREC 00981000
*ARM)*/                                                         02S0337 00982000
*        RESPECIFY (GPR00P,GPR01P,GPR14P,GPR15P) RSTD;          02S0338 00983000
*        GPR01P = SDWAPTR;                                      02S0339 00984000
         L     GPR01P,SDWAPTR(,REG2)                            02S0339 00985000
*        GPR01P->SDWARCDE = 0;  /*SAVE RC VALUE*/               02S0340 00986000
         MVI   SDWARCDE(GPR01P),X'00'                           02S0340 00987000
*        GPR01P->SDWARCRD = '1'B;  /*TURN ON RECORD INDICATOR*/ 02S0341 00988000
         OI    SDWARCRD(GPR01P),B'10000000'                     02S0341 00989000
*        GPR15P = ADDR(SRECPARM);  /*ACCESS RECORD PARAMETER LIST*/     00990000
         LA    GPR15P,SRECPARM(,REG2)                           02S0342 00991000
*        GPR01P->SDWARECP = GPR15P ->I256C(1:24);  /*COPY RECORD PARAME 00992000
*ERS*/                                                          02S0343 00993000
         MVC   SDWARECP(24,GPR01P),I256C(GPR15P)                02S0343 00994000
*        GPR01P->SDWAREQ = '0'B;  /*TURN OFF DUMP INDICATOR*/   02S0344 00995000
         NI    SDWAREQ(GPR01P),B'01111111'                      02S0344 00996000
*        RESPECIFY (GPR00P,GPR01P,GPR14P,GPR15P) UNRSTD;        02S0345 00997000
*      END;                /*                    @YM04108*/     02S0346 00998000
*                                                               02S0346 00999000
*                                                               02S0346 01000000
*      DECLARE /*GENERAL PURPOSE REGISTERS */                   02S0347 01001000
*        GPR00P PTR(31) REG(0),                                 02S0347 01002000
*        GPR01P PTR(31) REG(1),                                 02S0347 01003000
*        GPR14P PTR(31) REG(14),                                02S0347 01004000
*        GPR15P PTR(31) REG(15);                                02S0347 01005000
*                                                               02S0347 01006000
*      DECLARE /* COMMON VARIABLES */                           02S0348 01007000
*        I256C CHAR(256) BASED,                                 02S0348 01008000
*        I031F FIXED(31) BASED,                                 02S0348 01009000
*        I031P PTR(31)   BASED,                                 02S0348 01010000
*        I015F FIXED(15) BASED,                                 02S0348 01011000
*        I015P PTR(15)   BASED,                                 02S0348 01012000
*        I008P PTR(8)    BASED,                                 02S0348 01013000
*        I001C CHAR(1)   BASED;                         /*      02S0348 01014000
*      @YM04108*/                                               02S0348 01015000
*  END;                                /*                    @YM04108*/ 01016000
*GEN(DROP REG9);                       /* FREE TEMP BASE REG @YM04108*/ 01017000
@RF00332 DS    0H                                               02S0350 01018000
         DROP REG9                                                      01019000
*REG14=REG8;                           /* RESTORE RETURN ADDR@YM04108*/ 01020000
         LR    REG14,REG8                                       02S0351 01021000
*REG15=0;                              /* CONTINUE ABEND     @YM04108*/ 01022000
         SLR   REG15,REG15                                      02S0352 01023000
*RETURN;                               /* RETURN TO ABEND    @YM04108*/ 01024000
@EL00002 DS    0H                                               02S0353 01025000
@EF00002 DS    0H                                               02S0353 01026000
@ER00002 BR    @14                                              02S0353 01027000
*END STAEEXIT;                         /*                    @YM04108*/ 01028000

*  DO;                                                          01S0177 00184000
*/********************************************************************/ 00185000
*/*                                                                  */ 00186000
*/*SEGMENT NAME= STEPPROC                                            */ 00187000
*/*DESCRIPTIVE NAME= STEP TERMINATION ONLY, CODE SEGMENT.            */ 00188000
*/*FUNCTION=                                                         */ 00189000
*/*        *THIS SEGMENT MOVES TO THE STEP TERMINATION RECORDS ALL   */ 00190000
*/*         FIELDS THAT ARE UNIQUE TO THE STEP TERMINATION RECORDS.  */ 00191000
*/*        *USING THE RECORD 34 MAPPING MACRO FIELD NAMES, THE DATA  */ 00192000
*/*         COMMON TO BACKGROUND & FOREGROUND STEPS IS MOVED.        */ 00193000
*/*        *THE JCT SMF CONTROL BYTE IS INTEROGATED TO DISTINGUISH   */ 00194000
*/*         BETWEEN BACKGROUND AND FOREGROUND STEP TERMINATION. THE  */ 00195000
*/*         FIELDS UNIQUE TO FOREGROUND STEPS ARE FILLED IN IF       */ 00196000
*/*         JCTFORGD IS ON. THE UNIQUE BACKGROUND FIELDS ARE FILLED  */ 00197000
*/*         IN IF JCTFORGD IS OFF AND THEN THE SIGNON/SIGNOFF        */ 00198000
*/*         MESSAGE SEGMENTS ARE CALLED TO ISSUE THE START/STOP      */ 00199000
*/*         MESSAGES TO SYSOUT.                                      */ 00200000
*/*        *THE SYSEVENT  INTEFACE SEGMENT IS CALLED TO PROVIDE      */ 00201000
*/*         PAGING STATISTICS FOR THE STEP'S TERMINATION RECORD.     */ 00202000
*/*OPERATION= NO SPECIAL ALGORITHMS ARE EMPLOYED.                    */ 00203000
*/*INPUT=                                                            */ 00204000
*/*      ACTLEN   - LENGTH OF STEP ACCOUNT FIELDS AT STEP TERM.      */ 00205000
*/*      SYSEVPRM - SYSEVENT STATISTIC AREA.                         */ 00206000
*/*      VRECRDPT - ADDRESS OF RECORD'S VARIABLE SECTION.            */ 00207000
*/*      CVT      - COMMUNICATION VECTOR TABLE               @YM07457*/ 00208000
*/*      SCT      - STEP CONTROL TABLE.                              */ 00209000
*/*      TCT      - TASK CONTROL TABLE.                              */ 00210000
*/*      TCB      - TASK CONTROL BLOCK.                              */ 00211000
*/*      JCT      - JOB CONTROL TABLE.                               */ 00212000
*/*      LCT      - LINKAGE CONTROL TABLE.                           */ 00213000
*/*      JMR      - JOB MANAGEMENT RECORD.                           */ 00214000
*/*      ACT      - STEP ACCOUNT CONTROL TABLE AT STEPTERM.          */ 00215000
*/*EXIT                                                              */ 00216000
*/* CONDITION= PROCESSING FOR FIELDS UNIQUE TO STEP TERMINATION      */ 00217000
*/*            RECORDS(4/34) COMPLETE.                               */ 00218000
*/* OUTPUT= ALL FIELDS UNIQUE TO JOB TERMINATION RECORD FILLED IN.   */ 00219000
*/*                                                                  */ 00220000
*/********************************************************************/ 00221000
*TIVSTART(1)=TIVSTART(1)&&TIVSTART(1);      /* CLEAR HI-ORDER BYTE   */ 00222000

*/********************************************************************/ 00405000
*/*SEGMENT NAME= DEVACT                                              */ 00406000
*/*DESCRIPTIVE NAME= MOVE DEVICE & ACCOUNT INFORMATION SEGMENT.      */ 00407000
*/*FUNCTION=                                                         */ 00408000
*/*        *THIS SEGMENT MOVES THE STEP'S DEVICE INFORMATION TO      */ 00409000
*/*         THE STEP TERMINATION RECORD IF A TCTIOT IS AVAILABLE     */ 00410000
*/*         THE TCIOT CONTAINS THE NECESSARY UCB POINTERS AND THE    */ 00411000
*/*         EXCP COUNT FOR EACH DEVICE. THE DEVICES UCB IS           */ 00412000
*/*         INTEROGATED FOR THE DEVICE CLASS, UNIT TYPE, AND UNIT    */ 00413000
*/*         ADDRESS. THIS DATA IS COMBINED TO FORM A DEVICE ENTRY IN */ 00414000
*/*         THE STEP TERMINATION RECORD THAT HAS THE FOLLOWING FORMAT*/ 00415000
*/*            BYTE1       = DEVICE CLASS FROM UCBTYP OF UCB.        */ 00416000
*/*            BYTE2       = UNIT TYPE FROM UCBTYP OF UCB.           */ 00417000
*/*            BYTE3-BYTE4 = CHANNEL 4 UNIT ADDRESS FROM UCBCHAN.    */ 00418000
*/*            BYTE5-BYTE8 = EXCP COUNT FROM TCTDCTR OF TCTIOT.      */ 00419000
*/*        *IF A VAM DATA SET IS ENCOUNTERED DEFAULTS ARE SET UP FOR */ 00420000
*/*         DEVICE CLASS, UNIT TYPE, AND CHANNEL/UNIT ADDRESS.  THIS */ 00421000
*/*         IS DONE TO PROCIDE EXCP COUNTS FOR VAM DATA SETS EVEN    */ 00422000
*/*         THOUGH THE PHYSICAL ATTRIBUTES OF THE DATA SETS ARE      */ 00423000
*/*         UNOBTAINABLE BY THIS ROUTINE.(THE DATA SET HAS ALREADY   */ 00424000
*/*         BEEN SCRATCHED.)                                         */ 00425000
*/*        *THIS SEGMENT MOVES THE STEP'S EXECUTION TIME AND ACCOUNT */ 00426000
*/*         FIELDS TO THE STEP TERMINATION RECORD FROM STEP'S ACT.   */ 00427000
*/*OPERATION= NO SPECIAL ALGORITHMS ARE EMPLOYED.                    */ 00428000
*/*INPUT=                                                            */ 00429000
*/*      TCTIOTBL - TCTIOT POINTER IN TCT.                           */ 00430000
*/*      TCTCOMIO - OFFSET TO TCTIOT LOOK UP SECTION.                */ 00431000
*/*      TCTIOTSD - OFFSET FROM TCTIOT START, TO TCTIOT DD ENTRY.    */ 00432000
*/*      TCTSCTR  - NUMBER OF DEVICE IN DD ENTRY.                    */ 00433000
*/*      TCTVAMDS - VAM DATA SET INDICATOR BIT IN TCTIOT.            */ 00434000
*/*      TCTUCBP  - UCB POINTER FROM TCTIOT.                         */ 00435000
*/*      UCBBYT3  _ DEVICE CLASS FROM UCB.                           */ 00436000
*/*      UCBBYT1  - UNIT TYPE FROM UCB.                              */ 00437000
*/*      UCBCHAN  - CHANNEL & UNIT ADDRESS FROM UCB.                 */ 00438000
*/*      UCBRVDEV - VIRTUAL DEVICE INDICATOR                 @Y30LPPE*/ 00439000
*/*      TCTDCTR  - EXCP COUNT FROM TCTIOT.                          */ 00440000
*/*      ACTLEN   - LENGTH OF VALID ACCOUNT FIELDS IN ACT.           */ 00441000
*/*      ACTPTR   - POINTER TO STEP ACT.                             */ 00442000
*/*      ACTJTIME - STEP EXECUTION TIME.                             */ 00443000
*/*      ACTJNFLD - NUMBER OF ACCOUNT FIELDS.                        */ 00444000
*/*      ACTACCNT - ACCOUNT FIELDS.                                  */ 00445000
*/*EXIT                                                              */ 00446000
*/*  CONDITION= PROCESSING COMPLETE WITH OR WITHOUT TCTIOT AVAILABLE.*/ 00447000
*/*  OUTPUT= STEP ACCOUNTING DATA MOVED FROM ACT TO STEP TERM RECORD.*/ 00448000
*/*  CONDITION= PROCESSING COMPLETE WITH TCTIOT AVAILABLE.           */ 00449000
*/*  OUTPUT= STEP TERMINATION RECORD'S DEVICE ENTRY SECTION HAS      */ 00450000
*/*          BEEN BUILT.                                             */ 00451000
*/*  RETURN CODE= N/A                                                */ 00452000
*/*                                                                  */ 00453000
*/********************************************************************/ 00454000
*RFY TIVEXCP BASED(VRECRDPT);                                   03S0223 00455000
*IF TCTIOTBL Â¬= '00000000'X THEN       /* IS THERE A TCTIOT?         */ 00456000
         L     @10,LCTTCBAD(,LCTPTR)                            03S0224 00457000
         L     @10,TCBTCT(,@10)                                 03S0224 00458000
         L     @10,TCTIOTBL(,@10)                               03S0224 00459000
         LTR   @10,@10                                          03S0224 00460000
         BZ    @RF00224                                         03S0224 00461000
*  DO;                                                          03S0225 00462000

         AL    @10,@CF00069                                     03S0226 00464000
         LR    LOOKUP,@10                                       03S0226 00465000
*    RFY TCTIODSP BASED (LOOKUP);      /* LOOKUP SECT. ADDRESSABILTY */ 00466000
*    DO WHILE TCTIOTSD Â¬= '00000000'X; /* LOOP UNTIL ALL ENTRIES HAVE   00467000
*                                         BEEN PROCESSED             */ 00468000
         B     @DE00228                                         03S0228 00469000
@DL00228 DS    0H                                               03S0229 00470000
*      TCTIOTDD=ADDR(TCTTIOT)+TCTIOTSD;/* DD ENTRY POINTER - TCTIOT. */ 00471000
         L     @10,LCTTCBAD(,LCTPTR)                            03S0229 00472000

         LH    TCTIOTDD,TCTIOTSD(,LOOKUP)                       03S0229 00474000
         AL    TCTIOTDD,TCTIOTBL(,@10)                          03S0229 00475000
*      RFY TCTDDENT BASED(TCTIOTDD);   /* TCTIOT DEVICE ENTRY SECTION-  00476000
*                                         ADDRESSABILITY.            */ 00477000
*      DO COUNT=TCTSCTR TO 1 BY -1;        /* CREATE A DEVICE ENTRY     00478000
*                                              IN STEP TERMINATION      00479000

         XC    TIVEXCP(8,VRECRDPT),TIVEXCP(VRECRDPT)            03S0233 00496000
*        ELSE                                                   03S0234 00497000
*          DO;                                                  03S0234 00498000
         B     @RC00232                                         03S0234 00499000
@RF00232 DS    0H                                               03S0235 00500000
*            IF TCTVAMDS='0'B THEN     /* IS THIS A VIO DATA SET?    */ 00501000

*    IF JCTCKPTR='1'B | JCTSTEPR='1'B THEN/*                    02S0286 00638000
*                                         IS STEP TO BE RESTARTED    */ 00639000
         TM    JCTCKPTR(@10),B'00001100'                        02S0286 00640000
         BZ    @RF00286                                         02S0286 00641000
*      SMF4STI = SMF4STI | '04'X;      /* INDICATES YES IN RECORD.   */ 00642000
         OI    SMF4STI(RECORD),X'04'                            02S0287 00643000
*    CALL SIGNON;                      /* STEP START MSG TO SYSOUT   */ 00644000
@RF00286 BAL   @14,SIGNON                                       02S0288 00645000
*    CALL SIGNOFF;                     /* STEP STOP MSG TO SYSOUT    */ 00646000
         BAL   @14,SIGNOFF                                      02S0289 00647000
*  END;                                                         02S0290 00648000
*  END;                                                         01S0291 00649000
*ELSE                                                           01S0292 00650000
*  DO;                                                          01S0292 00651000
         B     @RC00176                                         01S0292 00652000
@RF00176 DS    0H                                               01S0293 00653000
*/********************************************************************/ 00654000
*/*                                                                  */ 00655000
*/*SEGMENT NAME= JOBPROC                                             */ 00656000
*/*DESCRIPTIVE NAME= JOB TERMINATION ONLY, CODE SEGMENT.             */ 00657000
*/*FUNCTION=                                                         */ 00658000
*/*        *THIS SEGMENT MOVES TO THE JOB TERMINATION RECORD ALL     */ 00659000
*/*         FIELDS THAT ARE UNIQUE TO THE JOB TERMINATION RECORDS.   */ 00660000
*/*        *USING THE RECORD 35 MAPPING MACRO FIELD NAMES. THE DATA  */ 00661000
*/*         COMMON TO BACKGROUND & FOREGROUND JOBS IS MOVED.         */ 00662000
*/*        *THE SYSEVENT  INTERFACE SEGMENT IS CALLED TO PROVIDE     */ 00663000
*/*         SERVICE TIMES FOR THE TERMINATING JOB'S RECORD.          */ 00664000
*/*        *THE JCT SMF CONTROL BYTE IS INTEROGATED TO DISTINGUISH   */ 00665000
*/*         BETWEEN BACKGROUND AND FOREGROUND JOB TERMINATION. THE   */ 00666000
*/*         FIELDS UNIQUE TO FOREGROUND JOBS ARE FILLED IN IF        */ 00667000
*/*         JCTFORGD IS ON. THE UNIQUE BACKGROUND FIELDS ARE FILLED  */ 00668000
*/*         IN IF JCTFORGD IS OFF AND THEN THE SIGNON/SIGNOFF        */ 00669000
*/*         MESSAGE SEGMENTS ARE CALLED TO ISSUE THE START/STOP      */ 00670000
*/*         MESSAGES TO SYSOUT.                                      */ 00671000
*/*OPERATIONS= NO SPECIAL ALGORITHMS ARE EMPLOYED.                   */ 00672000
*/*INPUT=                                                            */ 00673000
*/*      ACTLEN   - LENGTH OF JOB ACCOUNT FIELDS AT JOBTERM.         */ 00674000
*/*      JCT      - JOB CONTROL TABLE.                               */ 00675000
*/*      JMR      - JOB MANAGEMENT RECORD.                           */ 00676000
*/*      TCB      - P/P TASK CONTROL BLOCK.                          */ 00677000
*/*      ACT      - JOB ACCOUNT CONTROL TABLE AT JOBTERM.            */ 00678000
*/*      TCT      - TASK CONTROL TABLE.                              */ 00679000
*/*EXIT                                                              */ 00680000
*/* CONDITION= PROCESSING FOR FIELDS UNIQUE TO JOB TERMINATION       */ 00681000
*/*             RECORD(5/35) COMPLETE.                               */ 00682000
*/* OUTPUT= ALL FIELDS UNIQUE TO JOB TERMINATION RECORD FILLED IN.   */ 00683000
*/*                                                                  */ 00684000
*/********************************************************************/ 00685000
*RFY SMFRCD35 BASED(RECORD);           /* JOB TERMINATION RECORD ADDR*/ 00686000
*TLGPRI=JCTJBYTE;                      /* INPUT PRIORITY TO RECORD.  */ 00687000
         L     @10,LCTJCTAD(,LCTPTR)                            02S0294 00688000
         SLR   @04,@04                                          02S0294 00689000
         IC    @04,JCTJBYTE(,@10)                               02S0294 00690000
         STC   @04,TLGPRI(,RECORD)                              02S0294 00691000
*TLGPRI=TLGPRI&'0F'X;                  /* LEAVE ONLY NUMERIC PORTION */ 00692000
         N     @04,@CF00201                                     02S0295 00693000
         STC   @04,TLGPRI(,RECORD)                              02S0295 00694000
*ENQTIME=JMRDRSTP(1:4);                /* BACKGROUND- RDR STOP OR FOR*/ 00695000
         MVC   ENQTIME(4,RECORD),JMRDRSTP(JMRPTR)               02S0296 00696000
*TLGNQDTE=JMRDRSTP(5:8);               /* FOREGROUND- LOGON ENQUEUE. */ 00697000
         MVC   TLGNQDTE(4,RECORD),JMRDRSTP+4(JMRPTR)            02S0297 00698000
*TLGTRMI=JCTJMRCL;                     /* TERMINATION INDICATOR.     */ 00699000
         MVC   TLGTRMI(1,RECORD),JCTJMRCL(@10)                  02S0298 00700000
*TLGOUTCL=TLGOUTCL&&TLGOUTCL;          /* CLEAR RESERVED AREA        */ 00701000
         XC    TLGOUTCL(1,RECORD),TLGOUTCL(RECORD)              02S0299 00702000
*TLGSPK=TCBPKF;                        /* STORAGE PROTECT KEY        */ 00703000
         L     @04,LCTTCBAD(,LCTPTR)                            02S0300 00704000
         IC    @15,TCBPKF(,@04)                                 02S0300 00705000
         STC   @15,TLGSPK(,RECORD)                              02S0300 00706000
*TLGSRBT=JCTSRBT;                      /* SRB TIME OF JOB TO RECORD  */ 00707000
         MVC   TLGSRBT(3,RECORD),JCTSRBT+1(@10)                 02S0301 00708000
*TLGVAR=ACTLEN;                        /* LENGTH OF REMAINING FIELDS -  00709000
*                                         ALL OF WHICH ARE FROM ACT  */ 00710000
         L     @10,@PC00001+16                                  02S0302 00711000
         SLR   @04,@04                                          02S0302 00712000
         IC    @04,ACTLEN(,@10)                                 02S0302 00713000
         STC   @04,TLGVAR(,RECORD)                              02S0302 00714000
*TLGCPUTM=ACTJTIME;                    /* TOTAL EXECUTION TIME.      */ 00715000
         L     @10,@PC00001                                     02S0303 00716000
         L     @10,ACTPTR(,@10)                                 02S0303 00717000
         MVC   TLGCPUTM(3,RECORD),ACTJTIME(@10)                 02S0303 00718000
*TLGNBRAC=ACTJNFLD;                    /* NUMBER OF ACCOUNT FIELDS   */ 00719000
         IC    @15,ACTJNFLD(,@10)                               02S0304 00720000
         STC   @15,TLGNBRAC(,RECORD)                            02S0304 00721000
*VRECRDPT=RECORD+LENGTH(SMFRCD35);     /* POINTER TO VARIABLE RECORD    00722000
*                                         SECTION                    */ 00723000
         LA    VRECRDPT,121                                     02S0305 00724000
         ALR   VRECRDPT,RECORD                                  02S0305 00725000
*RFY TLGACFL1 BASED(VRECRDPT);                                  02S0306 00726000
*SIZE=ACTLEN-(LENGTH(TLGCPUTM)+LENGTH(TLGNBRAC)+LENGTH(TLGRVB));        00727000
         SL    @04,@CF00166                                     02S0307 00728000
         LR    SIZE,@04                                         02S0307 00729000
*                                      /* LENGTH OF ACCOUNT DATA LEFT*/ 00730000
*IF SIZE > '00000000'X THEN            /* IS THERE ANYTHING TO MOVE? */ 00731000
         C     SIZE,@CF02632                                    02S0308 00732000
         BNH   @RF00308                                         02S0308 00733000
*  TLGACFL1(1:SIZE)=ACTACCNT(1:SIZE);    /* MOVE ALL ACCOUNT FIELDS  */ 00734000
         LR    @04,SIZE                                         02S0309 00735000
         BCTR  @04,0                                            02S0309 00736000
         EX    @04,@SM02680                                     02S0309 00737000
*CALL SYSSTAT;                         /* OBTAIN SYSEVENT TIMING DATA*/ 00738000
@RF00308 BAL   @14,SYSSTAT                                      02S0310 00739000
*IF JCTFORGD='1'B THEN                 /* IS THIS A FOREGROUND TASK? */ 00740000
         L     @10,LCTJCTAD(,LCTPTR)                            02S0311 00741000
         TM    JCTFORGD(@10),B'00000001'                        02S0311 00742000
         BNO   @RF00311                                         02S0311 00743000
*  DO;                                                          02S0312 00744000
*    RFY SMFRCD35 BASED(RECORD);                                02S0313 00745000
*    TLGRCDTY=35;                      /* FOREGROUND TASK TERMINATION   00746000
*                                         RECORD TYPE TO RECORD.     */ 00747000
         MVI   TLGRCDTY(RECORD),X'23'                           02S0314 00748000
*    TLGCRTME=TLGCRTME&&TLGCRTME;      /* CLEAR RESERVED FIELD       */ 00749000
         XC    TLGCRTME(4,RECORD),TLGCRTME(RECORD)              02S0315 00750000
*    TLGOUTCT=TCTLOUT;                 /* LINE OUT COUNT (TPUTS)     */ 00751000
         L     @10,LCTTCBAD(,LCTPTR)                            02S0316 00752000
         L     @10,TCBTCT(,@10)                                 02S0316 00753000
         MVC   TLGOUTCT(4,RECORD),TCTLOUT(@10)                  02S0316 00754000
*    TLGINCT=TCTLIN;                   /* LINE IN COUNT (TGETS)      */ 00755000
         MVC   TLGINCT(4,RECORD),TCTLIN(@10)                    02S0317 00756000
*    TLGRVC=TLGRVC&&TLGRVC;            /* CLEAR RESERVED FIELD       */ 00757000
         XC    TLGRVC(4,RECORD),TLGRVC(RECORD)                  02S0318 00758000
*    TLGRV2=TLGRV2&&TLGRV2;            /* CLEAR RESERVED FIELD       */ 00759000
         XC    TLGRV2(2,RECORD),TLGRV2(RECORD)                  02S0319 00760000
*    TLGRVB=TLGRVB&&TLGRVB;            /* CLEAR RESERVED FIELD       */ 00761000
         XC    TLGRVB(20,RECORD),TLGRVB(RECORD)                 02S0320 00762000
*  END;                                                         02S0321 00763000
*ELSE                                                           02S0322 00764000
*  DO;                                                          02S0322 00765000
         B     @RC00311                                         02S0322 00766000
@RF00311 DS    0H                                               02S0323 00767000
*    RFY SMFRCD05 BASED(RECORD);                                02S0323 00768000
*    SMF5RTY=5;                        /* BACKGROUND JOB TASK TERMIN-   00769000
*                                         ATION RECORD TYPE =05.     */ 00770000
         MVI   SMF5RTY(RECORD),X'05'                            02S0324 00771000
*    SMF5JIT1(1)=SMF5JIT1(1)&&SMF5JIT1(1);      /* CLEAR HIORDER BYTE*/ 00772000

*    SMF5JID(2:4)=JCTJMRJD;            /* JOB INITIATION DATE        */ 00779000
         MVC   SMF5JID+1(3,RECORD),JCTJMRJD(@10)                02S0328 00780000
*    SMF5NCI=JMRJOBIN;                 /* JOB SYSIN COUNT            */ 00781000
         MVC   SMF5NCI(4,RECORD),JMRJOBIN(JMRPTR)               02S0329 00782000
*    SMF5CKRE=SMF5CKRE&&SMF5CKRE;      /* CLEAR RESERVED FIELD       */ 00783000
         XC    SMF5CKRE(1,RECORD),SMF5CKRE(RECORD)              02S0330 00784000
*    SMF5RDCL=JMRRDR(1);               /* RDR DEVICE CLASS           */ 00785000
         MVC   SMF5RDCL(1,RECORD),JMRRDR(JMRPTR)                02S0331 00786000
*    SMF5RUTY=JMRRDR(2);               /* RDR UNIT TYPE              */ 00787000
         MVC   SMF5RUTY(1,RECORD),JMRRDR+1(JMRPTR)              02S0332 00788000
*    SMF5JICL=JCTJCSMF;                /* JOB'S INPUT CLASS          */ 00789000
         MVC   SMF5JICL(1,RECORD),JCTJCSMF(@10)                 02S0333 00790000
*    SMF5RV2=SMF5RV2&&SMF5RV2;         /* CLEAR RESERVED FIELD       */ 00791000
         XC    SMF5RV2(4,RECORD),SMF5RV2(RECORD)                02S0334 00792000
*    SMF5RV3=SMF5RV3&&SMF5RV3;         /* CLEAR RESERVED FIELD       */ 00793000
         XC    SMF5RV3(2,RECORD),SMF5RV3(RECORD)                02S0335 00794000
*    SMF5PRGN=ACTPRGNM;                /* PROGRAMMER NAME TO RECORD  */ 00795000
         L     @10,@PC00001                                     02S0336 00796000
         L     @10,ACTPTR(,@10)                                 02S0336 00797000
         MVC   SMF5PRGN(20,RECORD),ACTPRGNM(@10)                02S0336 00798000
*    CALL SIGNON;                                               02S0337 00799000
         BAL   @14,SIGNON                                       02S0337 00800000
*    CALL SIGNOFF;                                              02S0338 00801000
         BAL   @14,SIGNOFF                                      02S0338 00802000
*  END;                                                         02S0339 00803000
*  END;                                                         01S0340 00804000
@RC00311 DS    0H                                               01S0341 00805000
* DO; /*MODESET  EXTKEY(SCHED)*/                                01S0341 00806000
@RC00176 DS    0H                                               01S0342 00807000
*   SPKA (16); /*SET PSW KEY*/                                  01S0342 00808000
         LA    @10,16                                           01S0342 00809000
         SPKA  0(@10)                                           01S0342 00810000
* END; /*MODESET  EXTKEY(SCHED)*/               /* RETURN TO KEY SCHED  00811000
*FTER                                              RUNNING KEY 0      @ 00812000
*40FPPD*/                                                       01S0343 00813000
*SYSSTAT: PROC;                                                 02S0344 00814000
@EL00001 IC    @02,@OLDKEY                                      02S0344 00815000
         L     @13,4(,@13)                                      02S0344 00816000
@EF00001 L     @00,@SIZDATD                                     02S0344 00817000
         LR    @01,@11                                          02S0344 00818000
         FSPACE   R,LV=(0),A=(1)                                        00819000
         MODESET KEYADDR=(2)                                            00820000
@ER00001 LM    @14,@12,12(@13)                                  02S0344 00821000
         BR    @14                                              02S0344 00822000
SYSSTAT  STM   @14,@12,@SA00002                                 02S0344 00823000
*/********************************************************************/ 00824000
*/*                                                                  */ 00825000
*/*SEGMENT NAME= SYSEVENT                                            */ 00826000
*/*DESCRIPTIVE NAME= SYSEVENT INTERFACE SEGMENT.                     */ 00827000
*/*FUNCTION=                                                         */ 00828000
*/*        *THIS SEGMENT SETS UP THE INTERFACE TO THE SYSEVENT       */ 00829000
*/*         SVC AND THEN ISSUES THE SYSEVENT SVC TO OBTAIN PAGING    */ 00830000
*/*         STATISTICS FOR EACH TERMINATING STEP AND TO OBTAIN       */ 00831000
*/*         TRANSACTION ACTIVE TIME FOR EACH TERMINATING             */ 00832000
*/*         STEP AND JOB.                                    @YM07459*/ 00833000
*/*        *THE SYSEVENT SVC IS NOT ISSUED FOR WARMSTARTED TASKS,    */ 00834000
*/*         THEREFORE THE RECORD WILL CONTAIN ZEROES FOR WARMSTARTED */ 00835000
*/*         TASKS.                                                   */ 00836000
*/*        *THIS SEGMENT MOVES THE PAGING INFORMATION TO THE STEP    */ 00837000
*/*         TERMINATION RECORD AS ALL THE INFORMATION IS COMMON TO   */ 00838000
*/*         BACKGROUND AND FOREGROUND STEP TERMINATION RECORDS.      */ 00839000
*/*        *THE JOB TERMINATION INFORMATION IS MOVED SELECTIVELY AS  */ 00840000
*/*         ALL INFORMATION IS NOT COMMON TO BOTH FOREGROUND AND     */ 00841000
*/*         BACKGROUND JOB TERMINATION RECORDS.                      */ 00842000
*/*OPERATION= NO SPECIAL ALGORITHMS ARE EMPLOYED.                    */ 00843000
*/*INPUT=                                                            */ 00844000
*/*      JCTWARMS - WARMSTARTED TASK INDICATOR.                      */ 00845000
*/*      SYSEVPRM - SYSEVENT PARAMETER AREA.                         */ 00846000
*/*      TERMTYPE - LCT TERMINATION INDICATOR.                       */ 00847000
*/*      RECORD   - ADDRESS OF RECORD AREA START/RECORD START        */ 00848000
*/*      VRECRDPT - ADDRESS OF RECORD'S VARIABLE SECTION.            */ 00849000
*/*EXIT                                                              */ 00850000
*/*  CONDITION= PROCESSING COMPLETE.                                 */ 00851000
*/*  OUTPUT=AT STEP TERMINATION IS:                                  */ 00852000
*/*         PAGING STATISTICS IN STEP TERMINATION RECORD.            */ 00853000
*/*         STEP TRANSACTION ACTIVE AND SERVICE TIME IN      @YM07659*/ 00854000
*/*           RECORD.                                        @YM07659*/ 00855000
*/*         NON-VAM AND VAM PAGE RECLAIMS IN RECORD          @Z40FPPF*/ 00856000
*/*         STEP TRANSACTION RESIDENCY TIME IN RECORD        @Z40FPPF*/ 00857000
*/*         NUMBER OF COMMON PAGE-INS IN RECORD              @Z40FPPF*/ 00858000
*/*         NUMBER OF COMMON RECLAIMS IN RECORD              @Z40FPPF*/ 00859000
*/*         NUMBER OF PAGES STOLEN IN RECORD                 @Z40FPPF*/ 00860000
*/*         COUNT OF PAGE SECONDS IN RECORD                  @Z40FPPF*/ 00861000
*/*                                                          @Z40FPPF*/ 00862000
*/*         AT JOB TERMINATION IS:                                   */ 00863000
*/*         TRANSACTION ACTIVE TIME MOVED TO RECORD.                 */ 00864000
*/*         TOTAL TRANSACTION RESIDENCY TIME IN RECORD       @Z40FPPF*/ 00865000
*/*  RETURN CODE= N/A                                                */ 00866000
*/*                                                                  */ 00867000
*/********************************************************************/ 00868000
*RFY (REG0,REG1) RSTD;                                          02S0345 00869000
*IF TERMTYPEÂ¬='0C'X|FLUSH='0'B  THEN                            02S0346 00870000
         CLI   TERMTYPE(LCTPTR),X'0C'                           02S0346 00871000

*  DO;                   /*IF STEP FLUSHED, BYPASS SYSEVENT  @ZA27576*/ 00876000
*REG1=LENGTH(SYSEVPRM);                /* SYSEVENT  PARM LIST LENGTH */ 00877000

*      GEN(SYSEVENT REQSVDAT);         /* ISSUE SYSEVENT     @YM43092*/ 00937000

*    TCTACT=TRANSACT;                  /* ACCUMULATED TRANSACTION ACTIV 00955000
*                                         TIME               @YM07459*/ 00956000
         ST    @10,TCTACT(,@04)                                 02S0376 00957000
*    TIVPGNO=PERFRMGP;                 /* STEP PERFORMANCE GROUP        00958000
*                                         NUMBER             @YM07459*/ 00959000
         MVC   TIVPGNO(2,VRECRDPT),PERFRMGP(SYSEVPTR)           02S0377 00960000
*    TIVTRANT=TRANRTIM - TCTATR;       /* STEP TRANSACTION RESIDENCY    00961000
*                                         TIME               @Z40FPPF*/ 00962000
         L     @10,TRANRTIM(,SYSEVPTR)                          02S0378 00963000
         LR    @03,@10                                          02S0378 00964000
         SL    @03,TCTATR(,@04)                                 02S0378 00965000
         STCM  @03,15,TIVTRANT(VRECRDPT)                        02S0378 00966000
*    TCTATR=TRANRTIM;                  /* ACCUMULATED TRANSACTION       00967000
*                                         RESIDENCY TIME     @Z40FPPF*/ 00968000
         ST    @10,TCTATR(,@04)                                 02S0379 00969000
*  END;                                                         02S0380 00970000
*ELSE                                  /* JOB TERMINATION.           */ 00971000
*  DO;                                                          02S0381 00972000
         B     @RC00352                                         02S0381 00973000
@RF00352 DS    0H                                               02S0382 00974000
*    IF JCTWARMS='0'B THEN                                      02S0382 00975000
         L     @10,LCTJCTAD(,LCTPTR)                            02S0382 00976000
         TM    JCTWARMS(@10),B'10000000'                        02S0382 00977000
         BNZ   @RF00382                                         02S0382 00978000
*      GEN (SYSEVENT REQSVDAT);        /* GET TRANSACTION ACTIVE TIME   00979000
*                                                            @YM43092*/ 00980000
         SYSEVENT REQSVDAT                                              00981000
*      RFY SMFRCD35 BASED(RECORD);                              02S0384 00982000
@RF00382 DS    0H                                               02S0385 00983000
*      TLGTJS=JOBSRVCE;                /* TOTAL SESSION SERVICE TIME */ 00984000
         L     @10,JOBSRVCE(,SYSEVPTR)                          02S0385 00985000
         ST    @10,TLGTJS(,RECORD)                              02S0385 00986000
*      TLGTTAT=TRANSACT;               /* TOTAL ACTIVE TIME          */ 00987000
         L     @10,TRANSACT(,SYSEVPTR)                          02S0386 00988000
         ST    @10,TLGTTAT(,RECORD)                             02S0386 00989000
*      TLGPGNO=PERFRMGP;               /* PERFORMANCE GROUP NUMBER   */ 00990000
         LH    @10,PERFRMGP(,SYSEVPTR)                          02S0387 00991000
         STH   @10,TLGPGNO(,RECORD)                             02S0387 00992000
*      TLGTRANT=TRANRTIM;              /* TOTAL TRANSACTION     02S0388 00993000
*                                         RESIDENCY TIME     @Z40FPPF*/ 00994000
         L     @10,TRANRTIM(,SYSEVPTR)                          02S0388 00995000
         ST    @10,TLGTRANT(,RECORD)                            02S0388 00996000
*      IF JCTFORGD='1'B THEN           /* IS THIS A FOREGROUND TASK? */ 00997000
         L     @10,LCTJCTAD(,LCTPTR)                            02S0389 00998000
         TM    JCTFORGD(@10),B'00000001'                        02S0389 00999000
         BNO   @RF00389                                         02S0389 01000000
*        DO;                                                    02S0390 01001000
*          TLGNTSN=TLGNTSN&&TLGNTSN;   /* TOTAL TRANSACTION NUMBER   */ 01002000
         L     @10,TLGNTSN(,RECORD)                             02S0391 01003000

         XR    @04,@10                                          02S0391 01005000

*          TLGNTSN=FORETRAN;           /* NUMBER OF TRANSACTIONS     */ 01007000

*        END;                                                   02S0393 01010000
*  END;                                                         02S0394 01011000

*RFY REG2 RSTD;                                                 02S0395 01013000

         LA    REG2,56                                          02S0396 01016000

*SIGNON: PROC;                                                  02S0403 01030000
SIGNON   STM   @14,@12,@SA00003                                 02S0403 01031000
*/********************************************************************/ 01032000
*/*                                                                  */ 01033000
*/*SEGMENT NAME= SIGNON                                              */ 01034000
*/*DESCRIPTIVE NAME= SIGNON MESSAGE SEGMENT                          */ 01035000
*/*FUNCTION=                                                         */ 01036000
*/*        *THIS SEGMENT COPIES THE JOB OR STEP SIGNON MESSAGE       */ 01037000
*/*         (IEF373I OR IEF375I) FROM IEFTB720 TO CORE GOTTEN FOR    */ 01038000
*/*         THIS MODULE. THE VARIABLE FIELDS ARE THEN FILLED IN      */ 01039000
*/*         (START DATE, START TIME, JOB OR STEP NAME).              */ 01040000
*/*        *THE SIGNON MESSAGE IS THEN WRITTEN TO THE SYSOUT DATA SET*/ 01041000
*/*         VIA WTP.                                                 */ 01042000
*/*OPERATION= NO SPECIAL ALGORITHMS ARE EMPLOYED.                    */ 01043000
*/*INPUT=                                                            */ 01044000
*/*      TERMTYPE - LCT TERMINATION INDICATOR.                       */ 01045000
*/*      STEPSTRT - STEP START MESSAGE(IEF373I).                     */ 01046000
*/*      SCTSNAME - STEP NAME.                                       */ 01047000
*/*      JCTJMRSD - STEP START DATE.                                 */ 01048000
*/*      JCTJMRSS - STEP START TIME.                                 */ 01049000
*/*      JOBSTRT  - JOB START MESSAGE(IEF375I).                      */ 01050000
*/*      JCTJMRJD - JOB START DATE.                                  */ 01051000
*/*      JCTJMRJT - JOB START TIME.                                  */ 01052000
*/*EXIT                                                              */ 01053000
*/*  CONDITION= PROCESSING COMPLETE FOR STEP TERMINATION.            */ 01054000
*/*  OUTPUT=                                                         */ 01055000
*/*         IEF373I STEP /XXXXXXXX/ START YYDDD.HHMM                 */ 01056000
*/*  CONDITION= PROCESSING COMPLETE FOR JOB TERMINATION.             */ 01057000
*/*  OUTPUT=                                                         */ 01058000
*/*         IEF375I  JOB /XXXXXXXX/ START YYDDD.HHMM                 */ 01059000
*/*  RETURN CODE= N/A.                                               */ 01060000
*/*                                                                  */ 01061000
*/********************************************************************/ 01062000
*IF TERMTYPE='0C'X THEN                /* IS THIS STEP TERMINATION?  */ 01063000
         CLI   TERMTYPE(LCTPTR),X'0C'                           02S0404 01064000
         BNE   @RF00404                                         02S0404 01065000
*  DO;                                                          02S0405 01066000
*    MSGAREA(1:L373I+4)=STEPSTRT;      /* STEP START MSG TO OUTPUT      01067000
*                                         MESSAGE BUFFER.            */ 01068000
         L     @10,@CV00091                                     02S0406 01069000
         LA    @15,3                                            02S0406 01070000
         AH    @15,L373I(,@10)                                  02S0406 01071000
         L     @10,@CV00091                                     02S0406 01072000
         EX    @15,@SM02682                                     02S0406 01073000
*    NAME=SCTSNAME;                    /* STEPNAME TO MSG. FROM SCT. */ 01074000
         LA    @10,MSGAREA                                      02S0407 01075000
         L     @01,LCTSCTAD(,LCTPTR)                            02S0407 01076000
         MVC   NAME(8,@10),SCTSNAME(@01)                        02S0407 01077000
*    DATEVALU=JCTSSD;                  /* STEP START DATE            */ 01078000
         L     @10,LCTJCTAD(,LCTPTR)                            02S0408 01079000
         L     @15,JCTSSD-1(,@10)                               02S0408 01080000
         LA    @15,0(,@15)                                      02S0408 01081000
         ST    @15,DATEVALU                                     02S0408 01082000
*    HOURVALU=JCTJMRSS;                /* STEP START TIME            */ 01083000
         MVC   HOURVALU(3),JCTJMRSS(@10)                        02S0409 01084000
*  END;                                                         02S0410 01085000
*ELSE                                                           02S0411 01086000
*  DO;                                                          02S0411 01087000
         B     @RC00404                                         02S0411 01088000
@RF00404 DS    0H                                               02S0412 01089000
*    MSGAREA(1:L375I+4)=JOBSTRT;       /* JOB START MSG TO OUTPUT BUF*/ 01090000
         L     @10,@CV00093                                     02S0412 01091000
         LA    @15,3                                            02S0412 01092000
         AH    @15,L375I(,@10)                                  02S0412 01093000
         L     @10,@CV00093                                     02S0412 01094000
         EX    @15,@SM02684                                     02S0412 01095000
*    NAME=JMRJOB;                      /* JOBNAME TO MSG FROM JMR.   */ 01096000
         LA    @10,MSGAREA                                      02S0413 01097000
         MVC   NAME(8,@10),JMRJOB(JMRPTR)                       02S0413 01098000
*    DATEVALU=JCTJMRJD;                /* JOB START DATE             */ 01099000
         L     @10,LCTJCTAD(,LCTPTR)                            02S0414 01100000
         L     @15,JCTJMRJD-1(,@10)                             02S0414 01101000
         LA    @15,0(,@15)                                      02S0414 01102000
         ST    @15,DATEVALU                                     02S0414 01103000
*    HOURVALU=JCTJMRJT;                /* JOB START TIME             */ 01104000
         MVC   HOURVALU(3),JCTJMRJT(@10)                        02S0415 01105000
*  END;                                                         02S0416 01106000
*DATEVAL(3)=DATEVAL(3)|'0F'X;          /* SIGN VALUE TO DECIMAL DIGIT*/ 01107000
@RC00404 OI    DATEVAL+2,X'0F'                                  02S0417 01108000
*UNPK(DATE,DATEVAL);                   /* START DATE TO MESSAGE      */ 01109000
         LA    @10,MSGAREA                                      02S0418 01110000
         UNPK  DATE(5,@10),DATEVAL(3)                           02S0418 01111000
*WORK=HOURVAL/HOUR;                    /* START HOUR CALCULATED      */ 01112000
         SLR   @15,@15                                          02S0419 01113000
         ICM   @15,7,HOURVAL                                    02S0419 01114000
         L     @14,HOUR                                         02S0419 01115000
         LR    @01,@15                                          02S0419 01116000
         SLR   @00,@00                                          02S0419 01117000
         DR    @00,@14                                          02S0419 01118000
         ST    @01,WORK                                         02S0419 01119000
*WORKA=HOURVAL//HOUR;                  /* START 'MINUTES' IS REMAIN. */ 01120000
         LR    @02,@15                                          02S0420 01121000
         SRDA  @02,32                                           02S0420 01122000
         DR    @02,@14                                          02S0420 01123000
         ST    @02,WORKA                                        02S0420 01124000
*CVD(WORK,DBLWORK);                    /* CONVERT HOUR TO DECIMAL    */ 01125000
         CVD   @01,DBLWORK                                      02S0421 01126000
*SIGN=SIGN|'0F'X;                      /* SIGN VALUE TO DECIMAL DIGIT*/ 01127000
         OI    SIGN,X'0F'                                       02S0422 01128000
*UNPK(HOURON,DBLWORK);                 /* START HOUR VALUE TO MSG.   */ 01129000
         UNPK  HOURON(2,@10),DBLWORK(8)                         02S0423 01130000
*WORK=WORKA/MINCONVT;                  /* START MINUTE VALUE CALC.   */ 01131000
         SRDA  @02,32                                           02S0424 01132000
         D     @02,MINCONVT                                     02S0424 01133000
         ST    @03,WORK                                         02S0424 01134000
*CVD(WORK,DBLWORK);                    /* CONVERT MINUTES TO DECIMAL */ 01135000
         CVD   @03,DBLWORK                                      02S0425 01136000
*SIGN=SIGN|'0F'X;                      /* SIGN VALUE TO DECIMAL DIGIT*/ 01137000
         OI    SIGN,X'0F'                                       02S0426 01138000
*UNPK(MINON,DBLWORK);                  /* START MINUTE VALUE TO MSG. */ 01139000
         UNPK  MINON(2,@10),DBLWORK(8)                          02S0427 01140000
*CALL IEEAB400(ADDR(MSGAREA),LCTJSCB); /* BUFFER WTP MESSAGE @YM04713*/ 01141000
         ST    @10,@TF00001                                     02S0428 01142000
         LA    @10,@TF00001                                     02S0428 01143000
         ST    @10,@AL00001                                     02S0428 01144000
         LA    @10,LCTJSCB(,LCTPTR)                             02S0428 01145000
         ST    @10,@AL00001+4                                   02S0428 01146000
         L     @15,@CV00095                                     02S0428 01147000
         LA    @01,@AL00001                                     02S0428 01148000
         BALR  @14,@15                                          02S0428 01149000
*RETURN;                                                        02S0429 01150000
@EL00003 DS    0H                                               02S0429 01151000
@EF00003 DS    0H                                               02S0429 01152000
@ER00003 LM    @14,@12,@SA00003                                 02S0429 01153000
         BR    @14                                              02S0429 01154000
*END SIGNON;                                                    02S0430 01155000
*SIGNOFF: PROC;                                                 02S0431 01156000
SIGNOFF  STM   @14,@12,@SA00004                                 02S0431 01157000
*/********************************************************************/ 01158000
*/*                                                                  */ 01159000
*/*SEGMENT NAME= SIGNOFF                                             */ 01160000
*/*DESCRIPTIVE NAME= SIGNOFF MESSAGE SEGMENT                         */ 01161000
*/*FUNCTION=                                                         */ 01162000
*/*        * THIS SEGMENT COPIES THE JOB OR STEP SIGNOFF MESSAGE     */ 01163000
*/*         (IEF374I OR IEF376I) FROM IEFTB720 TO CORE GOTTEN FOR    */ 01164000
*/*         THIS MODULE. THE VARIABLE FIELDS ARE THEN FILLED IN      */ 01165000
*/*         (JOB OR STEP NAME, STOP DATE, STOP TIME, EXECUTION TIME, */ 01166000
*/*         REAL OR VIRTUAL CORE VALUES).                            */ 01167000
*/*        *THE SIGNOFF MESSAGE IS THEN WRITTEN TO THE SYSOUT DATA   */ 01168000
*/*         SET VIA WTP.                                             */ 01169000
*/*OPERATION= NO SPECIAL ALGORITHMS ARE EMPLOYED.                    */ 01170000
*/*INPUT=                                                            */ 01171000
*/*      TERMTYPE - LCT TERMINATION INDICATOR.                       */ 01172000
*/*      TIVSTU   - CORE USED IN LOW PORTION OF PRIVATE AREA.        */ 01173000
*/*      TIVSYST  - CORE USED IN HIGH PORTION OF PRIVATE AREA.       */ 01174000
*/*      STEPSTOP - STEP STOP MESSAGE(IEF3741).                      */ 01175000
*/*      JOBSTOP  - JOB STOP MESSAGE(IEF376I).                       */ 01176000
*/*      TIVRCDTE - STOP DATE.                                       */ 01177000
*/*      TIVRCDTS - STOP TIME.                                       */ 01178000
*/*      ACTJTIME - EXECUTION TIME.                                  */ 01179000
*/*  CONDITION= PROCESSING COMPLETE FOR STEP TERMINATION.            */ 01180000
*/*  OUTPUT=                                                         */ 01181000
*/*         IEF374I STEP /XXXXXXXX/ STOP  YYDDD.HHMM CPU XXXX MIN    */ 01182000
*/*                 XX.XX SEC SRB XXXX MIN XX.XX SEC REAL/VIRT       */ 01183000
*/*                 XXXXXK SYS XXXXXK                        @Z40FPH2*/ 01184000
*/*  CONDITION= PROCESSING COMPLETE FOR JOB TERMINATION.             */ 01185000
*/*  OUTPUT=                                                         */ 01186000
*/*          IEF376I JOB  /XXXXXXXX/ STOP  YYDD.HHMM CPU XXXX MIN    */ 01187000
*/*                 XX.XX SEC SRB XXXX MIN XX.XX SEC         @Z40FPH2*/ 01188000
*/*  RETURN CODE= N/A                                                */ 01189000
*/********************************************************************/ 01190000
*RFY SMFRCD34 BASED(RECORD);                                    02S0432 01191000
*IF TERMTYPE='0C'X THEN                /* IS THIS STEP TERMINATION?  */ 01192000
         CLI   TERMTYPE(LCTPTR),X'0C'                           02S0433 01193000
         BNE   @RF00433                                         02S0433 01194000
*  DO;                                                          02S0434 01195000
*    MSGAREA(1:L374I+4)=STEPSTOP;      /* STEP STOP MSG TO OUTPUT       01196000
*                                         MESSAGE BUFFER.            */ 01197000
         L     @10,@CV00092                                     02S0435 01198000
         LA    @07,3                                            02S0435 01199000
         AH    @07,L374I(,@10)                                  02S0435 01200000
         L     @10,@CV00092                                     02S0435 01201000
         EX    @07,@SM02686                                     02S0435 01202000
*    NAME=SCTSNAME;                    /* STEPNAME TO MSG FROM SCT.  */ 01203000
         LA    @10,MSGAREA                                      02S0436 01204000
         L     @07,LCTSCTAD(,LCTPTR)                            02S0436 01205000
         MVC   NAME(8,@10),SCTSNAME(@07)                        02S0436 01206000
*    SAVESRBT=SCTSRBT;                 /* SAVE SRB TIME      @Z40FPH2*/ 01207000
         L     SAVESRBT,SCTSRBT(,@07)                           02S0437 01208000
*    IF EAADDRBT='0'B THEN             /* VIRT OR REAL STORAGE USED? */ 01209000
         TM    EAADDRBT(@07),B'10000000'                        02S0438 01210000
         BNZ   @RF00438                                         02S0438 01211000
*      REALVIRT=VIRT;                  /* VIRTUAL STORAGE TEXT TO MSG*/ 01212000
         MVC   REALVIRT(4,@10),VIRT                             02S0439 01213000
*    CVD(TIVSTU,DBLWORK);              /* CONVERT LOW CORE TO DECIMAL*/ 01214000
@RF00438 LH    @10,TIVSTU(,RECORD)                              02S0440 01215000
         CVD   @10,DBLWORK                                      02S0440 01216000
*    SIGN=SIGN|'0F'X;                  /* SIGN VALUE TO DECIMAL DIGIT*/ 01217000
         OI    SIGN,X'0F'                                       02S0441 01218000
*    UNPK(LOWCOR,DBLWORK);             /* AMOUNT OF CORE USED IN LOW */ 01219000
         LA    @10,MSGAREA                                      02S0442 01220000
         UNPK  LOWCOR(5,@10),DBLWORK(8)                         02S0442 01221000
*                                      /* PORTION OF PRIVATE AREA.   */ 01222000
*    DO COUNT=1 TO 4 WHILE             /* CHANGE LEADING ZEROES TO - */ 01223000
*      LOWCOR(COUNT) = 'F0'X;          /* BLANKS FOR MSG. READABILITY*/ 01224000
         LA    COUNT,1                                          02S0443 01225000
@DL00443 LA    @10,MSGAREA                                      02S0443 01226000
         LR    @07,@10                                          02S0443 01227000
         ALR   @07,COUNT                                        02S0443 01228000
         CLI   LOWCOR-1(@07),X'F0'                              02S0443 01229000
         BNE   @DC00443                                         02S0443 01230000
*      LOWCOR(COUNT) = '40'X;          /* BLANK TO MESSAGE.          */ 01231000
         ALR   @10,COUNT                                        02S0444 01232000
         MVI   LOWCOR-1(@10),X'40'                              02S0444 01233000
*    END;                                                       02S0445 01234000
         AL    COUNT,@CF00059                                   02S0445 01235000
         C     COUNT,@CF00053                                   02S0445 01236000
         BNH   @DL00443                                         02S0445 01237000
@DC00443 DS    0H                                               02S0446 01238000
*    CVD(TIVSYST,DBLWORK);             /* CONVERT TOP CORE TO DECIMAL*/ 01239000
         LH    @10,TIVSYST(,RECORD)                             02S0446 01240000
         CVD   @10,DBLWORK                                      02S0446 01241000
*    SIGN=SIGN|'0F'X;                  /* SIGN VALUE TO DECIMAL DIGIT*/ 01242000
         OI    SIGN,X'0F'                                       02S0447 01243000
*    UNPK(HICORE,DBLWORK);             /* AMOUNT OF CORE USED IN HIGH*/ 01244000
         LA    @10,MSGAREA                                      02S0448 01245000
         UNPK  HICORE(5,@10),DBLWORK(8)                         02S0448 01246000
*                                      /* PORTION OF PRIVATE AREA    */ 01247000
*    DO COUNT=1 TO 4 WHILE             /* CHANGE LEADING ZEROES TO - */ 01248000
*      HICORE(COUNT) = 'F0'X;          /* BLANKS FROM MSG.READABILITY*/ 01249000
         LA    COUNT,1                                          02S0449 01250000
@DL00449 LA    @10,MSGAREA                                      02S0449 01251000
         LR    @07,@10                                          02S0449 01252000

         BNE   @DC00449                                         02S0449 01255000
*      HICORE(COUNT) = '40'X;          /* BLANK TO MESSAGE.          */ 01256000
         ALR   @10,COUNT                                        02S0450 01257000
         MVI   HICORE-1(@10),X'40'                              02S0450 01258000
*    END;                                                       02S0451 01259000
         AL    COUNT,@CF00059                                   02S0451 01260000
         C     COUNT,@CF00053                                   02S0451 01261000
         BNH   @DL00449                                         02S0451 01262000
@DC00449 DS    0H                                               02S0452 01263000
*  END;                                                         02S0452 01264000
*ELSE                                                           02S0453 01265000
*  DO;                                                          02S0453 01266000
         B     @RC00433                                         02S0453 01267000
@RF00433 DS    0H                                               02S0454 01268000
*    MSGAREA(1:L376I+4)=JOBSTOP;       /* JOB STOP MSG TO OUTPUT BUF.*/ 01269000
         L     @10,@CV00094                                     02S0454 01270000
         LA    @15,3                                            02S0454 01271000
         AH    @15,L376I(,@10)                                  02S0454 01272000
         L     @10,@CV00094                                     02S0454 01273000
         EX    @15,@SM02688                                     02S0454 01274000
*    NAME=JMRJOB;                      /* JOB NAME TO MSG FROM JMR.  */ 01275000
         LA    @10,MSGAREA                                      02S0455 01276000
         MVC   NAME(8,@10),JMRJOB(JMRPTR)                       02S0455 01277000
*    SAVESRBT=JCTSRBT;                 /* SAVE SRB TIME      @Z40FPH2*/ 01278000
         L     @10,LCTJCTAD(,LCTPTR)                            02S0456 01279000
         L     SAVESRBT,JCTSRBT(,@10)                           02S0456 01280000
*  END;                                                         02S0457 01281000
*DATEVALU=TIVRCDTE(2:4);               /* JOB OR STEP STOP DATE.     */ 01282000
@RC00433 SLR   @10,@10                                          02S0458 01283000
         ICM   @10,7,TIVRCDTE+1(RECORD)                         02S0458 01284000
         ST    @10,DATEVALU                                     02S0458 01285000
*HOURVALU=TIVRCDTS;                    /* JOB OR STEP STOP TIME.     */ 01286000
         MVC   HOURVALU(3),TIVRCDTS+1(RECORD)                   02S0459 01287000
*UNPK(DATE,DATEVAL);                   /* STOP DATE TO MESSAGE.      */ 01288000
         LA    @10,MSGAREA                                      02S0460 01289000
         UNPK  DATE(5,@10),DATEVAL(3)                           02S0460 01290000
*WORK=HOURVAL/HOUR;                    /* STOP HOUR CALCULATED.      */ 01291000
         SLR   @07,@07                                          02S0461 01292000
         ICM   @07,7,HOURVAL                                    02S0461 01293000
         L     @05,HOUR                                         02S0461 01294000
         LR    @01,@07                                          02S0461 01295000
         SLR   @00,@00                                          02S0461 01296000
         DR    @00,@05                                          02S0461 01297000
         ST    @01,WORK                                         02S0461 01298000
*WORKA=HOURVAL//HOUR;                  /* STOP 'MINUTES' IS REMAINDER*/ 01299000

         SRDA  @08,32                                           02S0462 01301000
         DR    @08,@05                                          02S0462 01302000
         ST    @08,WORKA                                        02S0462 01303000
*CVD(WORK,DBLWORK);                    /* CONVERT STOP HOURS TO DEC. */ 01304000
         CVD   @01,DBLWORK                                      02S0463 01305000
*SIGN=SIGN|'0F'X;                      /* SIGN VALUE TO DECIMAL DIGIT*/ 01306000

*UNPK(HOURON,DBLWORK);                 /* STOP HOUR TO MESSAGE       */ 01308000

*WORK=WORKA/MINCONVT;                  /* STOP MINUTE VALUE CALCULATE*/ 01310000

*CVD(WORK,DBLWORK);                    /* CONVERT MINUTES TO DECIMAL.*/ 01315000

*SIGN=SIGN|'0F'X;                      /* SIGN VALUE TO DECIMAL DIGIT*/ 01317000

*UNPK(MINON,DBLWORK);                  /* STOP MINUTE VALUE TO MSG.  */ 01319000

*WORKA=ACTJTIME//MINCONVT;             /* EXECUTION 'SECONDS' REMAIN.*/ 01331000

*EXTPTR=ADDR(TIMECPU);                 /* SET UP RECORD NAMES FOR       01336000
*                                         TIME CPU           @Z40FPH2*/ 01337000

*DO I=1 TO 2;                          /* DO FOR CPU TIME AND   02S0474 01339000
*                                         SRB TIME           @Z40FPH2*/ 01340000

@DL00474 DS    0H                                               02S0475 01342000
*CVD(WORK,DBLWORK);                    /* EXEC MINUTES TO DECIMAL.   */ 01343000
         L     @10,WORK                                         02S0475 01344000
         CVD   @10,DBLWORK                                      02S0475 01345000
*SIGN=SIGN|'0F'X;                      /* SIGN VALUE TO DECIMAL DIGIT*/ 01346000

*DO COUNT=1 TO 3 WHILE                 /* CHANGE LEADING ZEROES TO - */ 01350000
*  MINUTE(COUNT) = 'F0'X;              /* BLANKS FOR MSG. READABILITY*/ 01351000

@DC00478 DS    0H                                               02S0481 01365000

*WORKA=WORKA//HUNDREDS;                /* AND HUNDREDS OF SECONDS.   */ 01373000

         ENTRY IEFYS                                                    00005000

         USING *,@15                                               0001 00007000
         B     @PROLOG                                             0001 00008000

         DC    AL1(16)                                             0001 00010000

         USING @PSTART,@11                                         0001 00016000
         L     @00,@SIZDATD                                        0001 00017000

         BR    @15                                                 0001 00026000

*                                           TEXT (MAX 126 CHARS)     */ 00028000
*                                                                  0014 00029000
* /************************** END OF WPL *****************************/ 00030000
*WPLPTR=ADDR(WPLIST);                  /* ADDRESS OF WTP BUFFER TO BE   00031000

./  ADD  SSI=62580021,NAME=IEFU29
IEFU29   CSECT                                                          00050004
*********************************************************************** 00100004
*                                                                     * 00150004
*   MODULE       -  IEFU29                                            * 00200004
*                                                                     * 00250004
*   DESCRIPTION  - SMF USER EXIT                                      * 00270004
*                                                                     * 00350004
*   STATUS       - NEW MODULE                                         * 00370004
*                  SUPPORT CODE - Z40FPPF                             * 00450004
*                                                                     * 00500004
*   FUNCTION     - THIS IS THE SMF USER EXIT SUPPLIED AS PART OF THE  * 00550004
*                  SYSTEM AT SYSGEN. IT PERFORMS THE FOLLOWING:       * 00600004
*                    1) ZEROES REGISTER 15                            * 00650004
*                    2) RETURNS TO CALLER                             * 00700004
*                                                                     * 00750004
*   NOTES        -                                                    * 00800004
*        THIS MODULE DOES NOT ESTABLISH STANDARD ADDRESSABILITY       * 00850004
*                                                                     * 00900004
*   ENTRY POINT  - IEFU29                                             * 00950004
*                  BALR FROM IEEMB829                                 * 00970004
*                                                                     * 01050004
*       INPUT    - REGISTER ONE POINTS TO                             * 01100004
*                  A LIST OF POINTERS TO INPUT PARAMETERS:            * 01130004
*                      1) DSN - 44 CHARACTER FIELD LEFT JUSTIFIED     * 01200004
*                               AND PADDED WITH BLANKS                * 01250004
*                - REGISTER 14 CONTAINS RETURN ADDRESS                * 01270004
*                                                                     * 01300004
*       OUTPUT   - NONE                                               * 01350004
*                                                                     * 01400004
*   EXIT NORMAL  - BR14 TO CALLER(IEEMB829)                           * 01450004
*                                                                     * 01500004
*   EXIT ERROR   - NONE                                               * 01550004
*                                                                     * 01600004
*   EXTERNAL REFERENCES - NONE                                        * 01650004
*                                                                     * 01700004
*   TABLES      - NONE                                                * 01750004
*                                                                     * 01800004
*   MACROS      - NONE                                                * 01850004
*                                                                     * 01900004
*   CHANGE ACTIVITY  -  NONE                                          * 01950004
*                                                                     * 02000004
*   MESSAGES    - NONE                                                * 02050004
*                                                                     * 02100004
*   ABEND CODES - NONE                                                * 02150004
*                                                                     * 02200004
*                                                                     * 02250004
*********************************************************************** 02300004
*                                                                       02350004
*        MODULE EQUATES                                                 02400004
*                                                                       02450004
R14      EQU   14                      REGISTER EQUATE                  02500004
R15      EQU   15                      REGISTER EQUATE                  02550004
         SR    R15,R15                 ZERO RETURN CODE REGISTER        02600004
         BR    R14                     RETURN TO CALLER                 02650004
         MODID BR=NO                   MODULE ID                        02700004
         END                                                            02750004
./  ADD  SSI=30270130,NAME=IEFU83
IEFU83   CSECT                                                          00050001
* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * 00060001
*                                                                     * 00070001
*  TITLE  IEFU83   SMF USER EXIT FROM SVC 83                          * 00080002
*                                                                     * 00090001
*  FUNCTION  THIS EXIT IS FOR THE USER. THIS MODULE MUST RESIDE IN    * 00092002
*            LPALIB                                                   * 00092402
*                                                                     * 00094001
*  ENTRY  IEFU83 - BALR FROM SVC 83 AT THE WRITE OF EACH RECORD       * 00096002
*                                                                     * 00098001
*  INPUT  R1 = POINTER TO SMF RECORD                                  * 00098401
*                                                                     * 00098801
*  OUTPUT R15 = ZERO - MEANS GO WRITE THE SMF RECORD                  * 00099201
*               FOUR - MEANS CANCEL WRITE OF THIS RECORD              * 00099601
*                                                                     * 00099701
*  EXIT   TO IEESMF8C                                                 * 00099801
*                                                                     * 00099901
* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * 00116601
R14      EQU   14                                                       00126601
R15      EQU   15                                                       00128601
         SR    R15,R15                                                  00130601
         BR    R14                                                      00133301
         END                                                            00150001
